T02D2531:227b-1: kri ya sam gra ha n'a ma /
T02D2531:227b-3: bya ba bsdus pa zhes bya ba /
T02D2531:227b-4: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2531:227b-5: 'gro mgon rdo rje sems btud nas //
T02D2531:227b-6: slob ma dam pas bskul dbang las //
T02D2531:227b-7: gzhung chen dam pa'i man ngag las //
T02D2531:227b-8: 'di ni bdag gis brtsam par bya //
T02D2531:227b-9: bsnyen pa la sogs sa sbyang ba ni yongs su gzung ba dang ;
T02D2531:227b-10: rtsig rmang yang dag gzhan dang shing gi las rnams dang //
T02D2531:227b-11: lha ni rab tu gnas dang de bzhin gand'i dang //
T02D2531:227b-12: rgyal mtshan gzugs dang de bzhin bya ba'i lha rnams la //
T02D2531:227b-13: bla ma slob ma brtag pa dang //
T02D2531:227b-14: bla ma gsol btab de nas ni //
T02D2531:227b-15: bla mas sngags dang bsnyen pa bya //
T02D2531:227b-16: de nas sa ni yongs su brtag / de la
T02D2531:227b-17: gtsug lag khang la sogs pa bzhengs par 'dod pa'i
T02D2531:227b-18: sbyin bdag gis dang po slob dpon yongs su brtag
T02D2531:227b-19: par bya ste / gang zhig sems can rnams la snying rje bral ba dang /
T02D2531:227b-21: sems can rnams la zhe sdang dang //
T02D2531:227b-22: ngan shes kyi khengs pa dang /
T02D2531:227b-24: shin tu myos shing bag med pa dang /
T02D2531:227b-26: gzhan gyi skyon brjod pa'i slob dpon de yongs su spang bar bya'o //
T02D2531:227b-27: bla mas kyang rnam pa de lta bu'i slob ma yongs su spang bar bya'o //
T02D2531:227b-28: gang yang ngad dang shes rab snying rje ldan pa dang //
T02D2531:227b-29: khro med brtson 'grus ldan zhing sems can slu ba yang //
T02D2531:227b-30: rnam pa de bzhin rigs par bla mas yongs su
T02D2531:227b-31: brtag / de la'ang slob ma'i rjes su mthun par
T02D2531:227b-32: bla mas bsgrub // gang yang dad pa dang shes rab dang brtse ba dang ldan pa dang /
T02D2531:227b-34: snyan dngags dang sdeb sbyor gyi bkod pa dang /
T02D2531:227b-35: rtsis kyi bstan bcos rab tu rig pa gtam brjod
T02D2531:227b-36: pa la rab tu mkhas pa sna tshogs pa'i ri
T02D2531:227b-37: mo dang / sna tshogs pa'i yul skad dang /
T02D2531:227b-38: rin po che dang gser dang skyes pa dang bud med dang /
T02D2531:228a-0: glang po che dang rta rnams kyi mtshan nyid yang dag par @228a * //
T02D2531:228a-2: spos sbyor dang glu dang rol mo dang sna tshogs pa'i mtshon cha dang /
T02D2531:228a-4: khams smra ba dang tshad kyi bstan bcos shes pa dang /
T02D2531:228a-5: glu la sogs pa la mkhas pa dang /
T02D2531:228a-6: sen mo breg [?] pa la sogs pa'i bzo rig pa dang /
T02D2531:228a-8: shes rab dang nus par ldan pa /
T02D2531:228a-9: mkhas shing smra ba'i spobs pa can sgrub pa dang
T02D2531:228a-10: ldan pa rtag tu spro zhing nyon mongs pa bzod
T02D2531:228a-11: pa / bla ma dang rnal 'byor ma dang dam
T02D2531:228a-12: tshig dang dkon mchog gsum la sogs pa rnams la
T02D2531:228a-14: pha rol tu phyin pa bcu la chags shing 'jigs pa dang /
T02D2531:228a-17: rab tu gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dri ba dang /
T02D2531:228a-18: las sna tshogs bskyang ba la mkhas pa /
T02D2531:228a-19: bla ma'i bka' mchog tu yongs su bskyang ba de
T02D2531:228a-20: bla ma'i bka' dang bde gshegs bka' las 'das pa
T02D2531:228a-21: dang // spun la khro dang nyes pa sgrogs pa dang //
T02D2531:228a-22: sems can byams pa spangs dang byang chub sems spangs dang //
T02D2531:228a-23: dam chos smod dang gsang sgrogs phung po nyon mongs dang //
T02D2531:228a-24: theg chen the tshom za dang sdug la byams pa dang //
T02D2531:228a-25: bde sdug chos la rtog cing dad can sems sun 'byin /
T02D2531:228a-26: dam chos rnyed pa mi rten bud med kun smod pa //
T02D2531:228a-27: rtsa ba'i ltung bral de ni slob dpon bzang po yin //
T02D2531:228a-28: rnam pa de lta bu'i yon tan kun gyis brgyan
T02D2531:228a-29: cing skyon thams cad dang bral bas dkyil 'khor 'dri
T02D2531:228a-30: ba na dang por rnal 'byor pas dge ba'i nyi
T02D2531:228a-31: ma dang skar ma la sogs pa la khang par
T02D2531:228a-32: zhugs te mdun du mandala byas la /
T02D2531:228a-33: ji ltar nus pa'i yon phul nas snyim pa thal mo sbyar te gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02D2531:228a-35: bdag dge ba snyen che ge mo zhes bgyi ba
T02D2531:228a-36: gtsug lag khang la sogs pa bzhengs par 'dod pas
T02D2531:228a-37: de'i phyir bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung rab mtha' dag
T02D2531:228a-38: rtogs pa khyod kyis bdag la gnang bar mdzod cig
T02D2531:228a-39: ces pa 'dis slob dpon la sbyin bdag gis lan
T02D2531:228a-40: gsum du gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02D2531:228a-41: de nas brtsams nas slob dpon gyis tshogs bsags pa'i khyed du sngon du bsnyen pa bya'o //
T02D2531:228b-1: sngon du bsnyen pa tshogs bsags dang //
T02D2531:228b-2: bgegs rnams rnam par gzhom par bya //
T02D2531:228b-3: thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam shes ni //
T02D2531:228b-6: de nas 'khor lo'i gtso bo'i sngags 'bum bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D2531:228b-7: yang na rang gi yi dam lha'i sngags lan 'bum bzlas so //
T02D2531:228b-8: dkyil 'khor pa rnams kyi so so'i khri bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D2531:228b-9: de la dge ba'i nyi ma dang gza' la sogs
T02D2531:228b-10: pa la mchod pa sngon du 'gro bas sa yongs
T02D2531:228b-12: gal te mi 'dod pa'i shing la sogs pa dang
T02D2531:228b-13: ldan pa'i sa gzhi ni de 'dir yongs su spang
T02D2531:228b-14: bar bya'o // de nas yang sa gzhi gang zhig
T02D2531:228b-15: gi shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su rim pas
T02D2531:228b-16: aa shvattha dang aardzu na dang /
T02D2531:228b-23: tsher ma can gyi shing rnams ni bu dang bud med dang ;
T02D2531:228b-24: nor rnams rnam par bral ba dang /
T02D2531:228b-28: so ba la sogs pa'i 'bru rnam par nyams pa
T02D2531:228b-29: ster bar 'gyur ba de rnams spang ngo zhes te
T02D2531:228b-31: dbang por n+ya gro dha dgod au dumb'a ra de bzhin du /
T02D2531:228b-32: gshin rjer dgod cing aa shvattha ni nub tu dgod /
T02D2531:228b-33: plaksha byang phyogs shin tu dge mthar bya /
T02D2531:228b-34: 'di ni zlos pas log par yang ni gnas par 'gyur //
T02D2531:228b-36: yang sa gzhi gang zhig dbyug pa dang /
T02D2531:228b-37: shing rta th'a ka da dang /
T02D2531:228b-41: gzhu dang mgo che ba dang /
T02D2531:228b-44: rlung yab kyi rnam pa dang /
T02D2531:228b-46: 'od dang mi mnyam par 'bab pa de rnams ni nges par phyugs dang /
T02D2531:228b-50: chom rkun dang me'i 'jigs pa'i phyir dang /
T02D2531:228b-53: longs spyod nyams pa dang dbul po dang /
T02D2531:228b-55: nyes pa ster bar 'gyur ba rnams so //
T02D2531:228b-56: gang yang me dang gshin rje dang /
T02D2531:229a-2: rlung gi phyogs rnams su bo ba'i nyes pas ltung ba dang /
T02D2531:229a-4: dgra yis 'joms par 'gyur ba'i sa'i rang bzhin rnams so //
T02D2531:229a-5: yang sa gang khyi dang ce sbyang dang rnga mo
T02D2531:229a-6: rnams snod bcom pa'i dgra dang mi dge ba ster
T02D2531:229a-11: mi 'dod pa'i 'bras bu ster ba'i sa gzhi rnams dang /
T02D2531:229a-14: ltos 'gro'i tshang nag po'i sa rnams spang bar bya'o //
T02D2531:229a-16: lha ma yin la sogs pa'i gnas dang /
T02D2531:229a-17: lha'i gnas rnams yod pa'i sa gzhi de yang mi dge ba'o //
T02D2531:229a-18: gang yang phyogs dang phyogs mtshams gang dang gang la yang tsher ma'i shing dang /
T02D2531:229a-21: shing klu skam yod pa'i sa gzhi de yang mi shis pa'o zhes so //
T02D2531:229a-22: de nas dge ba'i mtshan nyid rnams ni sa gzhi gang zhig dga' ba dang /
T02D2531:229a-27: de rnams ni bya ba'i don dang /
T02D2531:229a-28: dngos grub rab tu ster ba dang /
T02D2531:229a-33: dbang ldan gyi phyogs rnams gzhol bar gyur pa de nas dpal dang bde bar byed par 'gyur ro //
T02D2531:229a-34: gang la yang ro ldan byang phyogs kyi chal rdzing
T02D2531:229a-35: bu mchog la me tog dkar po dang dmar po
T02D2531:229a-36: dang / padma'i tshogs kyis brgyan pa /
T02D2531:229a-37: autpala sngon po shin tu mang po dang ku mu ta dang /
T02D2531:229a-38: dri bzangs la sogs pa'i me tog rnams kyis 'khrigs pa /
T02D2531:229a-39: khyad par du 'phags pa sna tshogs pa'i bya'i tshogs kyis gang ba /
T02D2531:229a-40: nya dang rus sbal la sogs pas yongs su gang ba /
T02D2531:229a-41: rtag tu rtsva sngon po ldan pa'o zhes so //
T02D2531:229a-42: shar phyogs kyi cha la aa mra dang /
T02D2531:229a-44: ka dam pa'i ljon shing yod pa'o //
T02D2531:229a-45: de la de bzhin du bar du dz'a ba bandu
T02D2531:229a-46: k'a ma la sogs pa'i me tog shing rje snyed
T02D2531:229a-47: pa zhes so // de bzhin du lho phyogs su skyes bu n'a ga dang /
T02D2531:229b-0: @229b khyad par du ba ku la'i shing yod pa'o //
T02D2531:229b-1: de'i bar du dz'a ti dang /
T02D2531:229b-4: dri bzang po'i shing rnams so //
T02D2531:229b-5: me tog dkar po'i shing rje snyed pa rnams rab tu shis so //
T02D2531:229b-6: de bzhin du nub phyogs su aa shvattha dang /
T02D2531:229b-9: pa na sa'i shing rnams yod pa 'o ma can
T02D2531:229b-10: gyi shing ji snyed pa de rnams thams cad nub
T02D2531:229b-11: kyi phyogs su rab tu shis so //
T02D2531:229b-12: de'i bar du me tog nag po'i shing rnams shis so //
T02D2531:229b-13: gzhan yang spyir pi wang dang /
T02D2531:229b-16: rnga'i sgra dang ldan pa ni phun sum tshogs par byed pa'i sa gzhi'o //
T02D2531:229b-17: bye brag tu rigs dang mthun pa sna tshogs pas gang ba gzung ngo //
T02D2531:229b-19: kha dog dkar po dang zho dang 'o ma dang /
T02D2531:229b-20: mar la sogs pa dri zhim po dang /
T02D2531:229b-21: ro mngar ba rnams ni bram ze rnams kyi 'os so //
T02D2531:229b-22: kha dog dmar ba dang sna ma'i me tog dang /
T02D2531:229b-26: n'a ga ge sar la sogs pa'i dri rnams dang /
T02D2531:229b-27: rob skab ni rgyal rigs rnams kyi'o //
T02D2531:229b-28: kha dog ser po dang chang dang glang po'i chang
T02D2531:229b-29: gi dri rnams dang ro skyur ba ni rje'u rigs
T02D2531:229b-30: rnams kyi'o // kha dog nag po dang dri med pa dang ro tsha ba dang /
T02D2531:229b-31: kha ba ni dmangs rigs rnams kyi'o ;
T02D2531:229b-32: / sa khru gang tshad tsam brkos nas de yis de bzhin du dgang bar bya ste /
T02D2531:229b-33: dma' ba dang lhag pa dang mnyam pa gang du
T02D2531:229b-34: gnas pa de'i dman pa dang mchog dang bar ma
T02D2531:229b-35: rnams so // yang na khru do'i tshad gru bzhir
T02D2531:229b-36: dong bkros te de'i dbus su mandala byas nas shar
T02D2531:229b-37: gyi phyogs su me tog dkar po gzhag par bya'o
T02D2531:229b-38: rnams so // // de bzhin du nub dang byang
T02D2531:229b-39: dang gshin rje'i phyogs su dmar po dang sngon po
T02D2531:229b-40: dang ser po'i me tog rnams gzhag par bya ste
T02D2531:229b-41: rnams so // // / gang ma skabs pa de ni de'i 'os su 'gyur ro //
T02D2531:229b-42: de la de bzhin du dong de'i shar la sogs
T02D2531:229b-43: pa'i phyogs su bum pa so ma btang ba'i steng
T02D2531:229b-44: du so btang ba'i kham phor rnams su dkar po
T02D2531:229b-45: la sogs pa'i rim pas ba'i mar gyis mar me
T02D2531:229b-46: rab tu spar nas yongs su brtag par bya'o //
T02D2531:229b-47: de la dkar po la sogs pa'i rim pas gang
T02D2531:229b-48: rab tu 'bar ba de'i sa de bram ze la
T02D2531:230a-0: de bzhin du dmar po dang ser po @230a * //
T02D2531:230a-1: dang nag po rnams go rims ji lta ba bzhin
T02D2531:230a-2: du rgyal rigs dang rje'u rigs dang dmangs rigs kyi
T02D2531:230a-4: de bzhin du ku sha dang sha ra dang au
T02D2531:230a-5: shi ra dang d'ur ba rnams gang mang ba'i sa
T02D2531:230a-6: ni go rims bzhin du bram ze la sogs pa
T02D2531:230a-8: kha cig gi 'dod pas byang na gtsang po chen po 'bab pa'i 'gram du'o zhes so //
T02D2531:230a-9: kha cig gi 'dod pas lho phyogs na 'bab pa'i
T02D2531:230a-10: 'gram du grong khyer la sogs pa'i gzhi'o zhes so
T02D2531:230a-11: de bzhin du ji skad bshad pa'i mtshan nyid dang
T02D2531:230a-12: ldan pa'i sa gzhir ma gyur na ji ltar rnyed
T02D2531:230a-13: pa'i sa gzhi rnam par sbyangs pas rang gi rigs
T02D2531:230a-14: bsgrub par byas nas yongs su gzung bar bya'o //
T02D2531:230a-15: gang du gtsug lag khang la sogs pa bzhengs par 'dod pa'i sa la /
T02D2531:230a-16: de bzhin dus sa gzhi ba'i lci ba las ba
T02D2531:230a-17: lang gi ko pa'i tshad tsam du grva bzhi pa'i
T02D2531:230a-18: mandala byas te dang po'i thun la mchod pa sngon
T02D2531:230a-19: du 'gro bas ting nge 'dzin gyi rnal 'byor dang
T02D2531:230a-20: ldan pas slob dpon mnyam par gzhag ste /
T02D2531:230a-21: der dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa byas nas /
T02D2531:230a-22: phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten skyong ba la
T02D2531:230a-23: sogs pa rnams la dpung pa bzang po'i tshigs su
T02D2531:230a-24: bcad pas mnyes par byas te /
T02D2531:230a-25: pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te
T02D2531:230a-26: thal mo sbyar nas lha la sogs pa rnams la
T02D2531:230a-27: gzhi ji snyed pa 'di stsal du gsol zhes tshigs
T02D2531:230a-28: su bcad pa 'dis zhu bar bya'o //
T02D2531:230a-29: khams gsum sa gzhi gang rnams la //
T02D2531:230a-30: chen po'i chen po gnas gyur pa //
T02D2531:230a-31: lha dang klu dang dri za dang //
T02D2531:230a-32: gnod sbyin lha ma yin la sogs //
T02D2531:230a-33: sems can kun gyi don bsgrub phyir //
T02D2531:230a-34: khyed rnams bdag la gnang bar mdzod //
T02D2531:230a-35: sa gzhi bzang po'i cha 'di ru //
T02D2531:230a-36: phun tshogs gtsug lag khang gyur pa //
T02D2531:230a-37: grags ba'i gzhi ru gyur ba dang //
T02D2531:230a-38: lus can kun gyi 'tsho phyir dang //
T02D2531:230a-39: thos bsam la sogs spel ba dang //
T02D2531:230a-40: dam pa'i chos ni rab bsgrub phyir //
T02D2531:230a-41: mchod rten la sogs bshad ba rnams //
T02D2531:230a-42: gang dang gang gis yid 'dod la //
T02D2531:230a-43: 'di yi nyes legs rnam dag phyir //
T02D2531:230a-44: bdag ni che ge mo zhes bgyi //
T02D2531:230a-45: snyan pa'i grags pa bskyed par bya //
T02D2531:230b-0: khyed rnams ko long mi 'gyur @230b na ;
T02D2531:230b-1: / bdag la rmi lam la sogs brtag / dge ba'i sa gzhi bdag la stsol //
T02D2531:230b-2: zhes pa 'di lan gsum brjod par bya'o //
T02D2531:230b-3: de nas langs nas byang phyogs su phyin nas slob dpon lhor zhal mngon par phyogs te /
T02D2531:230b-4: mdun du sa'i rang bzhin gyi snod du zla ba
T02D2531:230b-5: phyed pa'i rnam pa'i thab khung yongs su brtag par
T02D2531:230b-7: thal ba la sogs pa ji ltar rnyed pa'i khu bas nye bar byugs te /
T02D2531:230b-8: dur khrod kyi sol ba'i phye ma'i rdul tshon gdab
T02D2531:230b-9: ste me tog sngon po gcal du dgram par bya'o
T02D2531:230b-10: // 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i nga
T02D2531:230b-11: rgyal byas nas mdun du lho phyogs kyi cha la
T02D2531:230b-12: me tog sngon po'i tshogs 'phangs te mchod yon gyi
T02D2531:230b-13: dung gi snod gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2531:230b-19: ro bsregs pa'i thal ba dang /
T02D2531:230b-20: ras bal gyi snying po dang /
T02D2531:230b-23: mi'i rus pa'i phye ma dang /
T02D2531:230b-24: nim pa'i lo ma la sogs pa rnams dang /
T02D2531:230b-25: zhag dang smyo byed kyi lo ma'i khu ba bsres te nim pa dang /
T02D2531:230b-30: kha ba'i shing gi rtsa ba'i cha las skyes pa rnams bzhag ste dug dang /
T02D2531:230b-32: mar khu bsres la rtse gnyis bcug pa'i yam shing ngo //
T02D2531:230b-34: nas dang ku sha dang me tog dang /
T02D2531:230b-41: tsher ma can gyi shing skam po la lcags dang /
T02D2531:230b-45: gtum po'i khyim nas byung ba'i me la me rab tu sbar bar bya'o //
T02D2531:230b-46: de la yang me 'bar ba'i dbus su h'um sngon
T02D2531:230b-47: po las yang dag par byung pa kha dog sngon
T02D2531:230b-48: po gos sngon po can rgyan gyis brgyan pa khro
T02D2531:230b-49: zhing 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs can zhal mche ba
T02D2531:230b-50: gtsigs pa skra dmar ser gyen du 'khyil ba mig
T02D2531:230b-51: gcig 'dzum zhing lta ba'i spyan gsum dang bzhin khro
T02D2531:230b-53: phyag g-yas na ral gri dang dbyug pa 'dzin pa /
T02D2531:231a-2: de lta bur gyur pa'i me'i khro bo bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2531:231a-3: de dang mtshungs pa'i ye shes kyi me lha sbyan
T02D2531:231a-4: drangs la mchod yon phul nas mchod pa byas la
T02D2531:231a-5: dam tshig gi me gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2531:231a-6: de'i rjes su aom k'i li k'i la badzra sarba bighn'am k'i la ya h'um phat ;
T02D2531:231a-7: 'dis bgegs thams cad la phur bus gdab par bya'o //
T02D2531:231a-8: aom aa mri ta kunda li /
T02D2531:231a-16: bi spho ta ya bi spho ta ya /
T02D2531:231a-17: sarba bighn'am bi n'a ya k'a n'am /
T02D2531:231a-18: ma h'a ga na pa ti dz'i bi t'anta ka r'a ya h'um h'um phat /
T02D2531:231a-19: 'dis bgegs thams cad gsad par bya'o //
T02D2531:231a-20: aom badzra yaksha sarba p'a pam kh'a da ya h'um phat /
T02D2531:231a-21: 'dis sdig pa thams cad bza' bar bya'o //
T02D2531:231a-22: de nas me la mar gyi dgang blugs gsum dbul lo //
T02D2531:231a-23: lag ba bus mo'i phyi ngos su byas pas so //
T02D2531:231a-24: aom kro dha aagna ye dza hi kro dha ya h'um phat /
T02D2531:231a-25: sngags 'dis sreg rdzas thams cad sbyin par bya'o //
T02D2531:231a-26: de nas me la zhal bsil phul nas de'i snying gar bgegs mthar byed bltas te /
T02D2531:231a-27: ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs la mchod yon la sogs pa phul la /
T02D2531:231a-28: dam tshig sems dpa' nang du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2531:231a-29: de nas aom a'a: bi ghn'am nta kri ta sarba p'a bam da ha na h'um /
T02D2531:231a-30: sngags 'dis sngon bzhin du sreg rdzas sbyin par bya'o //
T02D2531:231a-31: dgang blugs gang bar phul nas gshegs su gsol lo //
T02D2531:231a-32: lhag ma rnams ni sngon ma bzhin du sbyin par bya'o //
T02D2531:231a-33: de nas zhal bsil la sogs pa phul nas /
T02D2531:231a-34: bzod par gsol zhing gshegs su gsol lo //
T02D2531:231a-35: de nas langs nas sa phyogs gtsang sar mgo lhor phyogs te nyal bar bya'o //
T02D2531:231a-36: de la rang gi kha la lag pa g-yon pas dgab par bya ste /
T02D2531:231a-37: sngags 'di lan gsum mam bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so //
T02D2531:231a-38: aom mu tsi li sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:231a-39: aom mo ha ni sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:231a-40: aom dam t'a li sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:231a-41: rmi lam bzang ngan gyi mtshan ma brtag par bya'o //

T02D2531:231a-43: de 'dir 'chad par 'gyur ba'i cho gas stong phrag
T02D2531:231a-44: nyi shu'i sbyin sreg gis grol bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2531:231a-45: thams cad la 'bum phrag gcig ste mdor bsdus nas bshad do //
T02D2531:231b-0: de nas bgegs med pa'i sa gzhi la snga @231b

T02D2531:231b-48: 'od zer gyi phreng ba la ral pa dang cod

T02D2531:232b-16: na rje'u rigs kyi rus pa'i sel lo //

T02D2531:232b-23: chad pa dang nor zad pa'i nyes pa rnams skye

T02D2531:232b-33: aom sarba p'a pam da ha na badzra sarba p'a pam da ha sv'a h'a /

T02D2531:233a-0: par bya'o // yang gang du rus pa yod pa der mar me rdul gyis nye @233a * //

T02D2531:233a-4: mchod nas gdug pa can gyis nye bar bsgyur ba

T02D2531:233a-12: pa mig gsum pa g-yo ba'i bdag nyid can ram

T02D2531:233a-16: spyi blugs kyis mtshan pa'i lag pa bzhi dang ldan pa nag po dang /
T02D2531:233a-17: dmar mo 'dres ma thal ba'i rdul gyis lus la
T02D2531:233a-18: gos pa drag po rlung gi me lha bsgom par

T02D2531:233a-23: rma bya'i gtsug phud rnams tsha ba'i mar khu dang
T02D2531:233a-24: bsres te gzhan til la sogs pa'i sres rdzas kyis
T02D2531:233a-25: sbyin sreg bya'o // aom ma ru ta aagna ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:233a-26: sngags 'dis gdug pa can skrod pa'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D2531:233a-27: de'i rjes su langs te nyal bar bya'o //
T02D2531:233a-28: de nas slob dpon dge ba'i nyi ma gnyis pa
T02D2531:233a-29: la rang gi yi dam lha'i rnal 'byor byas nas
T02D2531:233a-30: gtsug lag khang la sogs pa'i sa gzhi la zhing
T02D2531:233a-31: skyong la sogs pa rnams la gtor ma dang nyer
T02D2531:233a-32: spyod la sogs pa phul nas zhu bar bya'o //
T02D2531:233a-33: skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D2531:233a-34: spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par gyi //
T02D2531:233a-35: sa dang pha rol phyin rnams la //
T02D2531:233a-36: lha mo khyod ni dpang du 'gyur //
T02D2531:233a-37: skyob pa sh'akya seng ge yis //
T02D2531:233a-38: ji ltar bdud kyi dpung bcom pa //
T02D2531:233a-39: de ltar bdag gis bdud kyi dpung //
T02D2531:233a-40: bcom nas gtsug lag khang sogs bgyi //

T02D2531:233a-43: de la ji ltar lus kyi gnas la sel yod
T02D2531:233a-44: na skyes bu rnams kyi zug rdur byed pa de
T02D2531:233b-0: bzhin du khang sa gang zhig la @233b sel yod
T02D2531:233b-1: na / de la gnas pa'i skyes bu rnams la mi 'dod pa'i 'bras bu ster bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2531:233b-2: khyim gang la sel yod pa der lha dang gnyis skyes gnas kyang mchod par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D2531:233b-3: bram ze dang rgyal rigs dang rje'u rigs dang /
T02D2531:233b-4: dmangs rigs rnams kyang 'dod pa che ba dang ;

T02D2531:233b-17: gyi rnam pa rnams nye bar skyed par byed do

T02D2531:233b-19: mi rus spyi rnams kyis ni bdag po nyams pa dang /

T02D2531:233b-30: myur 'gro'i rus pas ni ba lang gi rigs nyams par 'gyur ro //
T02D2531:233b-31: ra'i rus pa rnams kyis kyang ngo //

T02D2531:233b-34: stag gi rus pas ni 'tshe ba dang dgra'i 'jigs par bshad do ;

T02D2531:233b-36: rdul gyis ni gzhan du 'khyams par byed do //

T02D2531:233b-38: phag gi rus pas ni nad du byed do //
T02D2531:233b-39: ra gan gyis nor nyams par byed do //
T02D2531:234a-1: dang srin po'i rus pa rnams kyis 'chi'o //
T02D2531:234a-2: byi ba'i thod pas nor dang 'bru rnam par nyams par byed do //
T02D2531:234a-3: sbre mo dang g-yi dag gi rus pas gnyen rnams dang 'khon par byed do //
T02D2531:234a-4: sbrul gyi rus pas stobs dang phun sum tshogs pa nyams par 'gyur ro //
T02D2531:234a-5: lug gi rus pas tshe thung ba'o //
T02D2531:234a-7: rdo yis 'jigs pa dang sems g-yeng bar byed do //
T02D2531:234a-9: lo ma skam pos gzhan gyi bran du 'gyur ro //
T02D2531:234a-11: mi'i thod pas ni bu dang gnyen rnams dang bral bar byed do //
T02D2531:234a-12: shing skam pos dbul por 'gyur ro //

T02D2531:234a-15: mgrin pa'i rus pas 'chi bar byed do //
T02D2531:234a-16: lcags sgrog gis chung ma dang lhan cig pa dang 'bral bar byed do //

T02D2531:234a-18: sog pas nor nyams par byed do //
T02D2531:234a-19: dbung pas pha rol gyis brnyas par byed do //
T02D2531:234a-20: rdza'i snod chag pos bu dang bral bar byed do //
T02D2531:234a-21: khra'i rkang pas nor dang bud med nyams par byed do //
T02D2531:234a-22: gyo dum gyis sdug bsngal dang mig nad du yang 'gyur ro //
T02D2531:234a-23: dud 'gro'i rus pas mya ngan ster ro //
T02D2531:234a-24: phyugs kyi rus pas ltogs pa dang skom pa ster ro //
T02D2531:234a-25: k'a she ru ka'i rus pas phag dang mi dag zhe sdang dang nad du yang byed do //
T02D2531:234a-26: zha nyes ni rked nad do //
T02D2531:234a-27: lcags gsum gyi sel gyis dga' ba nyams par byed do //
T02D2531:234a-28: brla'i rus pas bud med ngan du spyod par 'gyur ro //
T02D2531:234a-29: byin pa'i rus pas 'chi ba ster ro //
T02D2531:234a-30: rus pa tshig pos 'ching bar byed do //
T02D2531:234a-31: 'dreg mkhan gyi snod kyis pha rol gyis 'tshe zhing sdug bsngal dang dbul por 'gyur ro //

T02D2531:234a-36: shal ma lis 'ching bar byed do //
T02D2531:234a-37: sor gdub dang rma bya bris pas mya ngan dang 'dod pa nyams pa rab tu ster ro //
T02D2531:234a-38: 'khar bas ni nor nyams par byed do//
T02D2531:234b-0: @234b lhang tsher dang lham gyis ngan pa rab tu ster ro //
T02D2531:234b-1: rtsa ba'i rus pas nor nyams par byed do //
T02D2531:234b-2: ta lu ka'i rus pas sems rmongs par byed do //
T02D2531:234b-3: phrag pa dang 'gram pa'i rus pas 'chi ba dang nor nyams pa'o //

T02D2531:238a-28: du dbang phyug chen po dang gtsug tor 'khor los
T02D2531:238a-29: sgyur ba dang / tshangs pa dang /
T02D2531:238a-34: rdo rje 'bar ba'i nyi ma rnams so //
T02D2531:238a-35: de bzhin du dang po me nas re mig brgyad la me dang /
T02D2531:238a-40: gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang /
T02D2531:238a-43: de bzhin du dang po bden bral nas re mig brgyad la mtshan mo spyod pa dang /
T02D2531:238a-51: de bzhin du dang po rlung nas re mig brgyad la rlung dang /
T02D2531:238a-73: dkar po ma yin pa dang /
T02D2531:238b-14: nag po'i kha dog rnams so //
T02D2531:238b-15: de nas rdo rje h'um mdzad dang /
T02D2531:238b-17: gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang /
T02D2531:238b-25: gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba ji snyed pa mchod par bya'o //
T02D2531:238b-26: de'i rjes su nyi ma la sogs pa rnams so //
T02D2531:238b-27: de'i phyi nas brgya byin la sogs pa rnams so //
T02D2531:238b-28: de la myur du sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la 'jigs byed dang /
T02D2531:238b-29: dus mtshan mo g-yas brkyang gi zhabs kyis mnan pa
T02D2531:238b-30: khro bo bskal ba'i me 'bar ba ltar gsal ba
T02D2531:238b-31: bzhin mi sdug pa mche ba gtsigs pa 'jigs shing

T02D2531:238b-33: spyan gsum mnga' ba thod pa lngas dbu la brgyan
T02D2531:238b-34: pa mgo bo rlon pa'i phreng ba dang ldan pa'o
T02D2531:238b-35: // phyag rgya drug dang ldan pa klu brgyad kyi rgyan gyis spras pa /

T02D2531:238b-43: rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug pa dang /

T02D2531:238b-61: aom p'a t'a l'a ya na ma: sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:239a-1: aushn'i sha tsa kra bi rta ne na ma: sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:239a-2: rta bdun gyi shang rti la nyi ma'o //
T02D2531:239a-3: phyag g-yas na padma dang g-yon na padma la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2531:239a-4: ngang pa'i steng du zla ba'o //

T02D2531:239a-7: g-yas na rdo rje g-yon na mi bzung nas za ba'o //
T02D2531:239a-13: padma la pa ba sangs so //
T02D2531:239a-14: bgrang phreng dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o //

T02D2531:239a-20: // mjug rings ni khro bo padma la gnas pa ral gri dang zhags pa 'dzin pa'o //

T02D2531:239a-22: aom shi tam sha bee na ma: sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:239a-23: aom rakt'am ga ku m'a r'a ya na ma: sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:239a-24: aom bu dh'a ya na ma: sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:239a-25: aom bho g'a sya d'a ya na ma: sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:239a-26: aom aa su ra autta m'a ya na ma: sv'a h'a /

T02D2531:239a-28: aom aa mri ta pri y'a na ma: sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:239a-29: aom dzyo ti ke ta be na ma:sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:239a-30: de nas dbang po ni sa srung gi bu la
T02D2531:239a-31: zhon pa g-yas na rdo rje dang g-yon na gshol
T02D2531:239a-32: lo // gshin rje ni ma he la gnas pa dbyug pa dang mdung 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2531:239a-33: chu bdag ni chu srin la zhon pa gdengs ka bdun dang ldan pa sprul dang dung 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2531:239a-34: lus ngan po ni mi la zhon pa lcags kyu dang dbyug pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2531:239a-35: me ni ra la zhon pa dgang gzar dang spyi blugs thogs pa'o //
T02D2531:239a-36: srin po'i bdag po ni ro la zhon pa ral gri dang phub thogs pa /
T02D2531:239a-37: rlung ni ri dags la zhon pa rlung gi ba dan thogs pa'o //
T02D2531:239a-38: dbang ldan ni khyu mchog la zhon pa rtse gsum dang thod pa thogs pa'o //
T02D2531:239a-39: lha ma yin ni 'bol stan la gnas pa ral gri dang phub thogs pa /
T02D2531:239a-40: klu ni padma la gnas pa la lag pa thal mo sbyar ba'o //
T02D2531:239a-41: sa ni padma la gnas pa bdud rtsi'i bum pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2531:239a-42: tshangs pa ni ngang pa la gnas pa gdong bzhi pa bgrang phreng dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2531:239a-43: aom aa khanda l'a ya na ma: sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:239a-44: aom ya m'a ya na ma: sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:239a-45: aom ba ru n'a ya na ma: sv'a h'a /

T02D2531:239b-1: aom aagna ye na ma: sv'a h'a /

T02D2531:239b-3: aom b'a ya be na ma: sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:239b-4: aom a'i sha n'a ya na ma: sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:239b-5: aom aa su r'a ya na ma: sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:239b-6: aom n'a g'a ya na ma: sv'a h'a /

T02D2531:239b-8: aom brahma ne na ma: sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:239b-9: de'i rjes su thang shing dang /
T02D2531:239b-12: tsam pa ka la sogs pa dri zhim po ro bska ba'i shing ya ma shing ngo //
T02D2531:239b-13: rje'u rigs kyi me la 'dod pa'i me rab tu
T02D2531:239b-14: sbar te nyi ma sar pa 'dra ba zhal gcig
T02D2531:239b-15: spyan gsum pa zhags pa dang lcags kyu dang dbyug
T02D2531:239b-16: pa dang / spyi blugs 'dzin pa ral ba'i tshogs mang pos spyi bor nye bar brgyan pa /
T02D2531:239b-17: skye bo dpag tu med pa'i bde ba nye bar
T02D2531:239b-18: 'bebs par byed pa hr'i: yig las yang dag par
T02D2531:239b-19: rab tu byung ba ni 'dod pa'i zhes so //
T02D2531:239b-20: ye shes kyi me spyan drangs nas mchod yon phul nas /
T02D2531:239b-21: dam tshig gi me la bzhugs par bya'o //
T02D2531:239b-27: pa l'a sha la sogs pa'i yam shing ngo //
T02D2531:239b-30: dri zhim po'i me tog la sogs pa dang /
T02D2531:239b-31: til la sogs pa'i 'bru rnams kyis sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D2531:239b-32: sngags ni aom k'a m'a gna ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:239b-33: de nas khang pa thams cad kyi lha rnams yid kyis nam mkha' la bzhugs su gsol lo //
T02D2531:239b-34: de la yang las byed pa ni rdo rje gnod
T02D2531:239b-35: sbyin gyi rnam pa lag na rdo rjes mtshan pa'i
T02D2531:239b-36: tog tse thogs pa h'um mdzad rdzogs pa'i shin tu
T02D2531:239b-38: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sngags kyis byin gyis brlab par bya'o ;
T02D2531:239b-39: / tshim par byas nas yang dbang po dang nor
T02D2531:239b-40: gyi dbang phyug gi phyogs su gdong phyogs te lag
T02D2531:239b-41: pa g-yon pas phyi nas bzung ste mya ngan dang
T02D2531:239b-42: mun pa thams cad 'joms pa'i blo gros kyi re
T02D2531:239b-43: mig tu brko ste kham bzhi brko bar bya'o //
T02D2531:239b-44: sngags ni aom gh'a ta ya sarba p'a pam n'a sh'a ya h'um h'um phat ;
T02D2531:239b-45: de'i sa gser la sogs pa'i snod du blangs te
T02D2531:239b-46: zhi ba la gtor ma dang bcas te me'i phyogs

T02D2531:239b-49: de nas rma drug gdod par bya'o //
T02D2531:240a-1: btod pa la sogs pa nas phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad du las byed pas brko bar bya'o //
T02D2531:240a-2: pus nub tsam sbyang bar bya'o //

T02D2531:240a-8: khang sa la thig legs par btab nas 'bad pas lto 'phye brtag par bya'o //
T02D2531:240a-9: pus nub tsam du sbyangs pa'i sa gzhi'i lho phyogs

T02D2531:240a-11: gi lhag pa'i lha'i rnal 'byor byas te /

T02D2531:240a-13: glang rmo ba'i skyes bu ni rdo rje las kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D2531:240a-14: aom badzra karma kam zhes pa 'dis byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D2531:240a-15: de bzhin du glang gcig ni zhang po ste rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi rang bzhin no //
T02D2531:240a-16: aom badzra yaksha h'um zhes pa 'dis byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D2531:240a-17: de bzhin du glang de'i sring mo'i bu ni rdo rje srung ba'i rang bzhin no //
T02D2531:240a-18: aom badzra raksha h'um zhes pas byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D2531:240a-19: de bzhin du gser gyi gshol ni rdo rje mtshams kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D2531:240a-20: aom badzra sandhi bam zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D2531:240a-21: de nas dbang ldan du kha phyogs te bzhugs nas mchod pa la sogs pa byas te /
T02D2531:240a-22: nas btab nas sa gzhi la gser gyi gshol gyis khyu mchog de dag gis rmo bar bya'o //
T02D2531:240a-23: de nas nya gro dha dang /
T02D2531:240a-25: tsam pa ka la sogs pa'i shing skam pos dge
T02D2531:240a-26: 'dun gyi tshang bang nas me blangs nas me rab
T02D2531:240a-28: sems can thams cad la byams pa dang bde bas
T02D2531:240a-29: gang bar bya ba'i sems dang phun sum tshogs pa
T02D2531:240a-30: dang / stobs dang nad med pa dang /

T02D2531:240b-0: / h'um yig @240b ser po las yang dag par

T02D2531:240b-3: / par bya'o // zhal bsil ba la sogs pa

T02D2531:240b-5: / par bya'o // // sa ma'i yam shing dang rag chung dang /
T02D2531:240b-9: karni ka la sogs pa'i me tog ser po dang /
T02D2531:240b-10: zho dang bu ram gyi zan dang /
T02D2531:240b-12: ka ra dang 'bras la sogs pa'i rim pas sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D2531:240b-13: aom ma hendra aagna ye sv'a h'a /

T02D2531:240b-15: na mchog dang 'bring dang dman pa'i sa gzhir shes
T02D2531:240b-16: par bya'o // gang skyes pa'i nas sngon po'i gnas skabs su lha rnams kyi longs spyod du bya'o //

T02D2531:240b-18: dang ldan pa'i sngags pas dz'am gu l'i'i mchod pa
T02D2531:240b-20: de nas dbang ldan gyi phyogs kyi char rgyar khru
T02D2531:240b-21: do gru bzhi pa de'i phyed 'og tu dong brko
T02D2531:240b-22: bar bya'o // yang de'i dbang ldan gyi phyi rol du de'i phyed zlum por dong bru bar bya'o //
T02D2531:240b-23: de gnyis ka'i sa la ba lang gi lci bas byug par bya'o //
T02D2531:240b-24: de la dong gru bzhi par lo ma can gyi
T02D2531:240b-25: shing la bcug nas bum pa'i chus dgang bar bya'o
T02D2531:240b-26: // dz'am las skyes pa'i rdo rje dz'am gu l'i ser mo ser po dang /
T02D2531:240b-27: nag po dang dkar po'i rtsa ba dang /
T02D2531:240b-28: g-yas dang g-yon gyi zhal gsum mo //
T02D2531:240b-29: gdengs ka rgyas pa bdun dang ldan pa'i rin po

T02D2531:240b-33: g-yon pa dag na gzhu dang zhags pa dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub dang /
T02D2531:240b-35: gos sna tshogs dang klu'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /

T02D2531:240b-37: dz'am gu l'i bsgoms te ye shes sems dpa' spyan
T02D2531:240b-38: drangs te mchod yon la sogs pa phul nas de
T02D2531:240b-39: bzhin du zhu bar bsam mo //
T02D2531:241a-11: mchod yon la sogs pa dbul lo //
T02D2531:241a-12: de nas de'i nye ba ru 'o ma dang chus
T02D2531:241a-13: yongs su gang ba'i chu snod rtags kyis mtshan pa
T02D2531:241a-14: gzhag par bya'o // de la yang bcom ldan 'das
T02D2531:241a-15: ma rnam par bsgoms te mchod pa byas nas yi
T02D2531:241a-16: ge gcig pa'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlab par bya'o
T02D2531:241a-17: gzhag par bya'o // // aom a'a: hr'i: h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:241a-19: ji ltar dong gru bzhi khengs pa dang /
T02D2531:241a-20: yur ba byas te des dong zlum po dgang bar bya'o //
T02D2531:241a-21: de la nya lcibs dang nya gson po bcug ste chu g-yas phyogs su 'khor ram blta bar bya'o //
T02D2531:241a-22: de nas yid kyis dong gi lha mo bteg ste chu snod la rab tu gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2531:241a-23: chu snod kyang dz'am gu li'i gnas su gzhag par bya'o //

T02D2531:241a-27: sna ma'i me tog dang bcas pas mchod par bya'o //
T02D2531:241a-28: de nas mtshan mo'i thun dang po la rang gi
T02D2531:241a-29: lhag pa'i lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas slob dpon
T02D2531:241a-30: rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa la
T02D2531:241a-31: byang phyogs kyi sgrub pa pos rdo rje dril bu
T02D2531:241a-32: bzung nas gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02D2531:241a-33: de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba //
T02D2531:241a-34: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas //
T02D2531:241a-35: mtshan nyid thams cad yongs rdzogs pa //
T02D2531:241a-36: gtso bo'i gtsug lag khang du brtag / de nas
T02D2531:241a-37: h'um las skyes pa'i rdo rje'i ljags bla mas bsams
T02D2531:241a-38: nas phyogs rnams kun na bzhugs pa yi //
T02D2531:241a-39: sangs rgyas rnams ni bdag la dgongs //
T02D2531:241a-40: 'dir bdag bsam pa dge ba yis //
T02D2531:241a-41: lha khang gtsug lag khang gnas bya //
T02D2531:241a-42: sangs rgyas la sogs kun byon nas ;
T02D2531:241a-43: / dngos grub rnams ni bdag la stsol //
T02D2531:241a-44: zhes pas sangs rgyas la sogs pa rnams la bdag gis zhu bar bya'o //
T02D2531:241a-45: bgegs dang bdud thams cad nye bar bskrad par bya ste /
T02D2531:241a-46: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i go rims kyi rim pas so //
T02D2531:241a-47: go rims nges pa'i bar du cho ga ji lta
T02D2531:241b-0: @241b bas mandala zlum po byas te nyer spyod lnga'i
T02D2531:241b-1: mchod pa rnams kyis yongs su mchod de bum pa
T02D2531:241b-3: de lnga bcu rtsa gsum dang /
T02D2531:241b-6: lnga bcu rtsa gsum gyi phyogs la dkyil 'khor pa thams cad kyis so so'i re re'o //
T02D2531:241b-7: las thams cad pa'i bum pa gcig ste lnga bcu rtsa bzhi'o //
T02D2531:241b-8: bcu gcig gi phyogs la rnam par snang mdzad chen
T02D2531:241b-9: po dang sems ma rdo rje la sogs pa lnga
T02D2531:241b-11: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa lnga rnams kyi gcig go //
T02D2531:241b-12: rin chen 'byung ldan la sogs pa lnga rnams kyi gcig go //
T02D2531:241b-13: 'od dpag med la sogs pa lnga rnams kyi gcig go //
T02D2531:241b-14: don yod grub pa la sogs pa lnga rnams kyi gcig go //
T02D2531:241b-15: sgeg mo la sogs pa bzhi po rnams kyi gcig go //
T02D2531:241b-16: bdug spos ma la sogs pa bzhi po rnams kyi gcig go //
T02D2531:241b-17: rdo rje lcags kyu dang byams pa la sogs pa lnga po rnams kyi gcig go ;
T02D2531:241b-19: spos kyi glang po la sogs pa lnga rnams kyi gcig go //
T02D2531:241b-20: rdo rje rgyas pa dang bdud rtsi 'od la sogs pa lnga rnams kyi gcig go //
T02D2531:241b-22: rdo rje snying po la sogs pa lnga rnams kyi gcig go //

T02D2531:241b-24: lnga'i phyogs la rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i
T02D2531:241b-25: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga dang sems ma rdo rje
T02D2531:241b-26: ma la sogs pa'i lha mo bzhi dang dgu la
T02D2531:241b-27: gcig go // sgeg mo la sogs pa'i lha mo brgyad la gcig go //

T02D2531:241b-30: rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa khro bo bzhi rnams la gcig go //

T02D2531:241b-32: de la las thams cad pa'i mtshan nyid ni lto

T02D2531:242a-10: chos kyi rdo rje ma'i rdo rjes mtshan pa'i padma'o //

T02D2531:242a-12: mi bskyod pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa sngon po'o //
T02D2531:242a-13: rdo rje sems dpa'i rdo rje dkar po'o //
T02D2531:242a-14: rdo rje rgyal po'i rdo rjes mtshan pa'i lcags kyu'o //
T02D2531:242a-15: rdo rje chags pa'i mda' 'gengs pa'o //
T02D2531:242a-16: rdo rje chags pa'i rdo rje dang bcas pa'i phyag

T02D2531:242a-26: rdo rje rgyu'i 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa'o //
T02D2531:242a-27: rdo rje gsung ba'i chos kyi dung ngo //
T02D2531:242a-28: don yod grub pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje'o //
T02D2531:242a-29: rdo rje las kyi de bzhin no //
T02D2531:242a-30: rdo rje srung ba'i rdo rje las byas pa'i go cha'o //
T02D2531:242a-31: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi rdo rjes mtshan pa'i mche ba gzung ngo //
T02D2531:242a-32: rdo rje mtshams kyi rdo rje khu tshur dag gis gzung ba'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa'o //
T02D2531:242a-33: rdo rje sgeg mo'i rdo rje gnyis so //
T02D2531:242a-34: rdo rje phreng ba ma'i rin po che'i phreng ba'o //
T02D2531:242a-35: rdo rje glu ma'i pi wang ngo //
T02D2531:242a-36: rdo rje gar ma'i rdo rje rtse gsum gyis mtshan pa'i lag pa gnyis so //
T02D2531:242a-37: rdo rje bdug spos ma'i pog phor ro //
T02D2531:242a-38: rdo rje me tog ma'i me tog gi snod do //
T02D2531:242a-39: mar me ma'i mar me'i sdong po'o //
T02D2531:242a-40: dri ma'i dri'i dung ser po'o //
T02D2531:242a-41: byams pa'i ya wa ga dang bcas pa'i klu shing gi me tog go //
T02D2531:242b-0: don yod gzigs kyi spyan dang bcas pa'i @242b chu skyes so //
T02D2531:242b-1: ngan song kun 'joms kyi lcags kyu'o //
T02D2531:242b-2: mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad 'joms pa'i blo gros kyi dbyug pa'o //
T02D2531:242b-3: spos kyi glang po'i dung ngo //
T02D2531:242b-5: nam mkha' mdzod kyi padma la gnas pa'i chos kyi mdzod do //
T02D2531:242b-6: ye shes tog gi yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan no //
T02D2531:242b-9: bzang skyong gi 'bar ba dang bcas pa'i rin po che'o //
T02D2531:242b-10: dra ba can gyi 'od kyi rdo rje'i gur ro //
T02D2531:242b-11: rdo rje snying po'i rdo rje dang autpala la sngon po'o //
T02D2531:242b-12: blo gros mi zad pa'i bum pa'o //
T02D2531:242b-13: spobs pa brtsegs pa'i padma la gnas pa'i rin po che brtsegs pa'o //

T02D2531:242b-15: rdo rje lcags kyu'i lcags kyu'o //
T02D2531:242b-16: rdo rje zhags pa'i zhags pa'o //

T02D2531:242b-23: rgyas pa'i lo mas kha brgyan te me tog gi
T02D2531:242b-24: phreng ba dang bcas shing gos zung gis mgul ba
T02D2531:242b-26: dar dang gser las byas pa'i thig le dang /
T02D2531:242b-29: mchod phyir thogs kyis nye bar brgyan par byas la /

T02D2531:242b-39: sa la ma lhung ba'i ba'i lci ba dang /

T02D2531:242b-43: po che sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin gyi bum pa

T02D2531:242b-45: nang du gnas pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2531:242b-46: de'i rjes su rang rang gi sa bon gyi mtshan
T02D2531:242b-47: ma yongs su gyur pa las rang rang gi lha
T02D2531:242b-48: rnams rnam par bsam par bya'o //
T02D2531:243a-0: rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyi lcags kyus ye shes @243a * //
T02D2531:243a-1: sems dpa' spyan drangs te mdun du bltas nas zhabs
T02D2531:243a-2: bsil dang zhal bsil la sogs pa dbul bar bya'o

T02D2531:243a-6: // bya'o ; / mchan ma la dam tshig gi
T02D2531:243a-7: lha dang ye shes kyi lha da gcig tu gyur
T02D2531:243a-8: // bya'o ; par bsam mo // de nas me
T02D2531:243a-9: tog gi phreng ba dang bcas te skud pa lnga
T02D2531:243a-10: rdo rje la bcings te bum pa sa la bzhag

T02D2531:243a-14: shva ra h'um zhes pa ni 'khor lo'i dbang phyug

T02D2531:243a-16: bsngags par bya'o // aom badzra yaksha h'um zhes pa

T02D2531:243a-22: bum pa me tog la sogs pas yang dag par

T02D2531:243a-27: kun khyab srid pa'i rtse mo'i rtse //
T02D2531:243a-28: bde gshegs rgyal ba'i bdag po ste //
T02D2531:243a-29: khams gsum pa yi rgyal po che //
T02D2531:243a-30: rnam par snang mdzad phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2531:243a-31: rdo rje sems dpa' khyod phyag 'tshal //
T02D2531:243a-32: rdo rje rin chen khyod phyag 'tshal //
T02D2531:243a-33: rdo rje chos khyod phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2531:243a-34: rdo rje las khyod phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2531:243a-35: de nas bum pa de rnams nas chu cung zad
T02D2531:243a-36: blangs te las thams cad pa'i bum par blugs so
T02D2531:243a-37: // slob dpon gang zhig rdo rje dbyings la mi
T02D2531:243a-38: spro na de'i rang gi yi dam lha'i spro bas

T02D2531:243a-40: bya ba thams cad byed pa la 'gal ba med

T02D2531:243b-23: rdo rje me tog ma dang /
T02D2531:243b-27: rdo rje chos rnams kyi bum pa bcu gsum mo //

T02D2531:243b-36: rdo rje mar me ma dang /
T02D2531:243b-38: blo gros mi zad pa dang /
T02D2531:243b-40: rdo rje las rnams kyi bum pa bcu gsum mo //

T02D2531:243b-48: las kyi rdo rje ma dang /
T02D2531:243b-54: mi bskyod pa rnams kyi bum pa bcu bzhi rnams so //
T02D2531:243b-55: las thams cad pa'i bum pa ni dbang ldan gyi
T02D2531:243b-56: phyi rol gyi phyogs su bltas nas bum pa'i phreng
T02D2531:243b-57: ba rnams kyi bar du gzhag par bya'o //

T02D2531:243b-60: phyogs su bskor ba lan re byas nas dkyil 'khor
T02D2531:243b-61: gyi 'khor lo'i 'khor lo dang 'od zer gyi phreng
T02D2531:243b-62: ba'i sa'i phyi rol du bum pa rnams gzhag par
T02D2531:244a-1: dgod pa'i dus su shes rab kyi pha rol tu

T02D2531:244a-4: ga pur dang aa ka ru dang sihla la sogs

T02D2531:244a-6: pa rnams kyis kyang dkyil 'khor la mchod par bya'o

T02D2531:244a-24: re mig gsum cu rtsa drug ste //
T02D2531:244a-25: mnyam du khang pa'i sa gzhi la //
T02D2531:244a-26: dbus kyi gnas ni bzhi po la ;

T02D2531:244a-29: re mig bcu gnyis go rims bzhin //

T02D2531:244b-10: rnam par rgyal ba rnams dang por mchod par bya'o //

T02D2531:247b-37: kyi thig gi 'od zer gyi rang bzhin rnams blta'o
T02D2531:247b-38: // aom a'a: sha shva t'a badzra s'u tram me
T02D2531:247b-39: pra yatstsha h'um zhes pa 'dis rnam par snang mdzad
T02D2531:247b-40: chen po la zhu bar bya'o //
T02D2531:247b-41: de bzhin du aom a'a: ratnee sha badzra s'u tram me phra yatstsha h'um /
T02D2531:247b-42: aom a'a: aa mri tee sha s'u tram me pra yatstsha h'um /
T02D2531:247b-43: aom a'a: aa mo ghee sha badzra s'u tram me pra ya tstsha h'um /
T02D2531:247b-44: aom a'a: cittee sha badzra s'u tram me pra yatstsha h'um zhes pa 'dis zhu bar bya'o //
T02D2531:247b-45: de nas dza yig ser po las zla ba dang nyi ma'i rang bzhin gyi mig gnyis so //
T02D2531:247b-46: aom d'i pta dri shti aam ku sha dza: zhes
T02D2531:247b-47: brjod pas mig gnyis rab tu bskyod nas mig gi
T02D2531:247b-48: rdze ma 'bar zhing lta ba'i lcags kyus de bzhin
T02D2531:247b-49: du rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams bskul
T02D2531:248a-0: nas gdan drangs te so so'i kha dog @248a *
T02D2531:248a-1: // de bzhin du gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2531:248a-2: de'i phyir de rnams me long lta bu la sogs pa'i ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin no //
T02D2531:248a-3: me long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs pa so
T02D2531:248a-4: sor re re la ye shes bzhi'i rjes su 'brang
T02D2531:248a-5: nas nyi shu rtsa lnga'i dbye ba rnams su 'gyur
T02D2531:248a-6: ro // de'i rjes su las thams cad pa'i gzugs
T02D2531:248a-7: kyis las kyi slob dpon gyis bzung nas lhan cig
T02D2531:248a-8: tu dang po re re la skud pa lnga lnga'i
T02D2531:248a-10: de'i rjes su de bzhin du bsgril ba'i lnga po thig skud gcig tu bya'o //
T02D2531:248a-11: aom aa n+yo n+yo nu ga t'a: sarba dharma: spa
T02D2531:248a-12: r'a spha r'a nu phra bishta sarba dharm'a: aa tya
T02D2531:248a-13: nt'a nu pra bishta: sarba dha rm'a: aom a'a: h'um
T02D2531:248a-14: / zhes brjod nas bsgril bar bya'o //
T02D2531:248a-15: bsgril ba rab tu btab nas gser la sogs pa'i
T02D2531:248a-16: snod du bzhag nas dri dang me tog dang spos
T02D2531:248a-17: la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod nas las thams cad
T02D2531:248a-18: pa'i sngags kyis bsrung bar bya'o //
T02D2531:248a-19: aom badzra sam ma ya s'u tram m'a ti kra ma h'um /
T02D2531:248a-20: zhes pa 'dis lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas lhag par gnas par bya'o //
T02D2531:248a-21: yang aom sarba sam shodha ni h'um phat /
T02D2531:248a-22: ces pa'i sngags kyi bum pa thams cad kyi chus
T02D2531:248a-23: legs par gtor te me tog gcal du bkram nas
T02D2531:248a-24: nam mkha'i mthil du song ste yid sa lha'i dkyil
T02D2531:248a-25: 'khor la dmigs te mchod yon sngon du phul nas
T02D2531:248a-26: yang dag par mchod par bya'o //
T02D2531:248a-28: rang de'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas byang phyogs kyi
T02D2531:248a-29: sgrub pa po las thams cad pa'i gzugs su rnam
T02D2531:248a-30: par bsam mo // rang dang de'i yang g-yas phyogs
T02D2531:248a-31: dang g-yon gyi mig dag la dzdza yig las skyes
T02D2531:248a-32: pa'i 'od zer ser po la zla ba dang nyi
T02D2531:248a-33: ma bsams nas thig skud g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu
T02D2531:248a-34: tshur gyis bzung ste lte bar gzung bar bya'o //
T02D2531:248a-35: de la yang byang byogs kyi sgrub pa pos de bzhin du thig skud gzung nas /
T02D2531:248a-37: dzdza: dzdza: yi ge gsum gyi byang phyogs kyi sgrub pa po yang dag par bskul nas /
T02D2531:248a-40: yig gsum gyis bkug cing de bzhin du gdong mngon
T02D2531:248a-41: par phyogs te gnas pas nub tu gnas te kha
T02D2531:248a-43: lho phyogs su gnas te kha byang du phyogs pas
T02D2531:248a-44: tshangs pa'i thig gnyis lte ba nas mnyam du bar
T02D2531:248b-0: lag pa g-yas pa rdo rje dang bcas pa'i @248b
T02D2531:248b-1: sor mo dag gis thag skud blangs te se gol
T02D2531:248b-2: gyi sgra dang bcas pas gdab bo //
T02D2531:248b-3: thig gdab pa thams cad du yang ngo //
T02D2531:248b-4: aom badzra s'u tra m'a ti kra ma h'um h'um aom tr'am a'a h'a: zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D2531:248b-5: de'i thig gi sgras nam mkha'i khams thams cad khyab
T02D2531:248b-6: cing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par
T02D2531:248b-7: bskul bar bya'o // de rnams kyang byon te thig skud kyi nang du gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2531:248b-8: 'di'i sgra ni sems can gyi don du 'gyur ba'i dus so //
T02D2531:248b-10: gang gi phyir thams cad du yang slob dpon dang
T02D2531:248b-11: byang phyogs kyi sgrub pa po g-yas skor gyis 'gro
T02D2531:248b-12: bar bya'o // phyogs thams cad kyang mnyam du 'gro bar bya'o //
T02D2531:248b-13: nam mkha'i thig gnyis bzhin dus la tshangs pa'i thig
T02D2531:248b-14: gnyis skud dang bcas pa'i lag pa dag gis gdab
T02D2531:248b-15: par bya'o // de nas takki'i phur bu'i gnas dang
T02D2531:248b-16: rdo rje rnam 'joms kyi phur bu dag la kha
T02D2531:248b-17: mngon par phyogs te shar phyogs kyi thig gdab par
T02D2531:248b-18: par bya'o // bya'o // de'i rjes su rdo rje mthar spyod pa'i phur bu la phyin te /
T02D2531:248b-19: rdo rje gad rgyangs kyis phur bu dang la gdong
T02D2531:248b-20: mngon par phyogs te shar gyi rtsa ba'i thig gdab
T02D2531:248b-21: par bya'o // de nas khro bo stobs po che'i phur bu la phyin te /
T02D2531:248b-22: rin chen gtsug tor gyi phur bu dag la gdong
T02D2531:248b-23: mngon par phyogs te nub phyogs kyi thig gdab par
T02D2531:248b-24: bya'o // de'i rjes su rkang pa bskyod pa'i phur bu'i gnas dang /
T02D2531:248b-25: rdo rje yal ga'i phur bu dag la gdong mngon
T02D2531:248b-26: par phyogs te nub kyi rtsa ba'i thig gdab par
T02D2531:248b-27: bya'o // de nas khro bo chen po rdo rje rab tu gtum po'i phur bu'i gnas dang /
T02D2531:248b-28: mi g-yo ba'i phur bu dag la gdong mngon par phyogs te byang phyogs kyi thig gdab par bya'o //
T02D2531:248b-29: de'i rjes su rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi phur bu'i
T02D2531:248b-30: gnas dang rdo rje 'joms pa'i phur bu dag la
T02D2531:248b-31: gdong mngon par phyogs te byang gi rtsa ba'i thig
T02D2531:248b-32: gdab par bya'o // de nas rdo rje blta bar
T02D2531:248b-33: mi bzod pa'i phur bu la phyin te dbyug pa
T02D2531:248b-34: sngon po'i phur bu dag la gdong phyogs te lho
T02D2531:248b-35: phyogs kyi thig gdab par bya'o //
T02D2531:248b-36: de nas rdo rje gnas lcags kyi phur bu'i gnas
T02D2531:248b-37: dang khro bo chen po sbyang dka' ba'i phur bu
T02D2531:249a-0: dag la gdong mngon du phyogs te lho'i rtsa @249a
T02D2531:249a-2: de nas khro bo chen po rdo rje zhags pa'i
T02D2531:249a-3: phur bu la phyin te khro bo chen po bdud
T02D2531:249a-4: rtsi 'khyil pa'i phur bu dag la gdong mngon par
T02D2531:249a-5: phyogs te gzhogs kyi thig gdab par bya'o //
T02D2531:249a-6: de nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i phur bu la phyin
T02D2531:249a-7: te shes rab mthar byed kyi phur bu dag la
T02D2531:249a-8: gdong mngon par phyogs te gzhogs kyi thig gdab par
T02D2531:249a-9: bya'o // de'i rjes su padma mthar byed kyi phur bu'i gnas dang /
T02D2531:249a-10: rdo rje lcags kyu'i phur bu dag la gdong mngon par phyogs te gzhogs kyi thig gdab par bya'o //
T02D2531:249a-11: de nas gshin rje mthar byed kyi phur bu'i gnas
T02D2531:249a-12: dang rdo rje rgyas pa'i phur bu dag la gdong
T02D2531:249a-13: mngon par phyogs te gzhogs kyi thig gdab bo //
T02D2531:249a-14: thig gdab pa thams cad la so so la g-yas
T02D2531:249a-15: phyogs su bskor ba re re byas nas gdab bo
T02D2531:249a-16: // de nas thig gdab pa'i mthar bden bral gyi
T02D2531:249a-17: mtshams su phyin nas dbang ldan du kha phyogs te
T02D2531:249a-18: gtor ma dang mchod pa sngon du 'gro bas /
T02D2531:249a-19: aom a'a: h'um badzra mu: zhes pas ye shes kyi thig gshegs su gsol te /
T02D2531:249a-20: nam mkha' la gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
T02D2531:249a-21: kyi thugs kar rab tu zhugs te kha dog lnga'i
T02D2531:249a-22: thig skud ji lta bar gnas par bya'o zhes pa
T02D2531:249a-23: ni thig gdab pa'i rim pa'o /
T02D2531:249a-25: // / rtags med dngos grub med de thig skud chad gyur bla ma 'chi //
T02D2531:249a-26: zhes pa'i gsung las mtshan ma rnams ni nye bar mtshon par bya //
T02D2531:249a-27: rtags ni thig skud chad dang du dang thig skud 'gong ba dang /
T02D2531:249a-28: lus la reg dang ming ni yongs su grags la sogs pa rnams /
T02D2531:249a-29: de la thig skud chad na 'di sa slob dpon 'chi'o //
T02D2531:249a-30: khyi dang ce spyang dang bya rgod dang sdig pa'i sgra byung na sbyin bdag 'chi bar bshad do //
T02D2531:249a-31: zhum bus thing skud 'gong na de'i rus pa yod do //
T02D2531:249a-33: bod bus 'gong na de'i rus pa'o //
T02D2531:249a-34: byi yis 'gong na de'i rus pa'o //
T02D2531:249a-35: ra dang lug gis 'gong na de dag gi rus pa'am yang na ba lang gi rus pa'o //
T02D2531:249a-36: rta yis ni rta'i rus pa'o //
T02D2531:249a-37: glang po cha yis ni glang po che'i rus pa'o //
T02D2531:249a-38: yang na rnga mo'i rus pa'o //
T02D2531:249a-39: rta mchog gis ni de'i rus pa'am ma he'am ce sbyang gi rus pa'o //
T02D2531:249a-40: ri dags kyis ni ri dags kyi rus pa'o //
T02D2531:249a-41: gzig gis ni gzig gi rus pa'o //
T02D2531:249b-0: bab pas ni @249b phag gi rus pa'o //
T02D2531:249b-1: stag gis ni glang po che'i rus pa'o //
T02D2531:249b-2: byi bas ni byi ba'i rus pa'o //
T02D2531:249b-3: sbrul gyis ni sbrul gyi rus pa'o //
T02D2531:249b-4: rus sbal gyis ni rus sbal gyi rus pa'o //
T02D2531:249b-8: des par sbyor ba'i skye bo rnams kyi nang nas
T02D2531:249b-9: gang la la mgo bo g-ya' bar 'gyur na de
T02D2531:249b-10: la mi gang gi 'og na rus pa yod do
T02D2531:249b-11: // smin mtshams kyi reg byas ni khru gsum na gser yod do //
T02D2531:249b-13: mig gi reg byas ni mig gi mthar thug pa'i 'og na mi tig go //
T02D2531:249b-14: kha'i reg byas ni khru gsum gyi 'og na skra'am shing yod do//
T02D2531:249b-15: so'i reg byas ni khru gsum na so rjes su dpag par bya'o //
T02D2531:249b-16: rna ba g-ya' na rna ba man chad kyi 'og
T02D2531:249b-17: tu dngul lam gser ram yang na byi rur 'gyur
T02D2531:249b-18: ro // mgrin pa'i reg byas ni de'i tshad kyi 'og na do shal lo //
T02D2531:249b-20: yang na sol ba'am lag gdub khru gsum gyi 'og na'o //
T02D2531:249b-21: 'phrag [*phrag] pa'i reg byas de'i tshad kyi 'og na de'i rgyan no //
T02D2531:249b-22: mchan 'og gi reg byas ni mchan 'og gi tshad man chad na lcags kyi sel lo //
T02D2531:249b-23: dpung ba la zug rngu byung na mgrin pa'i tshad kyi 'og na de'i rgyan no //
T02D2531:249b-24: rna ba g-yas pa'i reg byas ni rked pa cam
T02D2531:249b-25: gyi 'og na thod pa'am yang na sa'i rang bzhin
T02D2531:249b-26: gyis thod pa'o // lag pa g-yon pa'i rig byas ni pus nub kyi 'og na khri'i rkang pa'o //
T02D2531:249b-27: rtse ba logs g-yas na mi phyed tsam gyi 'og na rdul lo //
T02D2531:249b-28: brla'i reg byas ni sked pa tsam gyi 'og na phyugs kyi rus pa'o //
T02D2531:249b-29: rgyab kyi rus pas ni rgyab kyi rus pa ste de'i tshad kyi 'og na'o //
T02D2531:249b-30: rked pa'i reg byas ni khru do'i 'og na lcags kyi thur mar bshad do //
T02D2531:249b-31: rtags kyi reg byas ni khru gang gi tshad na lcags gsum gyi sel lo //
T02D2531:249b-32: pus mo'i reg byas ni de'i rus pa'am sor bcu gcig gis 'og na rta'i rmig pa'o //
T02D2531:249b-33: rkang pa'i reg byas ni sor nga bcu gnyis kyi 'og na sh'a la ma'am yang na tsher ma'o //
T02D2531:249b-34: rkang pa'i mthe'u chung gi reg byas ni sor brgyad kyi 'og na 'khar pa'o //
T02D2531:249b-35: rting ba'i reg byas sor bcu gnyis kyi 'og na lhang tsher ro //
T02D2531:249b-36: thig 'debs pa'i dus su sbyin bdag gi reg byas ni rus pa'o //
T02D2531:250a-0: skyes bu gzhan gang zhig gam srog @250a * //
T02D2531:250a-1: chags gang zhig gi ming yongs su grags pa ni
T02D2531:250a-2: de'i rus pa ste de la nges par yod do
T02D2531:250a-3: // gang nas ba lang blo bur du 'ongs nas
T02D2531:250a-4: gal te lci ba btang na de'i 'og na nges
T02D2531:250a-5: par de'i tshad kyi gser yod do zhes pa ni
T02D2531:250a-6: // nges pa'o // gal te byis pa dang gzhon
T02D2531:250a-7: nu ma 'gal zhig glo bur du 'ongs nas der
T02D2531:250a-8: phyis bcag na de'i 'og na nges par de'i chad
T02D2531:250a-9: // nges pa'o // kyi dngul lo // sbal ba'i sgra grags na chu'i 'jigs pa'o //
T02D2531:250a-16: khyu mchog rnams kyi sgra yid du'ang bas ni skye bo rnams dge bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2531:250a-17: seng ge dang glang po che dang /
T02D2531:250a-18: sbyin gyi sgra yid du 'ong bas ni rigs dang /
T02D2531:250a-20: don thob pa la sogs par 'gyur ro //
T02D2531:250a-21: dung dang bkra shis kyi glu dang /
T02D2531:250a-22: byis pa rnams rtse bar byed na don grub bo //
T02D2531:250a-23: du ba mthong na sems sdug bsngal ba'o //
T02D2531:250a-24: ngan pa dang dman pa dang /
T02D2531:250a-26: yongs su mnar pa'i skye bo mthong na nad yod do //
T02D2531:250a-36: rgyal ba'i yan lag la sogs pa mthong na dge bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2531:250a-37: mkhas pa dang bram ze dang /
T02D2531:250a-39: legs pa'i skye bo mthong na chos kyi'o //
T02D2531:250a-40: zhes pa ni rtags rnams gsungs so //
T02D2531:250a-41: de'i rje su thig 'debs pa na slob dpon gyi skye bo dang nor dang /
T02D2531:250a-42: stobs 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir lag pa g-yas pa
T02D2531:250a-43: rdo rje dang 'dod pa sbyin pa'i gser gyi thur
T02D2531:250a-44: ma dang bcas te dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams
T02D2531:250a-45: ste g-yas skor gyi phyogs kyi thig rnams bri bar
T02D2531:250a-46: bya'o // de bzhin du lag pa g-yon pa dril
T02D2531:250a-47: bu dang bcas te rtsa ba'i thig rnams bri bar
T02D2531:250a-49: / de nas khang pa la klu yongs su brtag par bya'o //
T02D2531:250a-50: de la gzhu'i khyim du zhugs pa nas brtsams te nyi ma dgu bcu tham pa ste /
T02D2531:250a-51: ji srid nya'i khyim du ma zhugs par du de
T02D2531:250a-52: ya lho phyogs su mgo bstan nub tu kha bstan
T02D2531:250a-54: de nas nya'i khyim du zhugs pa nas brtsams te
T02D2531:250b-0: ji srid 'khrig pa'i @250b khyim du ma zhugs par
T02D2531:250b-1: du de la nub phyogs su mgo dang byang phyogs
T02D2531:250b-2: su kha mngon par phyogs te klu nyal lo //
T02D2531:250b-3: de bzhin du 'khrig pa'i khyim du zhugs pa nas
T02D2531:250b-4: brtsams te ji srid bu mo'i khyim du ma zhugs
T02D2531:250b-5: par du de la byang du mgo dang shar du
T02D2531:250b-6: kha mngon par phyogs te klu nyal lo //
T02D2531:250b-7: de bzhin du bu mo'i khyim du zhugs pa nas
T02D2531:250b-8: brtsams te ji srid gzhu'i khyim du ma zhugs par
T02D2531:250b-9: du de la shar du mgo dang lhor kha mngon
T02D2531:250b-10: par phyogs te klu nyal lo //
T02D2531:250b-11: 'dir bshad pa ni chos kyi rim pas re mig
T02D2531:250b-12: re re la 'phos te klu'i 'pho bar 'gyur ro
T02D2531:250b-13: // da ni khang pa'i klu'i mchan 'og gi cha la brkos ste /
T02D2531:250b-14: de la mgo bo nas mig tu mig nyi shu rtsa bdun no //
T02D2531:250b-15: rgyab kyi mthar phyed dang bcas pa'i re mig bcu
T02D2531:250b-16: gsum yongs su spang ba ni sa bdag klu'i mchan
T02D2531:250b-18: de la re mig dgu'i srid dang zheng du de'i phyed do //
T02D2531:250b-19: yang na shar gyi mtha' las dang nub kyi mtha' las bcu cha ni mchan 'og gi srid do //
T02D2531:250b-21: mchan 'og gi steng du mgo bo'i mthar thug pa la mtshan 'og gi srid kyi sum 'gyur ro //
T02D2531:250b-22: mtshan 'og gi srid dang zheng dag dang mnyam pa ni rgyab kyi mthar ngo //
T02D2531:250b-23: de bzhin du lho dang byang dang nub dang shar dang byang dang lho la'o //
T02D2531:250b-24: sa bdag klu'i mgo bo la brkos na pha dang bu la sogs pa 'chi'o //
T02D2531:250b-25: rgyab kyi phyogs la brkos na sbyin bdag 'chi'o //
T02D2531:250b-26: yang na yul nas 'thon par 'gyur ro //
T02D2531:250b-27: mjug ma la ni ba lang dang ma he la sogs pa nyams par 'gyur ro zhes so //
T02D2531:250b-28: gtsug lag khang gi sa'i cha las bdag klu'i mtshan
T02D2531:250b-29: nyid kyi dod gang ba sa bdag klu'i mchan gyi
T02D2531:250b-30: cha la dang po brko bar bya'o //
T02D2531:250b-31: khru bcu drug gi khang mig nye bar mtshon par
T02D2531:250b-32: gyur pa la gtsug lag khang gi sa'i cha la
T02D2531:250b-33: nyi ma so so la cung zad rkang pas dman
T02D2531:250b-34: pa'i sor bcu gsum sa bdag klu'i 'pho bar 'gyur
T02D2531:250b-35: ro // de bzhin du khru bcu bzhi'i tshad du
T02D2531:250b-36: khang mig tu nye bar mtshon par 'gyur ba la
T02D2531:250b-37: ro // / gtsug lag khang gi sa'i cha la
T02D2531:250b-38: nyi ma so so la cung zad lhag pa'i phyed
T02D2531:250b-39: dang bcas pa'i nas gcig gis lhag pa'i sor bcu
T02D2531:251a-0: de bzhin du khru bcu gnyis kyi tshad kyi khang mig tu 'gyur ba @251a * //
T02D2531:251a-1: la gtsug lag khang gi sa'i cha la nyi ma
T02D2531:251a-2: so so la cung zad bzhi gsum gyi dman pa'i
T02D2531:251a-3: nas lhag pa'i sor dgus bdag klu'i 'pho bar 'gyur
T02D2531:251a-4: ro // de bzhin du yang khru bcu'i tshad kyi
T02D2531:251a-5: khang mig tu 'gyur ba la gtsug lag khang gi
T02D2531:251a-6: sa'i cha la nyi ma so so la sor brgyad
T02D2531:251a-8: gzhan yang sa mchan 'og gi mtshan nyid gsungs pa /
T02D2531:251a-9: khru bcu drug gi tshad kyi khang mig gi sa'i
T02D2531:251a-10: cha las bdag klu'i mgo bo'i 'og tu de las
T02D2531:251a-11: sor bcu gcig dang khru bcu bzhi'o //

T02D2531:251a-14: zad lhag pa'i sor bcu dgu lhag pa'i khru bzhi'i

T02D2531:251a-16: mo dgu lhag pa'i khru do'i tshad ni sa bdag
T02D2531:251a-18: de bzhin du khru bcu bzhi'i tshad kyi khang mig

T02D2531:251a-23: yongs su spangs te srid du sor mo bcu lhag

T02D2531:251a-26: de bzhin du khru bcu gnyis kyi tshad kyi khang
T02D2531:251a-27: mig tu 'gyur ba'i gtsug lag khang gi sa'i cha

T02D2531:251a-32: bcu lhag pa'i khru gsum gyi tshad dang /

T02D2531:251a-34: de bzhin du khru bcu'i tshad kyi khang mig gi
T02D2531:251a-35: gtsug lag khang gi sa'i cha las bdag klu'i mgo

T02D2531:251b-1: gtsug lag khang la sogs pa'i sa gzhi la mngon par khyab cing nyal lo //
T02D2531:251b-2: klu brgyad kyi sa bdag klu'i lus la gnas pa

T02D2531:251b-4: // de la mjug ma'i rtse mo la rigs ldan sku mdog sngon po'o //

T02D2531:251b-7: dbung pa'i phyogs la padma chen po mching bu'i mdog go //
T02D2531:251b-8: snying gar nor rgyas sngo bsangs d'ur ba'i mdog go //

T02D2531:253a-3: yan lag mchog la ral pa'i cod pan bcings pa
T02D2531:253a-4: yangs pa'i spyan gsum gyis gdong brgyan pa mchod phyir
T02D2531:253a-5: thogs dang gos dmar po'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa sgeg
T02D2531:253a-6: pa dang bcas pa'i me dmar po spyan drangs te
T02D2531:253a-7: mchod yon la sogs pa'i phyi'i mchod pa rnams kyis
T02D2531:253a-8: yang dag par mchod par bya'o //

T02D2531:253a-11: aom lo hi t'a gn'a ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:253a-12: til la sogs pa rnams kyis sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D2531:253a-13: pandi ta chen po rigs kyi sbyin pa zhes bya
T02D2531:253a-14: bas mdzad pa'i bya ba bsdus pa las rab tu
T02D2531:253a-17: // / so phag mtshan nyid yang dag par //
T02D2531:253a-18: shes nas phyogs bzung de nas ni //
T02D2531:253a-19: yang dag 'phel dang zad pa dang //
T02D2531:253a-20: khang bzangs mtshan nyid shes pa dang //
T02D2531:253a-21: lha dang phyogs skyong sa yi lha //
T02D2531:253a-22: cho ga ji bzhin yang dag mchod //
T02D2531:253a-23: so phag bya ba'i phyir rab tu rmongs byed kyi me la sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D2531:253a-24: de la so phag gi cha lnga ni srid du'o //
T02D2531:253a-26: rtsig zheng gi phyed ni so phag gi srid do //
T02D2531:253a-27: zheng gi sum cha ni dpangs so //
T02D2531:253a-28: de la slob dpon bdag nyid sbyin bdag dang lhan
T02D2531:253a-29: cig tu so phag 'jog pa'i sa la gtor ma

T02D2531:253a-31: gar zla ba la gnas pa'i bhr'um yig gi 'od
T02D2531:253a-32: zer gyis rdul phra rab tshogs pa'i gzugs su so
T02D2531:253a-33: phag bya ba'i phung po rnam pa bsgoms la bum
T02D2531:253a-34: pa'i chus gtor nas nyer spyod lngas mchod de 'dis
T02D2531:253a-36: gang gi rang bzhin de bzhin gshegs //
T02D2531:253a-38: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin nges //
T02D2531:253a-40: las byed pa ni rdo rje bsrung ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi gzugs su bsgoms te /
T02D2531:253a-41: de'i lag pa'i mthil gyi chu skyes g-yon dang g-yas su zla ba dang nyi ma bsgom ste /
T02D2531:253a-42: dkar po dang dmar po'i dri dang me tog rnams
T02D2531:253a-43: kyis tshim par byas te las byed pa de la
T02D2531:253a-44: yon phul te de nas so phag bya'o zhes so
T02D2531:253a-45: // de nas phyogs bzung ba bsrungs te /
T02D2531:253a-46: de nas lug tu 'pho ba'i nyi ma rnam par
T02D2531:253b-0: dag pa las @253b bzhi mnyam por byas te dbus
T02D2531:253b-1: su chu blugs nas brtag cing phyogs mnyam por bsgrub

T02D2531:253b-3: pa'i dbus su sor gsum gyi 'khor ba rtse mo

T02D2531:253b-8: de la dang pe nyi ma shar ba'i dus su

T02D2531:253b-11: de bzhin du nyi ma gung gi dus su byang
T02D2531:253b-12: phyogs su grib ma babs pa'i sar mtshan ma byas
T02D2531:253b-14: de bzhin du nyi ma nub ka'i dus su shar
T02D2531:253b-15: phyogs kyi grib ma babs pa'i sar mtshan ma byas
T02D2531:253b-17: shar nas nub kyi bar la sor dgu bcu rtsa drug go //
T02D2531:253b-18: da ni 'phel ba dang zad pa brjod par bya ste /
T02D2531:253b-19: zheng ni srid la bsgyur byas te //
T02D2531:253b-20: de nas nyi shu bzhi yis bsgyur //

T02D2531:253b-23: tshogs pa nor gyis bsgyur ba la //
T02D2531:253b-24: rgyu skar rnams kyis rab tu bgo //
T02D2531:253b-25: skar mas bgos pa'i lhag ma ni //

T02D2531:253b-27: / skar ma la ni nor gyis bgo //
T02D2531:253b-28: lhag ma gang de zad pa'o //
T02D2531:253b-29: rnam pa kun du skar ma la //
T02D2531:253b-30: bzhis bsgyur gza' tshogs gis [*kyis] bgos pa'i //

T02D2531:253b-34: mtsho 'gyur de la phung pos bgo //
T02D2531:253b-35: 'tsho ba'i lhag mar gang gyur pa //
