T02D2531:254a-8: pa'i lhag ma rnams ni nyi ma la sogs pa'i
T02D2531:254a-9: gzar 'gyur te de ni cha shas yin te cha
T02D2531:254a-10: te zad pa'o ; shas so // de bzhin du
T02D2531:254a-11: bcu gnyis kyis bgos la gang lhag ma rnams lug
T02D2531:254a-12: la sogs par 'gyur te dus sbyor ro ;
T02D2531:254a-13: / de bzhin du tshogs la brgyad kyis bsgyur la
T02D2531:254a-14: de la drug cu drug cus bgos pa'i lhag ma
T02D2531:254a-16: 'tsho ba la lnga lngas bgos la gang thob pa'i
T02D2531:254a-17: lhag ma ni sa la sogs pa'i bskal par 'gyur
T02D2531:254a-18: te 'jig pa'o // 'dir shar phyogs su rgyal mtshan ni 'dab chags rgyal po'o //
T02D2531:254a-19: mer du ba ni zhum bu'o //
T02D2531:254a-20: gshin rje'i phyogs su seng ge'o //
T02D2531:254a-22: chu bdag tu khyu mchog ni lce gnyis pa'o //
T02D2531:254a-23: rlung du bong bu ni byi ba'o //
T02D2531:254a-25: dbang ldan du bya rog ni lug go //
T02D2531:254a-26: 'di rnams kyi 'dab chags sprul dag dang /
T02D2531:254a-27: zhum bu dang byi ba dag dang seng ge dang glang po che dag dang /
T02D2531:254a-28: lug dang khyi dag ni phan tshun du mi mthun pa'o //
T02D2531:254a-29: khang mig gi srid dang zheng gnas la khru dang
T02D2531:254a-30: sor gyi grangs rnams la phan tshun mi mthun pa
T02D2531:254a-31: ma yin pa de bzhin du bya'o /
T02D2531:254a-33: // / da ni khang bzangs kyi mtshan nyid brjod par bya ste /
T02D2531:254a-34: srid kyi phyed du gyur pa ni zheng ngo //
T02D2531:254a-35: 'on kyang tshad cung zad lhag par bya'o //
T02D2531:254a-36: khang mig gi srid kyi sum cha gcig ni ma the ma du bshad do //
T02D2531:254a-37: gdung gi mthar thug pa ni 'og gi cha'o //
T02D2531:254a-38: de bzhin du de dang mnyam pa ni steng gi cha'o //
T02D2531:254a-39: dong dgang ba'i khyad par la kha cig tu ska rags gsum dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2531:254a-40: kha cig tu ska rags lnga dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2531:254a-41: kha cig tu ska rags bdun dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2531:254a-42: kha cig tu chu'i mthar thug pa'o //
T02D2531:254a-43: kha cig tu rdo ba'i mthar thug pa'o zhes pa ni gros su bya'o //
T02D2531:254a-44: chu 'gro ba'i gnas kyi nges pa brjod pa ni
T02D2531:254a-45: de la gang du dge ba dang skye bo dang
T02D2531:254b-0: @254b nor 'phel bar 'dod pas de la rlung gi
T02D2531:254b-1: phyogs su rdo rje 'bar ba dang nag po chen
T02D2531:254b-2: po'i re mig dag la byang phyogs su chu 'gro
T02D2531:254b-3: bar bya'o // gang du tshe dang nad med pa
T02D2531:254b-4: dang bde ba 'phel bar 'dod pas de la dbang
T02D2531:254b-5: ldan gyi phyogs su dri rdo rje ma dang /
T02D2531:254b-6: gtsug tor can ma'i re mig dag la chu 'gro bar bya'o //
T02D2531:254b-7: nyes pa med par bya ba'i phyir rtsa dang sgo 'bugs pa yongs su spang bar bya'o //
T02D2531:254b-8: de nas khang mig zheng gi cha gsum gyi cha
T02D2531:254b-9: gcig gam yang na bzhi cha gcig gi stegs bu
T02D2531:254b-12: myos pa bsrung ba dang rtse mo'o //
T02D2531:254b-13: de'i phyed kyi tshad ni rtsig pa'o /
T02D2531:254b-15: // / da ni bye brag gi mtshan nyid brjod par bya ste /
T02D2531:254b-19: khang pa bzhi pa'i khang bzangs la gal te nub
T02D2531:254b-20: tu khang pa gcig pa'i khang bzang ni des nor
T02D2531:254b-22: de bzhin du byang gi khang pa khang gcig tu gyur na sbyin bdag mi 'tsho'o//
T02D2531:254b-23: de bzhin du shar gyi khang pa khang gcig tu gyur na rigs rgyud mi 'phel lo //
T02D2531:254b-24: de nas yang lho phyogs su gnas pa byang du
T02D2531:254b-25: sgo mngon par phyogs pa'i khang bzangs kyi skye bo
T02D2531:254b-26: dad nor dang cha rab tu ster bar 'gyur ro
T02D2531:254b-27: // khang pa gnyis pa'i khang bzangs ni gshin rje'i slob ma dang /
T02D2531:254b-29: mching bu dang dbyug pa'i mig dang rlung gi mig dang don grub pa rnams so //
T02D2531:254b-30: 'chi ba dang nor zad pa dang /
T02D2531:254b-31: gnyen dang mi mthun pa dang rgyal po'i chad pa
T02D2531:254b-32: dang 'thab mo dang don thob par byed pa rnams
T02D2531:254b-33: so // de la nub dang byang ni gshin rje'i slob ma'o //
T02D2531:254b-34: shar dang nub ni khyim gyi thab bo //
T02D2531:254b-35: lho dang byang ni mching bu'o//
T02D2531:254b-36: shar dang byang ni dbyug pa'i mig go //
T02D2531:254b-37: shar dang lho ni rlung gi mig go //
T02D2531:254b-38: lho dang nub ni don grub pa'o //
T02D2531:254b-41: byang dang shar du khang pa dang mi ldan pa'i
T02D2531:254b-42: khang bzangs ni go rims bzhin du thab dang phyogs
T02D2531:254b-43: 'joms pa dang gser gyi nam mkha' dang zhing bzang
T02D2531:254b-45: de la thab ni yo byad mnyam par byed do //
T02D2531:254b-46: phyogs 'joms pa ni bu 'chi ba dang dgrar byed do //
T02D2531:254b-47: gser gyi nam mkha' ni don thams cad phun sum tshogs pa dang bde ba rab tu ster ro //
T02D2531:254b-48: zhing bzang pa ni chos dang nor dang pa lang dang dud 'gro rnams 'phel bar byed do //
T02D2531:255a-2: / khang pa bzhi pa'i khang bzangs la 'dod ldan dang /
T02D2531:255a-6: don thams cad grub bzhes so //
T02D2531:255a-7: de la 'dir 'dod ldan brjod par bya'o //
T02D2531:255a-8: gang la shar dang byang dang nub kyi phyogs rnams
T02D2531:255a-9: su phyogs gcig la rtsa ba'i sgo gcig gis nye
T02D2531:255a-10: bar brgyan pa / dong bkang ba'i phyi dang nang
T02D2531:255a-11: dang dbus kyi gnas la rtsig pa gsum gyis nye
T02D2531:255a-12: bar brgyan pa / bar mchan pa'o // steng gi
T02D2531:255a-13: cha la rtsig pa gnyis kyis rnam par brgyan pa'am
T02D2531:255a-14: bar brgyan pa / bar mchan pa'o // / yang na rtsig pa gcig gis rnam par brgyan pa'o //
T02D2531:255a-15: de la gang rtsig pa gcig gis rnam par brgyan
T02D2531:255a-16: pa de'i rtsig pa'i gnas la ka ba'i phreng bas
T02D2531:255a-17: brgyan pa'o // gnyis ka'i mthar thug pa ni srid do //
T02D2531:255a-18: de yang khru sum cu nas brtsams te ji srid khru stong gi bar du'o //
T02D2531:255a-19: srid kyi cha lnga'i cha gcig ni zheng gi tshad do //
T02D2531:255a-20: zheng gi cha lnga la gsum ni nang gi dbus kyi rtsig pa dang ka ba yang ngo //
T02D2531:255a-21: nang na steng 'og cha gnyis ka la ka ba'i phreng ba bya'o //
T02D2531:255a-22: sgo phyi ma dang nang ma la sgo kyog po mi bya'o //
T02D2531:255a-23: de yang 'dod ldan thams cad mtshungs par ldan pa
T02D2531:255a-24: ni tshe dang skye bo dang nor dang bde ba
T02D2531:255a-25: dang phun sum tshogs pa rab tu ster bar 'gyur
T02D2531:255a-26: ro // de bzhin du shar nub gnyis dang /
T02D2531:255a-27: lho byang gnyis kyi mthar thug pa'i srid du gyur
T02D2531:255a-28: pa gang yin pa de ni bkra shis ma zhes
T02D2531:255a-30: srid kyi drug cha'i cha gcig gi tshad ni zheng ngo //
T02D2531:255a-31: khang pa'i gzhogs gnyis ni gnas de dag mnyam pa'i zheng ngo //
T02D2531:255a-32: srid ni zheng gi nyis 'gyur ro //
T02D2531:255a-33: de la ring po dag la sgo gnyis gnyis so ;
T02D2531:255a-34: / khang pa thung ba dag la sgo re re'o //
T02D2531:255a-35: de yang khang bzangs bkra shis ma ste /
T02D2531:255a-36: de la gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi nor dang
T02D2531:255a-37: skye bo dang gnyen dang tshe dang dud 'gro dang
T02D2531:255a-39: gang la g-yas g-yon gzhogs gang khang chung gnyis dang
T02D2531:255a-40: ldan zhing sgo byang du lta ba ni lho'i khang
T02D2531:255a-41: pa'o // nub dang byang dang shar gyi khang pa'i
T02D2531:255a-42: gnas la khang chung dang mi ldan par gyur pa
T02D2531:255a-43: de ni nor dang 'bru 'phel ba ste 'phel ldan
T02D2531:255a-44: pa'o // zhes bshad do // gang la gzhogs g-yon
T02D2531:255a-45: du khang chung dang ldan pa'i khang pa bzhir gyur
T02D2531:255a-46: pa de ni nor dang skye bo dang bde pa
T02D2531:255b-0: pa'o // zhes bshad do // 'bab pa'i ste / g-yung drung 'khyil @255b bzhes gsungs so //
T02D2531:255b-1: gang yang khang chung bzhi dang bcas pa'i khang pa
T02D2531:255b-2: brgyad du gyur pa de ni nor dang 'bru 'phel
T02D2531:255b-3: te / don thams cad grub pa zhes gsungs so //
T02D2531:255b-4: lha khang gi bye brag ni gru bzhi par re mig brgyad cu rtsa gcig bya ste /
T02D2531:255b-5: phyi rol du re mig sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi
T02D2531:255b-6: dang po dang gnyis pa'i gnas dag gi rtsig pa'i
T02D2531:255b-7: lus so // gnas dang po'i zheng dang mtshungs pa dpangs su ste gnyis pa'i re mig tu'o //
T02D2531:255b-8: de'i steng du gsum pa dang bzhi pa dag rtsig pa bya ste /
T02D2531:255b-9: 'og gi gnas kyi srid kyi dgu'i cha rnams la
T02D2531:255b-10: drug gi chas steng gi gnas dag gi zhes so
T02D2531:255b-11: // de nas re mig dgur byas la phyi'i re mig tu rtsig pa bya'o //
T02D2531:255b-12: dpangs su gsum pa'i gnas la dang po'i gnas kyi su ma cha'i cha gcig gis so //
T02D2531:255b-13: de'i nyis 'gyur gyi gnas bzhi pa'i dpangs so //
T02D2531:255b-14: stegs bu ni rtsig pa gnyis so //
T02D2531:255b-15: de la rtsig rmang gzhan par gsungs so //
T02D2531:255b-16: yang dag par sbyang ba rnams las bzang pos yongs
T02D2531:255b-17: su bkang ba rnams yang dag par brdung zhing dong
T02D2531:255b-18: bkang la / gser dang dngul gyi padma'i steng du
T02D2531:255b-19: gser dang dngul gyi bum pa rus sbal gyi steng
T02D2531:255b-20: bkang la / du dgod do // de'i steng du
T02D2531:255b-21: g-yas skor du me long la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams
T02D2531:255b-29: dngul chus nang yongs su dgang bar bya'o //
T02D2531:255b-30: ji ltar 'byor pas gser dang dngul dang /
T02D2531:255b-31: zangs ma las yongs su byas te kha dgab par bya'o //
T02D2531:255b-32: aom badzra yaksha h'um zhes pa'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas par bya'o//
T02D2531:255b-33: sbrang gi bum pa bzhi zur bzhir gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2531:255b-34: de'i steng du legs par byas pa'i so phag gzhag par bya'o /
T02D2531:255b-36: // / de nas yongs su sbyang ba'i sa'i dbus su
T02D2531:255b-37: slob dpon gyis ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgoms nas sngon
T02D2531:255b-38: du yid kyi rang bzhin gyi mchod pa rnams kyis
T02D2531:255b-39: de na gnas pa'i lha dang /
T02D2531:255b-43: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la
T02D2531:255b-44: mchod yon dang zhabs bsil gyis yang dag par mchod
T02D2531:255b-45: par bya'o // phyi'i me tog dang spos la sogs
T02D2531:255b-46: pa rnams kyis kyang yang dag par mchod nas nam
T02D2531:256a-1: aom bhr'u kham zhes pa'i sngags kyis stong par byas
T02D2531:256a-2: te sa'i cha la h'um lam h'um zhes pa'i sngags
T02D2531:256a-3: kyis rdo rje'i rdul phra rab kyi rang bzhin du
T02D2531:256a-5: aom me di n'i badzr'i bha ba badzra bandha h'um zhes pa'i sngags kyi byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D2531:256a-6: de nas lag pa g-yas par zla ba la h'um
T02D2531:256a-7: gsum dang tram zhes brjod pas h'um yig gi 'od
T02D2531:256a-8: zer gyis sor mo'i rtse mo las gdengs ka'i sgras
T02D2531:256a-9: ye shes kyi sa'i lha mo bskul nas 'thon te
T02D2531:256a-10: / lag pa gnyis kyis gser gyi bum pa 'dzin
T02D2531:256a-11: zhing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i sa'i lha mo
T02D2531:256a-12: ser mo rnam bar bsgoms la zhabs bsil dang zhal
T02D2531:256a-13: bsil dang mchod yon phul nas me tog la sogs
T02D2531:256a-14: pas yang dag par mchod par bya'o //
T02D2531:256a-15: lha mo khyod ni zhes pa la sogs pa nas /
T02D2531:256a-16: bdag gis gtsug lag khang bzhengs bya //
T02D2531:256a-17: zhes pa'i bar lan gsum brjod par bya'o //
T02D2531:256a-18: de nas de'i nang gi phyogs gcig la thim par rnam par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2531:256a-19: de nas de'i phyogs su yam ram bam lam sum
T02D2531:256a-20: gyi yi ge rnams las skyes pa'i rlung dang me
T02D2531:256a-21: dang chu dang sa dang ri rab kyi steng du
T02D2531:256a-22: h'um yig las skyes pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje de'i
T02D2531:256a-23: 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi
T02D2531:256a-24: sa gzhi dang / rdo rje rab dang /
T02D2531:256a-26: bla re yang rnam par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2531:256a-27: sna tshogs rdo rje'i stegs bu la bhr'um las skyes
T02D2531:256a-28: pa'i 'khor los mtshan pa'i rnam par snang mdzad de
T02D2531:256a-29: yongs su gyur pa las gtsug lag khang gi phyogs
T02D2531:256a-30: rnam par bsgoms nas so phag byin gyis brlab par
T02D2531:256a-34: aom badzra sandhi bam zhes pa'i sngags kyis so //
T02D2531:256a-35: de thams cad du ba lang gi rmig rjes can dang /
T02D2531:256a-40: cha shas nyams pa'i so phag rnams yongs su spangs te /
T02D2531:256a-44: zur dang bcas pa'i so phag yang dag par bzung ste padma'i steng du gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2531:256a-45: bhr'um yig las rdul phra rab tshogs pa'i gzugs su bsgoms nas bum pa'i chus gtor bar bya'o //
T02D2531:256a-50: pri yang ku'i me tog dang /
T02D2531:256b-0: tshangs skud la sogs pa rnams @256b kyis mchod par bya'o //
T02D2531:256b-1: de nas sa'i bdag po dang /
T02D2531:256b-2: rtsig pa'i las byed pa dang /
T02D2531:256b-3: ltad mo pa'i mi rnams la ji ltar 'byor pa'i lag gdub dang /
T02D2531:256b-6: rin po che'i phreng ba dang /
T02D2531:256b-8: go la la sogs pa rnams kyis yang dag par tshim par bya'o ;
T02D2531:256b-9: / sbyin bdag gi lag pas so phag gtad par bya'o //
T02D2531:256b-10: de nas byang shar du kha phyogs pas sa'i gnas
T02D2531:256b-11: nas rlung rgyu ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dang
T02D2531:256b-12: / zla ba dang nyi ma'i snang ba mchog la
T02D2531:256b-13: rtsig pa la sogs pa g-yas skor du so phag
T02D2531:256b-14: rnams dang po byang ngam shar nas brtsams te me
T02D2531:256b-15: dang bden bral dang rlung dang dbang ldan gyi zur
T02D2531:256b-17: de nas slob dpon dang bcas pas rdo rje bsrung
T02D2531:256b-18: ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang sngags kyi byin
T02D2531:256b-20: aom badzra raksha dri dho me bha ba raksha sarbam sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:256b-22: lag pa g-yas pa'i rdo rjes aom bhr'um sarba ta
T02D2531:256b-23: th'a ga ta sarba buddha la ya m'a dhi tishthantu
T02D2531:256b-24: sv'a h'a / zhes pa'i sngags 'di so so'i zur la lan bdun du byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D2531:256b-25: yi ge brgya pas brtan par byas nas /
T02D2531:256b-26: bum pa'i chus gtor nas me tog la sogs pa
T02D2531:256b-27: rnams kyis yang dag par mchod de dril du dkrol
T02D2531:256b-28: bar bya'o // de'i dus su dam pa'i chos klog pa dang /
T02D2531:256b-30: rda la sogs pa rol mo'i sgras dga' bar bya'o //
T02D2531:256b-31: sbyin bdag gi sa yang dag par spro ba dang bcas pas chu'i rgyun sbreng bar bya'o //
T02D2531:256b-32: de nas rig ma la sogs pa mtha' dag rjes
T02D2531:256b-33: su chags pas sna tshogs padma'i steng du sgeg pa
T02D2531:256b-34: dang rol pa'i tshig dang sna tshogs pa'i gos dang
T02D2531:256b-36: shin tu rnam par dag par spyan yangs shing dul
T02D2531:256b-37: ba mdzes pas rnam par brgyan par gyur pa zhal
T02D2531:256b-38: mdzes pa ral pa'i thor tshugs la rin po che'i
T02D2531:256b-39: cod pan bcing ba phyag bzhi na mchog sbyin dang
T02D2531:256b-40: bgrang phreng dang / dbyu gu gsum pa dang spyi
T02D2531:256b-41: blugs kyis rnam par brgyan zhing shin tu mdzes pa
T02D2531:256b-42: gur gum gyi mdog lta bu zhi ba'i gzugs can
T02D2531:256b-43: mthu dang ldan pa'i mes tshim par bya'o //
T02D2531:256b-44: dri bzang po'i shing gi yam shing dang /
T02D2531:256b-45: dri bzangs kyi lde gu dang /
T02D2531:257a-2: sngags ni aom pra mo ha n'a gna ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:257a-4: pandi ta chen po rigs kyi sbyin pa zhes bya
T02D2531:257a-5: bas mdzad pa'i bya ba bsdus pa las rab tu
T02D2531:257a-8: // / shing gi las zhes gsungs pas de brjod par bya ste /
T02D2531:257a-9: nags bltas de nas blo ldan gyis //
T02D2531:257a-10: sgo ni yang dag gdod par bya //
T02D2531:257a-11: gnas pa'i shing gi rtse mo yis //
T02D2531:257a-12: bdud rtsi'i me la sbyin sreg bya //
T02D2531:257a-13: de la tshes dang gza' dang rgyu skar bzang po la mchod rten nam /
T02D2531:257a-14: gtsug lag khang la sogs pa rnams kyi srog shing dang sgo dang /
T02D2531:257a-15: ka ba la sogs pa'i shing gi rtse mo'i mthar
T02D2531:257a-16: thug pa rnams kyi srid dang zheng du gnas pa
T02D2531:257a-17: dag thig 'dzin pa rnams kyis legs par gros byas
T02D2531:257a-18: te / shing mkhan gyi 'khor dang tshogs pa rnams
T02D2531:257a-19: kyi sbyin bdag dang slob dpon dang bcas pas nags
T02D2531:257a-21: rnyed pa dang tshal gyi nye 'khor du dus brtags
T02D2531:257a-22: te bdag nyid las thams cad pa'i skur bsgoms te
T02D2531:257a-23: rkang pa g-yas pa mdun du byas te /
T02D2531:257a-24: byang shar gyi phyogs su zhal bstan nas slob dpon nags kyi phyogs su rab tu 'jug par bya'o //
T02D2531:257a-25: lo nyis brgya ma lon pa'i shing sar pa'i sdong po rnams gzung bar bya'o //
T02D2531:257a-26: de nas yang ge sar gnyis pa dang /
T02D2531:257a-39: kim shu ka dang pa la sha dang /
T02D2531:257a-45: gran thi la dzu na dang /
T02D2531:257a-48: ro hi ni la sogs pa dpag tu med pa'i
T02D2531:257a-49: shing rnams gang la gang nye bar 'os pa'i shing
T02D2531:257a-50: de rnams legs par rnam par brtags nas phyi dro'i
T02D2531:257a-51: dus su las thams cad pa'i rnal 'byor dang ldan
T02D2531:257a-52: pa'i slob dpon yang dag pa'i spro ba dang ldan
T02D2531:257a-53: pas shing mkhan dang bcas pa'i bzo po rnams yang
T02D2531:257a-55: nyer spyod lngas bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang /
T02D2531:257a-57: nags tshal dang shing gi lha la sogs pa rnams
T02D2531:257a-58: yang dag par mchod cing phyogs kyi gtor ma yang
T02D2531:257b-1: shing mkhan dang bcas pa'i bzo bo rnams bza' ba dang btung ba'i ston mo dang /
T02D2531:257b-2: so rtsi la sogs pa rnams kyis yang dag par tshim par bya'o //
T02D2531:257b-3: yi dam gyi lha rnams kyang bdag la dgongs su
T02D2531:257b-4: gsol zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pas
T02D2531:257b-6: sems rab tu dga' bas shing mkhan dang bcas pa'i
T02D2531:257b-7: bzo bo rnams dang lhan cig yi dam lha'i rnal
T02D2531:257b-8: 'byor gyis zhi bar mthun pas nyal bar bya'o //
T02D2531:257b-9: de nas rmi lam bzang po bden pa'i dbang du nges na mtshams sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D2531:257b-10: rmi lam ngan na las thams cad pa'i bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D2531:257b-11: de nas nangs par snga bar mchod pa thams cad
T02D2531:257b-12: dang yang dag par ldan pas slob dpon gyis rnam
T02D2531:257b-13: par snang mdzad chen po'i rnal 'byor la zhugs te
T02D2531:257b-14: / lha rnams kyi gzugs kyi shing gi rgyal po rnams yang dag par mchod par bya'o //
T02D2531:257b-15: de la de rnams kyang shing gi lha rnams dang de rnams kyi zhing skyong rnams so //
T02D2531:257b-16: shug pa dang ge sar gnyis pa dang tsam pa
T02D2531:257b-17: ka dang mya ngan med kyi shing rnams la shing
T02D2531:257b-18: gi lha gsang ba ma dang /
T02D2531:257b-19: zhing skyong nag po chen po'o //
T02D2531:257b-20: ne m'i dang s'a la dang thang shing la 'jig rten gyi ma mo dang /
T02D2531:257b-21: zhing skyong ri rab chen po'o //
T02D2531:257b-22: ha ri ta dang aa ru ra'i shing dang n+ya
T02D2531:257b-23: gro dha'i shing rnams la karna ma ti ka ma
T02D2531:257b-24: dang / zhing skyong shin tu stobs can no //
T02D2531:257b-25: tsu ta'i shing la aa bi ka ma dang /
T02D2531:257b-27: t'a la'i shing la sham ka ri ka dang /
T02D2531:257b-28: zhing skyong skra gyen du brdzes pa'o //
T02D2531:257b-29: ka dam pa'i shing la zhal bzang mo dang /
T02D2531:257b-30: zhing skyong dril bu chen po'o //
T02D2531:257b-31: 'jam 'bras kyi shing la 'jam 'bras la gnas ma dang /
T02D2531:257b-32: zhing skyong gtum po'i dril bu'o //
T02D2531:257b-33: sbrang gi shing la she ka dang /
T02D2531:257b-34: zhing skyong skyes bu'i dbang phyug go //
T02D2531:257b-35: gser shing la gtum mo dang /
T02D2531:257b-37: shrim ga'i shing la bkra shis chen mo dang /
T02D2531:257b-39: de nas las dang mthun par shing gi lha rnams dang //
T02D2531:257b-40: gang gis zhing skyong gi rnam par bsgoms te rang rang gi sngags kyis mchod par bya'o //
T02D2531:257b-41: de la aom mam ma h'a k'a l'a ya na ma: sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:257b-43: aom gam gu hya k'a ye na ma: sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:258a-1: ma h'a me ra be na ma: sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:258a-2: aom lam lo ka ma tri k'a yee na ma: sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:258a-3: aom aam aa ti ba l'a ya na ma: sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:258a-4: aom kam karna ma ti k'a yee na ma: sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:258a-5: aom bam ba l'a ya na ma: sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:258a-6: aom aam aa bi k'a yee na ma: sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:258a-7: aom a'u a'urdha ko sh'a ya na ma: sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:258a-8: aom sham sham ka ri k'a yee na ma: sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:258a-9: aom gham ma h'a ghand'a ya na ma: sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:258a-10: aom sum su mu kh'a yee na ma: sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:258a-11: aom tsam tsanda ghand'a ya na ma: sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:258a-12: aom kam ka ranydza ba si n+yee na ma: sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:258a-13: aom bum bu se shva r'a ya na ma: sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:258a-14: aom sham she k'a yee na ma: sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:258a-15: aom sum su dza ne tree na ma: sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:258a-16: aom tsam tsand'a lyee na ma: sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:258a-17: aom bam bihna mu kh'a ya na ma: sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:258a-18: aom mi ma h'a la kshmyee na ma: sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:258a-19: gtsug lag khang gi ched du ni //
T02D2531:258a-20: di ring shing gcod bdag spro bas //
T02D2531:258a-21: da ni khyod rnams bzod mdzad nas //
T02D2531:258a-22: shing gzhan la ni 'dir gnas mdzod //
T02D2531:258a-23: ces pa'i tshigs su bcad pa brjod nas shing la
T02D2531:258a-24: gnas pa'i lha rnams la gsol ba gdab par bya'o
T02D2531:258a-25: // de nas me tog la sogs pa rnams kyis
T02D2531:258a-26: yang dag par mchod nas shing gzhan la song bar
T02D2531:258a-27: // bsam par bya'o // re nas bsrung ba'i ched du rma bya chen mo bklag par bya'o //
T02D2531:258a-28: de'i rjes la las thams cad pa'i gzugs kyi shing
T02D2531:258a-29: mkhan la gser dang gos dang so rtsi la sogs
T02D2531:258a-30: pa rnams kyis yongs su mnyes par byas nas /
T02D2531:258a-31: sta re la yang sbrang rnam par byugs te /
T02D2531:258a-32: shing mkhan des kyang dge ba'i sems kyis lag pa
T02D2531:258a-33: g-yas pa bstod nas byang shar du gdong phyogs te
T02D2531:258a-34: nyi ma la bltas nas shing gcad par bya'o //
T02D2531:258a-35: de la yang dge ba dang mi dge ba'i mtshan ma blta bar bya'o //
T02D2531:258a-36: mi dge ba'i mtshan ma rnams yongs su spangs shing
T02D2531:258a-37: dge ba'i mtshan ma rnams yang dag par gzung bar
T02D2531:258a-38: bya'o // gang gi tshe byang phyogs su shing 'gyel
T02D2531:258a-39: ba de'i tshe sbyin bdag gi nor dang 'bru las
T02D2531:258a-41: dbang ldan gyi phyogs su 'gyel na rig pa dang shes pa dang lung du 'gyur ro //
T02D2531:258a-42: gang gi tshe dbang po'i phyogs su shing 'gyel na
T02D2531:258a-43: de'i tshe rgyal ba dang dpal mo dang phun sum
T02D2531:258a-45: de bzhin du shing gzhan lam bsnyes par bar du
T02D2531:258a-46: gang gi tshe 'gyel ba de'i tshe dge ba dang
T02D2531:258a-47: bde ba de bzhin du 'gyur ro //
T02D2531:258a-48: gang gi tshe shing gzhan la bsnyes shing 'gyel na sbyin bdag la 'jigs pa chen por 'gyur ro//
T02D2531:258b-3: rlung gi phyogs rnams su 'gyel na me'i 'jigs pa
T02D2531:258b-4: dang 'chi ba dang srin po dang chu dang rlung
T02D2531:258b-5: gi 'jigs pa rnams su grangs ji lta ba bzhin
T02D2531:258b-6: du 'gyur ro // skad 'dar zhing rgyang ring por
T02D2531:258b-7: lhung na yang sbyin bdag la sdug bsngal gyi mtshan
T02D2531:258b-9: pa'i tshe gal te rnga mo dang khyi dang ce
T02D2531:258b-10: sbyang dang sbrul dang phag dang bya rgod dang /
T02D2531:258b-11: bya rog la sogs pa'i gdug pa can gyi bya
T02D2531:258b-12: rnams lta bar byed na de'i tshe nges par gsod
T02D2531:258b-13: pa dang 'chi ba dpag tu med pa'i bgegs rnams
T02D2531:258b-14: su 'gyur ro // shing las gal te khrag 'dzag na de'i tshe sbyin bdag 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2531:258b-15: zho dang mar dang sbrang dang 'o ma 'bab na
T02D2531:258b-16: gsod pa dang 'ching ba la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa
T02D2531:258b-18: 'on kyang gang gi tshe shing rnams kyi rang bzhin
T02D2531:258b-19: mngar ba dang tsha ba dang kha ba dang bska
T02D2531:258b-20: ba la sogs pa'i ror gyur pa de'i tshe nyes
T02D2531:258b-21: pa med do // btsod kyi mdog gis sbal par
T02D2531:258b-22: shes par bya ste des kyang nang du 'gyur ro
T02D2531:258b-23: pa med do // // de bzhin du kha dog skya bos byi bar shes par bya ste /
T02D2531:258b-24: nad du 'gyur te shing des kyang chom rkun gyi
T02D2531:258b-25: 'jigs par 'gyur zhing glo'i nad skye bar 'gyur ro
T02D2531:258b-26: // kha dog ser pos shing gi nang du shes par bya ste /
T02D2531:258b-27: des kyang nor nyams par 'gyur ro //
T02D2531:258b-28: phug ron gyi kha dog gis de'i nang du khyim gyi da yig tu shes par bya ste /
T02D2531:258b-29: des sbyin bdag dbul por 'gyur ro //
T02D2531:258b-30: skya rings kyi mdog gis rtsangs par shes par bya ste /
T02D2531:258b-31: des nad dpag tu med pa skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2531:258b-32: kha dog ljang gus sbrul 'byung bar 'gyur te /
T02D2531:258b-33: des kyang de bzhin du nor zad par byed do //
T02D2531:258b-34: ral gri'i kha dog gis chur shes par bya ste /
T02D2531:258b-35: des de bzhin du chus 'jig par 'gyur ro //
T02D2531:258b-38: bkra shis dang dpal gyi be'u dang /
T02D2531:258b-39: bum pa dang rnga yab dang /
T02D2531:258b-43: 'jug bzhin pa'i lcags kyu rnams ni dge ba'i mtshan ma'o //
T02D2531:258b-44: de lta bu la sogs pa ma lus pa'i dge
T02D2531:258b-45: ba dang mi dge ba'i mtshan nyid rnams yongs su
T02D2531:258b-46: shes nas shing gcad par bya'o //
T02D2531:258b-47: de nas rnam par bcas pa'i shing rnams kyang yang dag par gzhal bar bya ste /
T02D2531:259a-1: 'dzer pa can rnams spangs ta bcu cha'i cha gcig gis lpags pa'i tshad du shes par bya'o //
T02D2531:259a-2: ji ltar shing rnams kyi nags kyi ltad mo bzhin
T02D2531:259a-3: du mchod rten dang sku gzugs la sogs pa'i don
T02D2531:259a-4: du rdo rnams kyi yang ri ltar 'gro bar bya'o
T02D2531:259a-5: // rdo ba yang bkra shis pa rnams gzung zhing
T02D2531:259a-6: bkra mi shis pa rnams yongs su spang bar bya'o
T02D2531:259a-7: // // de la ri'i 'gram du gnas nas phyogs
T02D2531:259a-8: bcu na gnas pa'i rdo rnams mthug pa dang sra
T02D2531:259a-9: ba dang dre zhim pa dang skad snyan pa dang
T02D2531:259a-10: reg bya bsil ba dang na tshod bar ma rnams
T02D2531:259a-11: // // dang / brtan pa dang mnyen pa dang shin tu 'jam pa dang sar pa rnams te /
T02D2531:259a-12: de gnyis nges par bsngags te /
T02D2531:259a-13: dkar ba dang sar ba dang ljang gu dang dmar
T02D2531:259a-14: po dang rngo nag kyang gal te ri mo dkar
T02D2531:259a-15: po phra mo dang thig le rnams dang ldan par
T02D2531:259a-16: gyur na da'i tshe blo dang gnyen dang /
T02D2531:259a-17: rus dang rigs dang rgyal bo'i phun sum tshogs pa dang g-yog rnams dge bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2531:259a-18: stang dang byang dang dbang ldan dang shar phyogs su
T02D2531:259a-19: gdong phyogs na grangs ji lta ba bzhin du mkha'
T02D2531:259a-20: la spyod pa'i dngos grub dang skye ba dang nor
T02D2531:259a-22: thar pa dang mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub ster ba'i rdo rnams gzung ngo /
T02D2531:259a-23: shin tu snyi ba dang bzod bsnun pa mi bzod pa dang stobs med pa rnams dang /
T02D2531:259a-24: rtsub pa dang mdog ngan pa dang sgra ngan pa dang rngo rgan pa rnams dang /
T02D2531:259a-25: de gnyis yongs su spangs te /
T02D2531:259a-26: da bzhin du rdo bzang ba dang /
T02D2531:259a-27: ngan pa shes nas bkra shis pa'i rdo rnams pa'i
T02D2531:259a-28: rnam lngas byugs te dri bzangs kyi chus khrus byas
T02D2531:259a-29: nas dri la sogs pas mchod par byas te /
T02D2531:259a-30: shing gi skabs su gsungs pa'i las thams cad 'dir yang bya'o //
T02D2531:259a-31: de nas grong khyer du zhugs pa'i dus su shing
T02D2531:259a-32: rnams dang rdo rnams la rgyal po'am grong khyer gyi
T02D2531:259a-33: skye bo rnams gtam smra shing chang gi dga' bas
T02D2531:259a-34: spro sems rgyas pa'i skye bo rnams kyis drang bar
T02D2531:259a-35: bya'o // bum pa gang ba dang mar me dang /
T02D2531:259a-36: sna tshogs pa'i rnga dang rol mo dang ca co
T02D2531:259a-37: dang skye bo rnams dang bdag po rnams kyis shin
T02D2531:259a-38: tu gus pa dang bcas pas 'jug par bya'o //
T02D2531:259a-39: yangs shing mnyam pa'i sa gzhi la 'bras phye'i chu skyes kyi dbus su gzhag par bya'o//
T02D2531:259b-0: @259b 'dir sgo la sogs pa gzugs pa ni mchu zla dang /
T02D2531:259b-5: smin drug zla ba rnams la tshes gnyis dang /
T02D2531:259b-11: bcu bzhi rnams la gza' zla ba dang /
T02D2531:259b-13: phur bu dang pa ba sangs rnams la /
T02D2531:259b-14: skar ma snar ma la nor rnyed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2531:259b-15: mgo la zhi ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2531:259b-16: skar ma lag la skal ba bzang po'i phyir ro //
T02D2531:259b-17: rgyal la rgyal ba dang phyi nas skye bo rnams 'phel ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2531:259b-18: me bzhi la dngos grub kyi ched du'o //
T02D2531:259b-19: snron la bde ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2531:259b-20: snubs dang gro bzhin la lung yongs su shes pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2531:259b-21: chu stod la bu yongs su 'phel ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2531:259b-22: khrums la nor 'phel ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2531:259b-23: zhi ba'i gza' la brten te dus sbyor bzang po dang thang cig bzang po brtag par bya'o //
T02D2531:259b-24: da ni shing la sogs pa'i tshad sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D2531:259b-25: de la go rims bzhin du bram ze dang /
T02D2531:259b-28: dmangs rigs rnams kyi phal che bas zhi ba dang
T02D2531:259b-29: rgyas pa dang dbang dang rgyas pa la dag ba
T02D2531:259b-31: seng ge dang glang po che dang ba la lang kun nas gnon par shas par bya'o //
T02D2531:259b-35: de la rdul phra rab bdun gyi rdul phran no //
T02D2531:259b-36: rdul phran bdun gyis rdul phra mo'o //
T02D2531:259b-37: rdul phra mo bdun gyis ri bong rdul lo //
T02D2531:259b-38: ri bong bdun gyis lug rdul lo //
T02D2531:259b-39: lug rdul bdun gyis glang rdul lo //
T02D2531:259b-40: glang rdul bdun gyis sro ma'o //
T02D2531:259b-41: sro ma bdun gyis shig go /
T02D2531:259b-43: / nas drug gis mtheb chung gi sor ro //
T02D2531:259b-44: nas bdun gyis gong mo'i sor ro //
T02D2531:259b-45: nas brgyad kyis mtheb chen gyi sor ro //
T02D2531:259b-47: mtho gnyis la khru gang ste zhes pa ni rigs kyi dbye ba dang /
T02D2531:259b-49: de la khang bzangs rnams kyi brgyad cha'am dgu cha'am bcu chas sgo'i zheng ngo //
T02D2531:259b-50: de yang cha sum cu sog gnyis so //
T02D2531:259b-52: cha bcu gnyis kyis re bzhi ste them pa yang ngo //
T02D2531:259b-53: yang na phyed dang bcas pa'i cha brgyad kyis so //
T02D2531:259b-54: phyed dang bcas pa'i cha drug gis dpung pa'o //
T02D2531:259b-55: yang na phyed dang bcas pa'i cha bzhis so//
T02D2531:260a-0: @260a * // de'i phyir phyed dang bcas pa'i cha gnyis kyi tshad kyis nye ba'i dpung pa'o //
T02D2531:260a-1: yang na phyed dang bcas pa'i cha gcig gis so //
T02D2531:260a-2: de'i phyi rol du cha lnga'i lo ma ste mnyam par bya'o //
T02D2531:260a-3: them pa dang sgo khyud ni phyed dang bcas pa'i cha bcu bzhis so //
T02D2531:260a-4: cha nyi shu rtsa gcig gi yal ga'o //
T02D2531:260a-5: de'i steng dang 'og tu rim pa ji lta ba
T02D2531:260a-6: bzhin phyed dang bcas pa'i cha drug pa can nam
T02D2531:260a-8: 'dir shing gi las rnams la ji ltar rjes su mthun pa'o //
T02D2531:260a-9: rdo rje dang rin po che dang padma dang 'khor lo dang /
T02D2531:260a-10: lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang //
T02D2531:260a-11: rig 'dzin la sogs pas brgyan pa'i rta babs la sogs pas ji ltar mdzes pa bzhin du bya'o //
T02D2531:260a-12: lha'i gnas la ni re mig gnyis kyi sgo'i zheng ngo //
T02D2531:260a-13: lhag ma ni sngon ma bzhin no //
T02D2531:260a-14: ka ba rnams kyi tshogs pa thams cad zlum dang
T02D2531:260a-15: srid du ldan pa mchog tu mdzes shing snyoms la
T02D2531:260a-16: dbyibs legs pa shin brtan pa'i shing rnams la bya'o
T02D2531:260a-17: // ma yo zhing gru bzhi la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2531:260a-18: de la phyed dang bcas pa'i cha brgyad dam bdun gyi ka ba'i zheng ngo //
T02D2531:260a-19: srid du gnas dang rjes su mthun par bya'o //
T02D2531:260a-20: zla ba'i ri mo'i 'og gi phyogs ka ba'i srid kyi dbus so //
T02D2531:260a-21: de'i steng du drug cha yongs su spangs nas phyed dang bcas pa'i cha gnyis kyi brgyud kyi cha'o //
T02D2531:260a-22: de'i steng du phyed dang bcas pa'i cha gcig gis
T02D2531:260a-23: cha bcu drug pa'i do shal gyi snam bu ste
T02D2531:260a-24: yang na padma'o // de'i steng du cha brgyad kyi ka ba ra dang bcas pa'i nor bu'i cha'o //
T02D2531:260a-25: de'i steng du phyed dang bcas pa'i cha gnyis kyis cha brgyad pa'o //
T02D2531:260a-26: de'i steng du cha gcig gis do shal gyi snam bu'o //
T02D2531:260a-27: ya ngan klu shing gi me tog gi phreng ba'o //
T02D2531:260a-28: de'i steng du cha gnyis pa'i brgyad kyi cha'i padma gnyis so //
T02D2531:260a-29: de'i steng du cha gsum gyis gru bzhi'o //
T02D2531:260a-30: de'i steng du chag gcig gis brgyad kyi cha'o //
T02D2531:260a-31: de'i steng du cha phyed kyis zlum po'o //
T02D2531:260a-32: de'i steng du cha drug gis tsi ra ka'o //
T02D2531:260a-33: de'i steng du cha drug gis zlum po'i rtse mo'o //
T02D2531:260a-34: de'i steng du cha gcig gis brgyad pa'i padma'o //
T02D2531:260a-35: de'i steng du lhag ma rnams gru bzhi'o //
T02D2531:260a-36: de'i steng du phyam 'dzin pa'i gdung bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i chas mtha' gnyis su'o//
T02D2531:260b-0: @260b de'i steng du ji lta ba'i tshad kyis phyam rnams bsgrig par bya'o //
T02D2531:260b-1: de la sgo rnams dang ka ba rnams kyi phyir
T02D2531:260b-2: spos dkar dang mar khus rnams par byugs te li
T02D2531:260b-3: khri la sogs pa'i rgyan rnams kyis brgyan par bya'o
T02D2531:260b-4: // sna tshogs pa'i gos la sogs pa 'phyang ba
T02D2531:260b-5: dang gdugs dang bri yang ku dang me tog dang
T02D2531:260b-6: gur kum dang d'ur wa dang /
T02D2531:260b-7: kunda dang byang chub kyi shing dang me long dang
T02D2531:260b-8: me tog gi phreng ba dang nyer spyod lnga dang
T02D2531:260b-9: / 'bras bu la sogs pa rnams kyang bsdogs byas te /
T02D2531:260b-10: de nas sgo so so'i phyogs rnams su gcig gam
T02D2531:260b-11: gsum mam lnga'am bdun nam thams cad kyi sgo rnams
T02D2531:260b-12: dang ka ba rnams rang rang gi phyogs su rnam
T02D2531:260b-13: par gnas pa'i khro bo'i rgyal po'i sngags rnams kyis
T02D2531:260b-14: yang dag par gnas par bya'o //
T02D2531:260b-15: de nas sgo gcig pa'i phyogs shar la sogs pa'i
T02D2531:260b-16: phyogs rnams su sgo bzhi pa rnams kyis bon h'um
T02D2531:260b-17: gi yi ge'o // de la 'di'i don ni ting
T02D2531:260b-18: nge 'dzin gsum gyis sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i rnal
T02D2531:260b-19: 'byor pas h'um yig las skyes pa'i sna tshogs chu
T02D2531:260b-20: gi yi ge'o // skyes dang / nyi ma'i steng
T02D2531:260b-21: du sku mdog dkar po phyag g-yas na zhags pa
T02D2531:260b-23: dpal rdo rje rnam par rgyal ba khro bo'i rgyal
T02D2531:260b-24: po chen po g-yas brgyang gis bzhugs pa dri ma
T02D2531:260b-25: de pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin nyi ma
T02D2531:260b-27: aom a'a: badzra bi dz'a ya ma h'a kro dha
T02D2531:260b-28: r'a dza h'um zhes pa'i sngags kyis lan brgya rtsa
T02D2531:260b-29: brgyad byin gyis brlabs par bya'o //
T02D2531:260b-30: de dang mtshungs pa'i ye shes sems dpa' gdan drangs te /
T02D2531:260b-31: mchod yon la sogs pa phul te yang dag par
T02D2531:260b-32: mchod cing bstod nas dam tshig sems dpa' dang lhan
T02D2531:260b-34: de yang yongs su gyur pa las shar gyi sgor rnam par bsam par bya'o //
T02D2531:260b-35: de la gal te yang ting nge 'dzin thams cad
T02D2531:260b-36: kyi spros pa med pa rnams par mi rtog ba
T02D2531:260b-37: des ro gcig pa nyid kyang bya ste /
T02D2531:260b-38: dbye rmed pa las dbye ba'o //
T02D2531:260b-39: de ji ltar ting nge 'dzin gang gis sems can
T02D2531:260b-40: thams cad kyi dri ma med par byed de dri
T02D2531:260b-41: ma med pa'i ting 'dzin zhes brjod do //
T02D2531:260b-42: de bzhin du lho'i sgor h'um yig las skyes pa'i
T02D2531:260b-43: sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D2531:260b-44: steng du zhabs g-yas brkyang gis bzhugs pa sku mdog
T02D2531:260b-45: ljang gu phyag gnyis pa ral gri dang padma phyag
T02D2531:261a-0: mtshan pa nam mkha' mdzod kyi ting @261a * //
T02D2531:261a-1: nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin khro bo gzegs ma zhes
T02D2531:261a-2: pa khro bo'i rgyal po bsgoms nas aom a'a: badzra
T02D2531:261a-3: ka ni ma h'a kro dha r'a dza h'um zhes
T02D2531:261a-4: pa 'dis brgya rtsa brgyad kyis byin gyis brlab par
T02D2531:261a-5: bya'o // de dang mtshungs pa'i ye shes sems dpa'
T02D2531:261a-6: gdan drangs te mchod yon la sogs pa phul te
T02D2531:261a-7: me tog la sogs pa rnams kyis yang dag par
T02D2531:261a-8: mchod nas dam tshig sems dpa' dang lhan cig tu
T02D2531:261a-9: gyur nas de yongs su gyur pa las lho'i sgor
T02D2531:261a-11: de bzhin du nub kyi sgor h'um yig las skyes
T02D2531:261a-12: ba'i sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma'i steng du
T02D2531:261a-13: zhabs g-yas brkyang gis bzhugs pa sku mdog dmar po
T02D2531:261a-14: padma dang lcags kyu bsnams pa dpa' bar 'gro ba'i
T02D2531:261a-15: ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin 'jig rten gsum rab
T02D2531:261a-16: tu bsgrub pa khro bo'i rgyal po chen po rnam
T02D2531:261a-17: par bsgoms nas / aom a'a:tri lokya pra s'a dha
T02D2531:261a-18: ka ma h'a kro dha r'a dza h'um zhes pa
T02D2531:261a-19: 'dis lan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis byin gyis brlab par
T02D2531:261a-20: par bsgoms nas / bya'o // sngon ma bzhin du
T02D2531:261a-21: byas nas nub kyi sgor rnam par bsam par bya'o
T02D2531:261a-22: par bsgoms nas / bya'o // // de bzhin du
T02D2531:261a-23: byang gi sgor h'um yig las skyes pa'i sna tshogs
T02D2531:261a-24: par bsgoms nas / bya'o // // chu skyes dang
T02D2531:261a-25: / nyi ma'i steng du sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i
T02D2531:261a-26: zhags pa dang sna tshogs rdo rje phyag na bsnams
T02D2531:261a-27: pa seng ge rnam par rol pa'i ting nge 'dzin
T02D2531:261a-28: gyi rang bzhin dpa' bo rnam par gnon pa'i khro
T02D2531:261a-29: bo'i rgyal po rnam par bsgoms nas /
T02D2531:261a-30: aom a'a: b'i ra bi kr'anta ma h'a kro dha
T02D2531:261a-31: r'a dza h'um zhes pa 'dis lan brgya rtsa brgyad
T02D2531:261a-32: kyis byin gyis brlabs nas sngon ma bzhin du byang
T02D2531:261a-33: sgor rnam par bsam par bya'o //
T02D2531:261a-34: de bzhin du dbang ldan gyi dang po nas dbang
T02D2531:261a-35: ldan gyi mthar thug pa'i sgo nyi shu rtsa bzhi
T02D2531:261a-36: rnams su h'um las skyes pa'i mi g-yo ba dang
T02D2531:261b-2: rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i gzugs rnams phyag gnyis
T02D2531:261b-3: pa phyag g-yon pa rnams na sdigs mdzub dang bcas
T02D2531:261b-4: pa'i zhags pa phyag g-yas pa rnams na rang rang
T02D2531:261b-25: ljang gu'i kha dog rnams so //
T02D2531:261b-26: gser dang dngul gyi bum pa zung gi steng du dgod par bya'o //
T02D2531:261b-27: de la mi g-yo ba ni sems can la byin
T02D2531:261b-28: gyis brlab pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rang
T02D2531:261b-29: bzhin no // phyag mtshan ni ral gri'o //
T02D2531:261b-30: aom a'a: aa tsa la ma h'a kro dha r'a
T02D2531:261b-31: dza h'um rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa ni dam
T02D2531:261b-32: tshig chen po las byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi
T02D2531:261b-33: rang bzhin no // de'i phyag mtshan ni rgyal mtshan no //
T02D2531:261b-34: aom a'a:bi dr'a ba ka ma h'a kro dha r'a dza h'um /
T02D2531:261b-35: rdo rje lcags kyu ni dam tshig gi lcags kyu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin no //
T02D2531:261b-36: de'i phyag mtshan ni lcags kyu'o //
T02D2531:261b-37: aom a'a: badzra aam ku sha ma h'a kro dha r'a dza h'um /
T02D2531:261b-38: gshin rje mthar byed ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D2531:261b-39: cad yang dag par mnyes pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi
T02D2531:261b-40: rang bzhin no // de'i phyag mtshan ni sna tshogs rdo rje'i tho ba'o //
T02D2531:261b-41: aom a'a: ya m'anta ka ma h'a kro dha r'a dza h'um /
T02D2531:261b-42: rdo rje gnam lcags ni rdo rje pha rol tu
T02D2531:261b-43: phyin pas byin gyis brlab pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi
T02D2531:261b-44: rang bzhin no // de'i phyag mtshan ni rdo rje'o //
T02D2531:261b-45: aom a'a: badzra aa sha ni ma h'a kro dha r'a dza h'um /
T02D2531:261b-46: blta bar dka' ba ni 'od kyi dkyil 'khor thams
T02D2531:261b-47: cad kyis byin gyis brlab pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi
T02D2531:261b-48: rang bzhin no // de'i phyag mtshan ni 'khor lo'o //
T02D2531:261b-49: aom a'a: dur n'i riksha ma h'a kro dha r'a dza h'um /
T02D2531:261b-50: 'dod pa'i rgyal po ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D2531:261b-51: cad 'gugs pa'i dam tshig gi ting nge 'dzin gyi
T02D2531:261b-52: rang bzhin no // de'i phyag mtshan ni lcags kyu'o //
T02D2531:261b-53: aom a'a: takki r'a dza ma h'a kro dha r'a dza h'um /
T02D2531:261b-54: mthar spyod pa ni rin po che'i byin gyis brlab pa /
T02D2531:261b-55: rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin no //
T02D2531:261b-56: de'i phyag mtshan ni sta re'o //
T02D2531:261b-57: aom a'a: aanta tsa ra ma h'a kro dha r'a dza h'um /
T02D2531:262a-0: rdo rje zhags pa ni dam @262a * //
T02D2531:262a-1: tshig 'bebs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin no //
T02D2531:262a-2: de'i phyag mtshan ni rdo rje zhags pa'o //
T02D2531:262a-3: aom a'a: badzra p'a sha ma h'a kro dha r'a dza h'um /
T02D2531:262a-4: shes rab mthar byed ni nor bu rin po che rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin no //
T02D2531:262a-5: de'i phyag mtshan ni rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug pa'o //
T02D2531:262a-6: aom aa: pra dzny'anta ka ma h'a kro dha r'a dza h'um /
T02D2531:262a-7: p'a l'a la ni mthon po'i byin gyi rlabs kyis ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin no //
T02D2531:262a-8: de'i phyag mtshan ni tho ba'o //
T02D2531:262a-9: aom a'a: p'a l'a ma h'a kro dha r'a dza h'um /
T02D2531:262a-10: rin chen gtsug tor ni dga' ba las byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin no //
T02D2531:262a-11: de'i phyag mtshan ni lcags kyu'o //
T02D2531:262a-12: aom a'a: ratna shi kha ra ma h'a kro dha r'a dza h'um /
T02D2531:262a-13: dbyug ba sngon po can ni ye shes rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin no //
T02D2531:262a-14: de'i phyag mtshan ni dbyug pa'o //
T02D2531:262a-15: aom a'a: n'i la danda ma h'a kro dha r'a dza h'um /
T02D2531:262a-16: rgyal dka' ba ni chos nyid byin gyis brlab pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin no //
T02D2531:262a-17: de'i phyag mtshan ni mdung ngo //
T02D2531:262a-18: aom a'a: du rdza ya ma h'a kro dha r'a dza h'um /
T02D2531:262a-19: rdo rje rgyas pa ni yang dag par 'phro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin no //
T02D2531:262a-20: de'i phyag mtshan ni lcags sgrog go //
T02D2531:262a-21: aom a'a: badzra spho ta ma h'a kro dha r'a dza h'um /
T02D2531:262a-22: padma mthar byed ni chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i rang bzhin no //
T02D2531:262a-24: aom a'a: padm'anta ka ma h'a kro dha r'a dza h'um /
T02D2531:262a-25: 'jigs byed ni sdug bsngal gcod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin no //
T02D2531:262a-26: de'i phyag mtshan ni ral gri'o //
T02D2531:262a-27: aom a'a: bhi ma ma h'a kro dha r'a dza h'um /
T02D2531:262a-28: rab gtum ni legs par rab tu gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin no //
T02D2531:262a-29: de'i phyag mtshan ni rdo rje gyes pa'o //
T02D2531:262a-30: aom a'a: pra tsanda ma h'a kro dha r'a dz'a h'um /
T02D2531:262a-31: stobs po che ni las kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin no //
T02D2531:262a-32: de'i phyag mtshan ni rtse gsum mo //
T02D2531:262a-33: aom a'a: ma h'a ba la ma h'a kro dha r'a dza h'um /
T02D2531:262a-34: rkang pa bskyod pa ni gsung rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin no //
T02D2531:262a-35: de'i phyag mtshan ni mda' dang gzhu'o //
T02D2531:262a-36: aom a'a: p'a da ni kshe pa ma h'a kro dha r'a dza h'um /
T02D2531:262a-37: rdo rje 'bebs pa ni dam tshig 'bebs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin no //
T02D2531:262a-38: de'i phyag mtshan ni rdo rje dril bu'o //
T02D2531:262a-39: aom a'a: badzra a'a be sha ma h'a kro dha r'a dza h'um /
T02D2531:262a-40: bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ni don yod rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin no //
T02D2531:262b-0: de'i phyag mtshan ni @262b rdo rje'o ;
T02D2531:262b-1: / aom a'a: aa mri ta kunda li ma h'a kro dha r'a dza h'um /
T02D2531:262b-2: rdo rje bzhad pa'i rdo rje brtan po'i rang bzhin no //
T02D2531:262b-3: de'i phyag mtshan ni ral gri'o //
T02D2531:262b-4: aom a'a: badzra aatta ha sa ma h'a kro dha r'a dza h'um /
T02D2531:262b-5: rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa ni bdud kyi stobs
T02D2531:262b-6: rab tu 'joms pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin
T02D2531:262b-7: no // de'i phyag mtshan ni rdo rje rtse lnga pa'o //
T02D2531:262b-8: aom a'a: badzra bi d'a ra na ma h'a kro dha r'a dza h'um /
T02D2531:262b-9: lhag ma rnams sngon ma bzhin no //
T02D2531:262b-10: ka ba rnams rin po che dang bcas pa'i rdo'i steng du gzugs par bya'o //
T02D2531:262b-11: de la shar gyi phyogs su gsum dang lnga dang
T02D2531:262b-12: bdun gzhon nu ma rnams kyi ka ba bzhi zung
T02D2531:262b-13: dang ldan pa ni yang dag par spong ba bzhi
T02D2531:262b-14: po rnams so // pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi rang bzhin ka bzung drug rnams so //
T02D2531:262b-15: bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang /
T02D2531:262b-16: tshad med pa'i gnas bzhi'i ngo bo nyid ni ka ba brgyad zung dang ldan pa ste /
T02D2531:262b-17: lhag par mos shing rang rang gi phyogs su gnas
T02D2531:262b-18: pa'i khro bo'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs nas h'um
T02D2531:262b-19: yig gi sa bon las byung bar dgod par bya'o
T02D2531:262b-20: // de bzhin du lho phyogs su dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'i rang bzhin rnams dang /
T02D2531:262b-21: byed pa drug gi rang bzhin rnams dang /
T02D2531:262b-22: bden pa bzhi dang bsam gtan bzhi po rnams so //
T02D2531:262b-23: de bzhin du nub phyogs su rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /
T02D2531:262b-24: mngon par shes pa drug gi rang bzhin rnams dang /
T02D2531:262b-25: mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ston pa bzhin rnams so //
T02D2531:262b-26: de bzhin du byang phyogs su so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
T02D2531:262b-27: rjes su dran pa drug gi rang bzhin dang 'phags
T02D2531:262b-28: pa'i lam yan lag brgyad kyi rang bzhin rnams so
T02D2531:262b-29: // de nas sgo rnams dang ka ba rnams la
T02D2531:262b-30: mnyam du so phag gi phreng ba mnyam par de
T02D2531:262b-32: ka ba'i steng du gdung 'dzin bkod nas de'i steng du gdung dgod do //
T02D2531:262b-33: gdung gi steng du gdung dang mnyam pa'i rtsig pa'i
T02D2531:262b-34: steng du klu'i stobs sam yang na do shal gyi
T02D2531:262b-35: snam bu'o // de'i steng du seng ge rnams kyi kha nas byas pa'am ma byas pa'o //
T02D2531:262b-36: de'i steng du rjes su dgug pa rnams so //
T02D2531:262b-37: de'i steng du so phag rnams kyis byas pa'i gzhi'o //
T02D2531:262b-39: gang gi tshe so phag gi rang bzhin yin na
T02D2531:262b-40: de'i cho gdung gi steng du gser gyi snam bu
T02D2531:263a-4: phyi rol du 'dod yon gyi stegs bu ste phyed kyi tshad kyi them pa'o //
T02D2531:263a-5: de nas sgo'i gnas dang bar du me'i mchod pa gsungs so //
T02D2531:263a-6: de la steng gi phyogs su sngon po dang /
T02D2531:263a-8: dmar po dang ljang gu'i lus la ri dags nag
T02D2531:263a-9: po'i pags pa'i na bza' can rgyan dang bral ba
T02D2531:263a-10: thugs zhi ba ral pa'i thor tshugs can mchog sbyin
T02D2531:263a-11: dang / bgrang phreng dang ril ba spyi blugs dang /
T02D2531:263a-12: dbyig pa phyag na bsnams pa tshangs skud dang bcas
T02D2531:263a-13: pa gos sna tshogs la 'phyang ba chu skyes la
T02D2531:263a-14: gnas pa'i nyi ma'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od can
T02D2531:263a-15: dka' thug la gnas pa'i drang srong chen po'i me
T02D2531:263a-17: aom ta pa s'agna ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:263a-18: de nas gnas ji lta bar so phag mnyam po
T02D2531:263a-19: la 'dzin byed kyi shing la mnyam du gzhag par
T02D2531:263a-20: bya'o // de nas dra sgo'i mtshan nyid brjod par bya'o //
T02D2531:263a-21: de la sgo'i sum cha'i cha gcig gis dra sgo'o //
T02D2531:263a-22: dkyil du srog chags kam pa ka da ka lta bu'o //
T02D2531:263a-23: dgu'i chas ma them 'og gi shing ngo //
T02D2531:263a-24: nyi shu'i chas sgo khyud do //
T02D2531:263a-25: nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i chas lo ma'o //
T02D2531:263a-26: de'i steng dang 'og tu phyed dang bcas pa'i bzhi cha'o //
T02D2531:263a-28: phyed dang bcas pa'i bzhi'i chas steng gi sgo khyud do //
T02D2531:263a-29: nyi shu brgyad kyi chas lo ma'o //
T02D2531:263a-30: drug gi chas steng dang 'og tu'o //
T02D2531:263a-31: phyed dang bcas pa'i bzhi chas dpung pa'o //
T02D2531:263a-32: phyed dang bcas pa'i chas gcig gis nye ba'i dpung ba'o //
T02D2531:263a-33: phyed dang sum cha ka ba'o //
T02D2531:263a-34: de'i steng du sum chas 'degs pa'i shing ngo //
T02D2531:263a-35: phyed dang bcas pa'i cha gnyis kyis dpung pa'i bar dang ka ba'i bar gyi shing ngo //
T02D2531:263a-36: phyed dang bcas pa'i cha bzhis lo ma'o //
T02D2531:263a-37: ma them dang bcas pas yongs su brgyan pa bya'o //
T02D2531:263a-38: de'i steng du rjes su 'dren pa rnams so //
T02D2531:263a-39: rig 'dzin mi mo gdung 'degs pa la sogs pa
T02D2531:263a-40: sna tshogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'am ji ltar mdzes
T02D2531:263a-42: de la de lta bu'i tshul gyis dra sgo gsum pa'am lnga pa'am bdun pa bya'o //
T02D2531:263a-43: so phag mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa nyid dgod par bya'o //
T02D2531:263b-0: de'i steng du ji ltar gnas pa'i shing zug dang so phag mi mnyam @263b par dgod par bya'o //
T02D2531:263b-1: gang gi tshe dra sgo gsum pa rnams la ni de'i tshe stong pa nyid dang /
T02D2531:263b-3: smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid rnams so //
T02D2531:263b-4: gang gi tshe lnga yin pa de'i tshe sha'i spyan dang /
T02D2531:263b-8: sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyi ngo bo nyid rnams so //
T02D2531:263b-9: gang gi tshe bdun yin pa de'i tshe byang chub
T02D2531:263b-10: kyi yan lag bdun gyi ngo bo nyid rnams so
T02D2531:263b-11: // de nas me la sogs pa'i zur rnams su
T02D2531:263b-12: khang pa rnams la gdung gru bzhi par gyur pa'i
T02D2531:263b-13: shing rnams kyi nang gi zur gyi steng du nor
T02D2531:263b-14: 'dzin rnams kyi 'og tu do shal gnyis pa dgod
T02D2531:263b-15: par bya ba yang dga' ba 'khyil ba'i rim pas
T02D2531:263b-16: // so // de'i steng du gdung rnams kyi steng
T02D2531:263b-17: du phyi dang nang du rtsig pa rnams dang mnyam
T02D2531:263b-18: pa'i mthar phur bu gnyis gdab par bya'o //
T02D2531:263b-19: de dag gi dbus su dbus kyi phur bu gdab par bya'o //
T02D2531:263b-20: mtha'i phur bu dang dbus kyi phur bu dag gi
T02D2531:263b-21: dbus su logs la phur bu gnyis gdab par bya'o
T02D2531:263b-22: // dbus kyi phur bu'i steng du ji ltar gnas pa'i ka ba rnams dgod par bya'o //
T02D2531:263b-23: logs kyi phur bu rnams kyi steng du rang rang
T02D2531:263b-24: gi gnas la stobs kyi phung po rnams dgod par
T02D2531:263b-25: bya'o // stobs kyi dpung pa rnams kyi steng du shing dkar po gnyis gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2531:263b-26: de nas khang bzangs kyi rtse mo'i steng du g-yas
T02D2531:263b-27: dang g-yon du rtse mor nor dang skye bo rnam
T02D2531:263b-28: par 'phel ba dang dug gzhom pa'i phyir yang ku
T02D2531:263b-30: dz'am gu li'i gzungs kyang mngon par bris te gser
T02D2531:263b-31: dang dngul las byas pa'i padma'i steng du yang dag
T02D2531:263b-32: par bzhugs la / de'i steng du dge ba'i tshes
T02D2531:263b-33: grangs dang yud tsam la skar ma mgo dang mon
T02D2531:263b-34: gru dang nags kyi shing gi yal gam rnying pa'i
T02D2531:263b-35: dus su kham yig las skyes pa'i sna tshogs rdo
T02D2531:263b-36: rje'i gzugs steng gi shing la rnam par bsgoms la
T02D2531:263b-37: par bzhugs la / / dpal ldan gtsug tor 'khor
T02D2531:263b-38: los sgyur ba'i sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad yang dag
T02D2531:263b-39: par bzlas la mchod pa byas nas yang dag par
T02D2531:263b-40: par bzhugs la / / dgod par bya'o // phyogs
T02D2531:263b-41: rnams su rang rang gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i bum
T02D2531:263b-42: pa rnams kyi chus mngon par dbang bskur te /
T02D2531:264a-0: sna tshogs pa'i gdugs dang gos dang lo ma rnams kyis brgyan @264a * //
T02D2531:264a-2: sna tshogs pa'i rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan pa /
T02D2531:264a-3: aee randa'i lo ma'i me dang lcags kyis kyang yang dag par bsrung bar bya'o //
T02D2531:264a-4: rdo rje dang dril bu dang bcas pas rang rang
T02D2531:264a-5: gi phyogs kyi bdag po'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngags
T02D2531:264a-6: lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na ge yi ge brgya
T02D2531:264a-8: na ma: sa manta buddh'a n'am /
T02D2531:264a-9: aom ma h'a pra tyam gi roshn'i sha tsa kra
T02D2531:264a-10: barti sarba yantra mantra bandha aindra bu ba na bandham
T02D2531:264a-11: pra ksha de bam bandham dha ra ya ai ha
T02D2531:264a-12: ba si n'am ye na ke na tsita bha y'a
T02D2531:264a-19: 'di ni gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'i sngags so //
T02D2531:264a-20: de la ku ru ku lee'i gzungs sngags ni /
T02D2531:264a-21: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
T02D2531:264a-22: na ma: sarba buddha bo dhi sa tve bhya:/
T02D2531:264a-23: na mo aashta ma h'a ya pum ga l'a ya na ma: sapte bhya:/
T02D2531:264a-26: aom hr'i: hr'i: hr'i: sarba n'a g'a n'am /
T02D2531:264a-28: b'a su ke ku l'a n'am /
T02D2531:264a-29: sham kha p'a la ku l'a n'am /
T02D2531:264a-33: ku li ka ku l'a n'am /
T02D2531:264a-34: pra la ha ku l'a n'am /
T02D2531:264a-35: punda r'i ka ku l'a n'am /
T02D2531:264a-36: ga na ka ku l'a n'am /
T02D2531:264a-38: dzva la dha ra ku l'a n'am /
T02D2531:264a-39: dzi m'u tam ku l'a n'am /
T02D2531:264a-41: aee r'a ba ti ku l'a n'am /
T02D2531:264a-42: ku mu ta ku l'a n'am /
T02D2531:264a-44: soo gandhi ka ku l'a n'am ;
T02D2531:264a-45: ha na ha na sha re na /
T02D2531:264a-47: t'a ta ya t'a d'a ya /
T02D2531:264a-49: bhi t'a n'a ma bh'a yam de hi pra la
T02D2531:264a-50: ya k'a la ai pa dza la dha ra ma
T02D2531:264a-53: n'a g'a ba sh'a ku ru phu: ku ru ku
T02D2531:264a-54: ru phu: k'a ra ya k'a ra ya phu: aom
T02D2531:264a-55: ku ru kullee hr'i: h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:264a-56: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
T02D2531:264a-62: li ye du mbe du ma l'a tarkke tarkka ra ne /
T02D2531:264a-69: aa aa ka sya yi ye shve te tunde /
T02D2531:264a-71: aom aa she dze tri sh'u la dzi h'a badzra k'a ya: gra sa gra sa /
T02D2531:264a-74: ma h'a yo gi shva ri h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:264a-75: 'di ni dzam gu li'i gzungs so //
T02D2531:264a-76: de nas shing gi 'bras bu rnams kyis dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D2531:264a-77: de nas lha rnams mnyes par bya ba'i phyir sbyin
T02D2531:264a-78: sreg gi bdud rtsis me lha yang dag par tshim
T02D2531:264b-0: @264b par bya'o // bsnams pa / sems can rnams
T02D2531:264b-1: rjes su 'dzin par byed pa po aarka'i shing gi
T02D2531:264b-2: yam shing gi sngon ma bzhin du 'bru la sogs
T02D2531:264b-4: aom aa mri ta aagna ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:264b-5: rtsa gsum rnam par dag pa mgo bo'i shing stobs 'dzin pa'i shing rnams so //
T02D2531:264b-6: rtsa lnga'i rnam par dag pa phur bu lnga'o //
T02D2531:264b-7: rtsa dpag tu med pa'i rang bzhin ni shing lhag ma rnams su rig par bya'o //
T02D2531:264b-8: de la mgo bo'i shing rnams kyi steng du kha dog gi shing rnams dgod par bya'o ;
T02D2531:264b-9: / khang bzangs kyi steng du blang ba'i phyed lhag
T02D2531:264b-10: pas yon tan sum 'gyur gyi tshad dam yon tan
T02D2531:264b-11: bzhi 'gyur gyi khang thog gi shing rnams kyi srid
T02D2531:264b-12: do // rdo rje'i mda'i dra ba'i rang bzhin rnams ni aom badzra sha ra dz'a la tram /
T02D2531:264b-13: de rnams kyi steng du thog gi shing rnams dgod par bya'o //
T02D2531:264b-14: rtsa ba'i gtso bo'i rang bzhin la aom badzra tsakra
T02D2531:264b-15: h'um zhes pa'i sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su
T02D2531:264b-16: bzlas par bya'o // shing gi las rnams ni gzhung
T02D2531:264b-17: mangs pas 'jigs pas ma bshad do zhes pa ni
T02D2531:264b-18: dpal pandi ta chen po rigs kyi sbyin pa mdzad
T02D2531:264b-19: pa'i bya ba bsdus pa panyidza k'a las rab tu
T02D2531:264b-22: // / rdo rje slob dpon rab zhugs nas //
T02D2531:264b-24: go rims bzhin du de nas ni //
T02D2531:264b-25: thig gdab rdol tshon dgye ba dang /
T02D2531:264b-26: me yi bya ba rnam pa dang //
T02D2531:264b-27: stegs bu dgod bya de nas ni //
T02D2531:264b-28: dam pa'i mtshan nyid yongs rdzogs nas //
T02D2531:264b-29: sku gzugs rnams ni gzhug par bya //
T02D2531:264b-30: de la gtsug lag khang du sku gzugs dang //
T02D2531:264b-33: sbyin sreg gi thab la sogs pa yongs su rdzogs
T02D2531:264b-34: pa la sngon du gsungs pa'i rim pas slob dpon
T02D2531:264b-35: la gsol ba btab la nyes pa zhi bar bya
T02D2531:264b-37: dge ba'i tshes grangs dang rgyu skar yud tsam rnams
T02D2531:264b-38: la dkyil 'khor bri ba'i don du bgegs zhi bar
T02D2531:264b-39: bya ba la khyim du lha'i rnal 'byor byas te
T02D2531:264b-40: / dad pas sbyin bdag gis phul ba'i gos dang
T02D2531:264b-41: rgyan dang so rtsi dang yon tan la sogs pa
T02D2531:264b-42: nyer spyod lnga'i mchod pa sngon du 'gro bas gos
T02D2531:265a-1: brgyan te rdo rje dang rdo rje dril bu bzung ste /
T02D2531:265a-2: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i nga rgyal
T02D2531:265a-3: gyis rang gi khang pa nas phyir zhugs nas rdo
T02D2531:265a-4: rje'i rkang stabs kyis gar byas te las rnams su
T02D2531:265a-5: gtor ma dbul bar bya ste /
T02D2531:265a-6: rang rang gi gnas na gnas pa'i lha dang klu dang /
T02D2531:265a-7: gnod sbyin la sogs pa rnams kyi mchod pa'i dus
T02D2531:265a-8: su de'i phyag rgya rab tu bstan nas rang rang
T02D2531:265a-9: gi sngags kyis mchod par bya zhing /
T02D2531:265a-10: sgeg mo la sogs pa brgyad po rnams kyis kyang
T02D2531:265a-11: dkyil 'khor chen po'i khang pa'i dbang lan gyi mtshams
T02D2531:265a-12: rnams su rab tu 'jug par bya'o zhes pa na
T02D2531:265a-13: / rdor je slob dpon rab tu 'jug pa'o /
T02D2531:265a-15: // / de'i rjes la ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgom pa'i ched u lha'i rnal 'byor gyi cho ga ni /
T02D2531:265a-16: aom sva bh'a ba shuddha: sarba dharm'a: sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham /
T02D2531:265a-17: bdag med pa la lhag par mos pas nang gi
T02D2531:265a-18: bdag nyid kyi khrus bas nas h'um yig dang rdo
T02D2531:265a-19: rje yongs su gyur pa las bdag nyid rdo rje
T02D2531:265a-20: me dang nyi ma 'bar bar bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2531:265a-21: sku mdog mthing nag phyag brgyad pa zhal bzhi pa'i
T02D2531:265a-22: rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje dang ril bus
T02D2531:265a-23: shes rab la 'khyud pa'i tshul can /
T02D2531:265a-24: phyag gzhan gnyis kyis ral gri dang sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa /
T02D2531:265a-25: phyag gnyis kyis 'khor lo dang kha tv'am ga: phyag gzhan gnyis kyis mda' dang gzhu 'dzin pa /
T02D2531:265a-26: rtsa ba'i zhal nag po g-yas dkar po /
T02D2531:265a-29: zhal so so la spyan gsum gsum pa /
T02D2531:265a-30: sbrul gyi rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan pa /
T02D2531:265a-32: dpal mo kun nas mnan pa /
T02D2531:265a-33: khro bo'i gzugs kyi rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2531:265a-34: de la hr'i: yig las mgrin par padma 'dab ma
T02D2531:265a-35: brgyad pa lce'i pad 'dab la h'um yig las rdo
T02D2531:265a-36: rje dkar po rtse mo lnga pas mtshan pa bskyed
T02D2531:265a-37: la 'dis byin gyis brlabs na rdo rje'i lce'o //
T02D2531:265a-38: lag pa gnyis la aa yig gis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis so //
T02D2531:265a-39: de dag gi steng du h'um yig gnyis las rdo rje rtse lnga pa gnyis bsam par bya'o //
T02D2531:265a-40: lag pa'i sor mo rnams kyang rtse mo'i rnams pas bgegs rnams 'dzoms par bya'o //
T02D2531:265a-41: aom badzra dzva l'a na l'arkka h'um bam /
T02D2531:265b-0: khro bo khyod kyis 'di rnams @265b bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2531:265b-1: aom grihna badzra sa ma ya h'um bam /
T02D2531:265b-2: rdor je bcings pa'i mthil du byas nas g-yog par bya'o //
T02D2531:265b-3: khro bo'i sems kyis rdo rje mtheb chen gyis bcad
T02D2531:265b-4: cing khro bo khyod kyis 'di rnams dran par bya'o
T02D2531:265b-5: // de nas me tog phreng ba la sogs pa'i
T02D2531:265b-6: dbang 'dzin pas aom badzra dzva l'a na l'a rka
T02D2531:265b-7: h'um aa bhi shinytsa tu m'am /
T02D2531:265b-8: rdo rje bcings pa'i mtheb chen gnyis kyi tshigs kyis
T02D2531:265b-9: mnyes pas mgo bo dang dpral ba'i steng du rna
T02D2531:265b-10: ba g-yas pa'i steng dang rgyab dang rna ba g-yon
T02D2531:265b-11: gyi steng du gzung bar bya'o //
T02D2531:265b-12: 'di rnams rdo rje khyod kyis bya'o //
T02D2531:265b-13: aom d'um gi go chags bgo bar bya'o //
T02D2531:265b-14: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis snying gar mdud pa'i tshul bya'o //
T02D2531:265b-15: de bzhin du mgrin pa dang rgyab dang slar yang
T02D2531:265b-16: snying ga dang nu ma'i bar dang slar yang snying
T02D2531:265b-17: ga dang mgrin pa dang rgyab dang dpral bar mdud
T02D2531:265b-18: pa'i tshul rnams byas nas mgo bor cod pan gyi
T02D2531:265b-19: dbang bskur sbyor ba'i mthar mnyam pa nyid kun gzhi
T02D2531:265b-20: dang ldan pa rdo rje dgyes pa zhes so //
T02D2531:265b-21: aom badzra dva l'a n'a lark'a h'um /
T02D2531:265b-22: g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur snying gar bkod nas
T02D2531:265b-23: lag pa g-yas pas rdo rje gsor zhing bgegs thams
T02D2531:265b-25: de nas rdo rje me 'od kyi nga rgyal gyis bgegs sreg pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D2531:265b-26: aom badzra n'a la da na da ha pa tsa ma tha bhanydza ra na h'um phat /
T02D2531:265b-27: nang du rdo ; rje bcings la mtheb chen gyis
T02D2531:265b-28: rdo rje bslangs pa sor mo rnams 'bar ba'i snying
T02D2531:265b-29: po'o // 'di ni rdo rje me 'od kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2531:265b-30: de'i rjes su rdo rje'i mig gis bgegs thams cad
T02D2531:265b-31: bcing bar bya ba ni rdo rje bcings nas g-yon
T02D2531:265b-32: pa dang cig shos rab tu brkyang ste mig gnyis
T02D2531:265b-33: la dgod par bya ba ni rdo rje mig gi
T02D2531:265b-35: de nas rdo rje bsrung ba'i nga rgyal gyis rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D2531:265b-36: aom badzra dri dho ma bha ba ra kasha sarbam sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:265b-37: rab tu brkyangs pa'i rdo rje bcings bas gzhil rab
T02D2531:265b-38: tu bkod pa ni rdo rje bsrung ba'i dam tshig
T02D2531:265b-39: gi phyag rgya'o // de'i rjes la rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi nga rgyal gyis steng bcing par bya'o //
T02D2531:265b-40: aom hu lu hu lu h'um phat /
T02D2531:265b-41: rdo rje khu tshur gnyi bcings nas mgal me'i 'khor
T02D2531:265b-42: lo bzhin du bskor zhing spyi bor sdigs mdzub lcags
T02D2531:265b-43: kyu'i rnam par gzung bar bya ba ni /
T02D2531:265b-44: rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi mig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2531:266a-1: bzhin du steng bcing bar bya zhing rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi nga rgyal gyis /
T02D2531:266a-3: rdo rje thal mos mthe ba chen gnyis rab tu
T02D2531:266a-4: brkyang ste sdigs mdzub gnyis mche ba bzhin byas pa
T02D2531:266a-5: ni rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi dam tshig gi phyag
T02D2531:266a-6: rgya'o // de nas gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'i
T02D2531:266a-7: nga rgyal gyis shar la sogs pa'i phyogs bcing bar
T02D2531:266a-8: rgya'o // bya'o // aom drum bhandha h'um /
T02D2531:266a-10: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi mthe'u chung gnyis lcags
T02D2531:266a-11: sgrog bcings te sdigs mdzub gnyis kyi rtse mo gdong
T02D2531:266a-13: gtsug tor du dgod pa ni rdo rje gtsug tor gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2531:266a-14: de'i rjes la rdo rje zhags pa'i nga rgyal gyis bgegs thams cad bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2531:266a-15: aom badzra p'a sha hr'i:rdo rje khu tshur gnyis rab tu brkyang ste /
T02D2531:266a-16: dpung par mdud pa byas pa ni rdo rje zhags pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2531:266a-17: de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi nga rgyal gyis nub kyi phyogs bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2531:266a-18: aom badzra b'a ta ke pa tam ke ni rat /
T02D2531:266a-19: rdo rje bcings pas mthe ba chen gnyis skyil krung
T02D2531:266a-20: byas te rtse mor byas la rtse mo mnyam pa'i
T02D2531:266a-21: kha bye ba'i gdong gi rtse mo ni ba dan
T02D2531:266a-22: gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2531:266a-23: za bzhin pa'i mthar rnam par dral ba'i ba dan
T02D2531:266a-24: ni rdo rje ba dan gyi dam tshig gi phyag
T02D2531:266a-25: rgya'o // de nas rdo rje su can gyi nga
T02D2531:266a-26: rgyal gyis bgegs rnams za bar bya zhing byang phyogs
T02D2531:266a-27: rgya'o // bcing bar bya'o // hr'i:badzra k'a li ru ta ma ta /
T02D2531:266a-28: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya bzhin du dgong
T02D2531:266a-29: du bstan par bya ba ni rdo rje dus can
T02D2531:266a-30: gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2531:266a-31: rdo rje rtse mo'i nga rgyal gyis lho phyogs bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2531:266a-32: aom badzra shi kha ra ru ta ma ta /
T02D2531:266a-33: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis ri bo 'gugs pa'i
T02D2531:266a-34: tshul byas nas lho phyogs kyi bgegs rnams la bsnun
T02D2531:266a-35: par bya'o // rdo rje rtse mo'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2531:266a-36: de la rdo rje las kyi nga rgyal gyis rdo rje'i rab sbyin par bya'o //
T02D2531:266a-38: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te phan tshun du
T02D2531:266a-39: rgyab gnyis sbyar la mthe'u chung gnyis lcags sgrog tu
T02D2531:266a-40: byas la sdigs mdzub dang gung mo dag bslang la
T02D2531:266a-42: rdo rje las ra ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2531:266a-43: de'i rjes la rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi rnal 'byor gyis nang gi ra ba bya'o //
T02D2531:266a-44: badzra h'um ka re na h'um /
T02D2531:266a-45: rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya las dbus ma gnyis
T02D2531:266a-46: bskum pa ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal
T02D2531:266b-1: de nas rdo rje mtshams kyi nga rgyal gyi rdo rje'i gur sbyin par bya'o //
T02D2531:266b-3: rdo rje bcings nas steng du 'gying zhing rab tu brkyang ba ni gur gyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2531:266b-4: slar yang rdo rje me 'od kyi nga rgyal gyis
T02D2531:266b-5: de'i phyag rgya dang ldan pas mchod pa'i yan lag
T02D2531:266b-7: aom badzra n'a la ha na da ha pa tsa ma za bhanydza ra na h'um /
T02D2531:266b-8: de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgyas dung byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D2531:266b-10: slar yang rdo rje bsrung ba'i phyag rgyas dung byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D2531:266b-12: slar yang rdo rje rtse mo'i phyag rgyas dung byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D2531:266b-13: aom badzra shi kha re ru ta ma ta zhes bya ba ni dung gsum mo //
T02D2531:266b-14: slar yang dung gsum rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig

T02D2531:284b-43: rdo rje 'khor lo sul chen po //
T02D2531:284b-44: rdo rje mchog ni rab tu bskor //
T02D2531:284b-45: rdo rje rgyan nyid khyod la 'dud //
T02D2531:284b-46: rdo rje smra pa rigs legs mchog / rdo rje rgyal ba rigs legs bsgrub //
T02D2531:284b-47: mi smra rdo rje blo gris mchog //
T02D2531:284b-48: rdo rje gsung nyid khyod la 'dud //
T02D2531:284b-49: rdo rje las ni rdo rje mchog //
T02D2531:284b-50: rdo rje'i las ni legs ldan pa //
T02D2531:284b-51: don yod rdo rje rgya chen po //
T02D2531:284b-52: sna tshogs rdo rje khyod la 'dud //
T02D2531:284b-53: rdo rje bsrung ba brtson 'grus che//
T02D2531:285a-0: @285a * // rdo rje'i chos ni brtan pa che //
T02D2531:285a-1: thub par dka' ba'i brtson 'grus mchog / rdo rje brtson 'grus khyod la 'dud //
T02D2531:285a-2: rdo rje gnod sbyin thabs chen po //
T02D2531:285a-3: rdo rje'i mche ba mtshon cha che //
T02D2531:285a-4: bdud rnams 'du byed rdo rje mchog / rdo rje gtum po khyod la 'dud //
T02D2531:285a-5: rdo rje mtshams ni nye bar bsnyen //
T02D2531:285a-6: rdo rje 'ching ba rab sgrol ba //
T02D2531:285a-7: rdo rje khu tshur dam tshig mchog / rdo rje khu tshur khyod la 'dud //
T02D2531:285a-8: ces pa'i bstod pa nye bar bsdus pas dril bu
T02D2531:285a-9: dkrol bar bya'o zhes pa ni las rgyal mchog ces
T02D2531:285a-12: // / de nas 'chad par gyur pa'i rim pas gtor ma dang bdud rtsi myang ba yang bya'o //
T02D2531:285a-13: yi ge brgya ba yang brjod par bya'o //
T02D2531:285a-14: sngon bzhin du phyi'i mchod pa rnams dang /
T02D2531:285a-15: sgeg mo la sogs pa brgyad kyis dril bu dkrol bar bya'o //
T02D2531:285a-16: phyag 'tshal ba bzhi byas nas bzod par gsol to //
T02D2531:285a-17: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa rnams kyi rdo rje sems dpa' dang /
T02D2531:285a-19: chos dang rdo rje las rnams kyis gnas nyid la
T02D2531:285a-20: gnas pa'i rnam par snang mdzad kyi gtsug tor gyi
T02D2531:285a-21: gnas la / de la rdo rje rin chen gyi
T02D2531:285a-22: dam tshig gi phyag rgya snying gar bzhengs nas phyag
T02D2531:285a-23: rgya thams cad kyis dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D2531:285a-24: aom badzra ratn'a bhi shinytsa zhes so //
T02D2531:285a-25: de'i rjes la sngon ma bzhin du go cha bya'o //
T02D2531:285a-26: aom sarba mu dra mee tri ku ru ba ra ka ba tse na bam /
T02D2531:285a-27: mtha' la mnyam pa nyid kyi kun gzhi mnyes par
T02D2531:285a-28: bya'o zhes pas mngon par 'dod pa'i don bsgrubs te
T02D2531:285a-29: yongs su bsdu ba bya ste /
T02D2531:285a-30: gang zhig bdag gi cho ga chad par byas pa de thams cad bzod par gsol bar bya'o //
T02D2531:285a-31: mchod yon phul nas bskul zhing gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02D2531:285a-32: gang dang gang las yang dag par byung ba'i phyag
T02D2531:285a-33: rgyas de bzhin du de dang de las grol bar
T02D2531:285a-34: bya'o // sems dpa' rdo rje la sogs pa'i phyag rgyas grol bar bya'o //
T02D2531:285a-35: aom khyed kyis sems can dod kun mdzad //
T02D2531:285a-36: rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol //
T02D2531:285a-37: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang //
T02D2531:285a-38: slar yang 'byon pa nyid du zhu //
T02D2531:285a-40: aom badzra mu: de nyid kyis thams cad gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02D2531:285a-41: ji lta ba bzhin sprul gyur pa'i //
T02D2531:285b-0: @285b de bzhin yid kyis legs sbyor bas //
T02D2531:285b-1: rang gi lus la rab tu gzhug / rdo rje gnod sbyin srung ba dang //
T02D2531:285b-2: dro rje mtshams dang bcas pa yi //
T02D2531:285b-3: las kyi phyag rgya rnams kyis kyang //
T02D2531:285b-4: bdag nyid kyang ni yang dag bsrung //
T02D2531:285b-9: sa gnon gyi phyag rgya byas nas /
T02D2531:285b-10: aom aa k'a ra mu kha sarba dharmma n'am a'adya nutpanna tv'ata /
T02D2531:285b-12: zhes pa 'dis dkyil 'khor 'khor lo gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02D2531:285b-13: de nas bzhengs te bya ba thams cad bya zhing
T02D2531:285b-14: bya ba'i rjes su bar bar na lha'i nga rgyal
T02D2531:285b-15: dang ldan pas spyod lam bya'o ;
T02D2531:285b-16: / rdo rje sems dpa' sbyor ba'i bdag nyid kyi
T02D2531:285b-17: rnal 'byor zhes bya ste 'di ni lha'i rnal 'byor
T02D2531:285b-18: ro // de nas dri bzangs kyi chus dkyil 'khor gyis gzhi la mngon par gtong te /
T02D2531:285b-19: aom bhu kham zhes brjod nas nam mkhar 'degs bar bya'o //
T02D2531:285b-20: de nas h'um lam h'um zhes pa 'dis rdo rje'i rang bzhin du rnam par bsgom par bya ste /
T02D2531:285b-21: aom me di n'i badzr'i bh'a wa bandha h'um zhes pa 'dis so //
T02D2531:285b-22: aom ha na ha na badzra kro dha h'um phat /
T02D2531:285b-25: shoddha raksha raksha h'um h'um phat ces pa 'di'i sngags
T02D2531:285b-26: kyis kyang lag pa byin gyis brlab par bya'o zhes
T02D2531:285b-27: pas nang gi bdag nyid dang po sbyang bar bya'o//
T02D2531:285b-28: de nas sems dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs nas bdag nyid rab tu dga' bar bya ste /
T02D2531:285b-29: de ring bdag cho 'bras bur bcas //
T02D2531:285b-30: bdag nyid gson pa'ang 'bras bur bcas //
T02D2531:285b-31: sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig mtshungs //
T02D2531:285b-32: bdag ni the tshom mi za bar //
T02D2531:285b-33: phyir mi ldog par bdag 'gyur te //
T02D2531:285b-34: byang chub sems dpar sems gcig nyid //
T02D2531:285b-35: bdag ni the tshom mi za bar //
T02D2531:285b-36: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su skyes //
T02D2531:285b-37: bdag ni mchog tu dga' ba nyid //
T02D2531:285b-38: bdag mchod de ring bla na med //
T02D2531:285b-39: de ring 'dus par bdag mchog tu //
T02D2531:285b-40: sangs rgyas thams cad mgron du gnyer //
T02D2531:285b-41: yan lag thams cad kyis phyag 'tshal nas h'um las lce rdo rjer byas te /
T02D2531:285b-42: sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol ba gdab par byas te /
T02D2531:285b-43: ma lus phyogs rnams yang dag bzhugs //
T02D2531:285b-44: sangs gyas rnams ni dgongs su gsol //
T02D2531:285b-45: bdag ni rdo rje che ge mo //
T02D2531:286a-1: rgyas thams cad gshegs su gsol //
T02D2531:286a-2: bdag la 'dir ni dngos grub stsol //
T02D2531:286a-3: de'i rjes la nam mkha' la bzhugs pa'i mi bskyod
T02D2531:286a-4: pa la sogs pa bzhi po rnams kyi shar phyogs
T02D2531:286a-5: la sogs par gnas pa'i slob ma rnams kyis /
T02D2531:286a-6: rang rang gi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rnal 'byor dang
T02D2531:286a-7: ldan pas ji ltar 'os pa'i rdo rje dang dril
T02D2531:286a-8: bu bzung nas / slob ma gcig gis kyang de dang der song nas gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02D2531:286a-9: sarba ta th'a ga ta sh'intam sarba t'a th'a ga t'a la yi /
T02D2531:286a-10: sarba dharm'a gra nee r'atmya de sha mandala mutta mam /
T02D2531:286a-11: sarba laksha na sam p'urna sarba la ksha na pa r'a dzi tam /
T02D2531:286a-12: sa manta bha dra k'a y'a grabh'a sha mandala mutta mam /
T02D2531:286a-13: sh'anta dharmm'a gra sam bh'u tam dzny'a na tsa rya bi sho dha kam /
T02D2531:286a-14: sa manta bha dra b'a ts'a gra bh'a sha mandala mutta mam /
T02D2531:286a-15: sarba sa tva ma h'a tsi ttam shuddh'am pra kri ti ni rma lam /
T02D2531:286a-16: sa manta bha dra tsitt'a gra gho sha mandala sha
T02D2531:286a-17: ra the zhes pa'i tshigs su bcad pa bzhi po
T02D2531:286a-18: rnams kyis dkyil 'khor bri pa ni gsol ba gdab
T02D2531:286a-19: par bya'o // tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis mdor bstan nas /
T02D2531:286a-20: gsum gyis rgyas par bshad par bya'o //
T02D2531:286a-21: mandalam de sha dang bh'a sha dang gho sha dang zhes pas bshad du gsol zhes pa'i don to /
T02D2531:286a-23: // / de nas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la sogs
T02D2531:286a-24: pa spro ba la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom pa
T02D2531:286a-25: sngon du 'gro bas rdo rje khu tshur gyi sdigs
T02D2531:286a-26: mdzub gnyis rab tu brkyang nas rtse mo sbyar te
T02D2531:286a-27: kha 'og tu bstan nas gzung bar bya'o //
T02D2531:286a-28: h'um badzro tishtha zhes brjod nas nam mkha' la yang dag par 'degs par bya'o //
T02D2531:286a-29: de'i rjes la yol ba'i nang du 'dug nas 'khor los sgyur pa'i tshul du bzung la /
T02D2531:286a-30: gos la sogs pas brgyan te /
T02D2531:286a-31: rkang pa mnyam por gnas nas yol ba bsal te /
T02D2531:286a-32: rim pa bzhin du dbu rgyan dang /
T02D2531:286a-42: rkang pa rnams la brten nas /
T02D2531:286a-43: sa rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa'i sgrib pa
T02D2531:286a-44: dang bral ba zhes mtshon pa la sogs pa'i rdo
T02D2531:286a-45: rje can gyis nges par spros te /
T02D2531:286a-46: de nas spyi bor me tog gi snyim pas /
T02D2531:286a-47: aom phra na m'a mi sarba ta th'a ga to mi zhes pas phyag bya'o //
T02D2531:286a-48: de nas snying gar thal mo sbyar nas /
T02D2531:286b-0: aom sarba ta @286b th'a ga te bhya: a'atma n'am
T02D2531:286b-1: niry'a ta y'a mi zhes pas bdag nyid dbul bar
T02D2531:286b-2: bya'o // ya bandha: sarba sa hra: satva sa gram
T02D2531:286b-3: he na sam gra ha ni: aanda dz'a la badzra
T02D2531:286b-4: yu dz'a pa sam sve da dz'a p'a /
T02D2531:286b-5: aom p'a pa du ka ba ru pa na pa
T02D2531:286b-6: aa ru bi ni be sam dznyi no p'a sarbe
T02D2531:286b-7: satva ma y'a ma h'a mu dra pa de pra
T02D2531:286b-9: zhes pa'i smon lam btab bo //
T02D2531:286b-10: ma rig pa'i mun par yongs su lhung ba'i bdud
T02D2531:286b-11: kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i sems can rnams la mngon
T02D2531:286b-12: par bltas te bdud rnams bskrad par bya'o //
T02D2531:286b-13: skad cig gis rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi sku khro
T02D2531:286b-14: bo'i dbang las smin mtshams su khro gnyer bsdus shing
T02D2531:286b-15: mche ba gtsigs pa bsnyen pa dang bcas pa'i thugs
T02D2531:286b-16: la sogs pas / ma ka re na su rye ki ta sa bya ne tram /
T02D2531:286b-17: ta k'a re na tsa ntr'i kri ta pa ma
T02D2531:286b-18: ne tre: aom kro dhi drishti hri: zhes pa dang
T02D2531:286b-19: / h'um gi ges mig gi 'bras bu gnyis bskal
T02D2531:286b-20: ba'i mtha' ma'i me bzhin du byas nas rdo rje'i
T02D2531:286b-21: lta bas phyogs thams cad du 'gro ba rnams bltas
T02D2531:286b-22: / nas / nga rgyal kyang bskyed par bya'o //
T02D2531:286b-23: aa ham me ba sva yam badzra badzra pra tra mya ham sam yam /
T02D2531:286b-24: aa ham buddho ma h'a r'a dza aa ham /
T02D2531:286b-26: aa ham yo g'i shva ri r'a dza badzra p'a ni ra ham dri dham zhes so //
T02D2531:286b-27: 'gying bcas mchog tu sgig pa yis //
T02D2531:286b-28: rdo rje gsor ba mchog de la //
T02D2531:286b-29: dbang ldan phyogs nas brtsams nas ni ;
T02D2531:286b-30: / nga rgyal gyis ni yongs su bcag / de
T02D2531:286b-31: bzhin du sgrub pa po phyi ma thams cad kyis
T02D2531:286b-32: kyang yongs su bcag par bya'o //
T02D2531:286b-33: 'on kyang shar phyogs su gnas pa'i sgrub pa po phyi mas /
T02D2531:286b-34: h'um gi ge las rkang pa'i mthil du rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i rkang par bsams te /
T02D2531:286b-35: rkang pa g-yas pas rgyab dang mdun du sa gzhi la rnam par bya'o //
T02D2531:286b-36: de bzhin du rkang pa g-yon pas brkyang ngo //
T02D2531:286b-37: aom ae sha su tsi ka badzra p'a da badzra
T02D2531:286b-38: ma h'a kro dha bha nydza sarba dushta su r'a
T02D2531:286b-39: na h'um phat / aa pa sa rantu bha banto /
T02D2531:286b-40: ye ke tsi ta de ba su ra na yaksha r'a ksha sa pre ta pi sh'a tsa /
T02D2531:286b-41: aa pa sm'a ra d'a ka n'i ao sta ra ka / ma h'a la li k'a /
T02D2531:286b-42: aa nu tsa ra pa ri sha ta /
T02D2531:286b-46: aa tra pri thv'i de shi /
T02D2531:286b-47: aa mu ke na ma y'a /
T02D2531:286b-48: aa mu ka sya d'a na pa te /
T02D2531:286b-49: ra bhe sam bo dha pa ri p'urn'a rtha sarba
T02D2531:286b-50: satv'a nutta ra dzny'a na la bdha he to: shr'i
T02D2531:286b-51: aa mu ka mandala ma le khi ta byam /
T02D2531:286b-52: ti da dam ma h'a badzra dha ra ra dzny'a
T02D2531:286b-53: shru tra sh'i ghram me bha ba kra ma tha
T02D2531:287a-2: ta sy'a ham ne na pra dzva la te na h'um ka re na /
T02D2531:287a-3: di dhe na ma h'a t'a dzny'a na badzre na m'u rdh'a n'am /
T02D2531:287a-4: sha ta bi k'i ra mi /
T02D2531:287a-5: zhes brjod pas khro bo dpag tu med pa spros nas bgegs rnams bskrad par bya'o //
T02D2531:287a-6: dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi yang bcud kyi mthil la
T02D2531:287a-7: thug par h'um las skyes pa'i rdo rje'i rang bzhin
T02D2531:287a-8: du byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D2531:287a-9: de bzhin du lho phyogs su gnas pa'i sgrub pa
T02D2531:287a-10: po phyi mas rkang pa'i mthil du h'um yig las
T02D2531:287a-11: rdo rje rtse gsum pa bsams la sa gzhi la
T02D2531:287a-12: yang rnam par bya zhing sngags brjod pas yongs su
T02D2531:287a-15: badzra p'a da badzra ma h'a kro dha bhanydza sarba dushta su r'a na h'um phat /
T02D2531:287a-16: aa pa sa rantu bha banto /
T02D2531:287a-17: ye ke tsi ta sth'a na b'a pi na: n'a ga yaksha gandharba bh'u ti ni d'a ki n'i /
T02D2531:287a-18: satva aartha kri ya aa ram bhe gatstsha tva shr'i ga me ba tu /
T02D2531:287a-19: shri n'antu parba bi ghnoo gh'a: k'a ya b'a ka tsitta sam stha tva /
T02D2531:287a-21: sh'i m'an a'a dz'a tsa kra pra yo dza ka
T02D2531:287a-22: badzra na aa d'ipta ba p'u sha aaspha ya mi
T02D2531:287a-24: lam gha ye ta ya di dam kashtsi ta me
T02D2531:287a-25: bi sh'arya te n'a tra sha sha ya: zhes brjod
T02D2531:287a-26: nas khro bo dpag tu med pa spros te bgegs
T02D2531:287a-28: dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi yang bcud kyi mthil la
T02D2531:287a-29: thug par h'um las skyes pa'i rdo rje'i rang bzhin
T02D2531:287a-30: du byin gyis brlab par bya'o //

T02D2531:287a-32: po phyi mas rkang pa'i mthil du h'um yig las
T02D2531:287a-33: skyes pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsams la sa
T02D2531:287a-34: gzhi la yang rnam par bya zhing sngags brjod pas
T02D2531:287a-36: aom panytsa su tsi ka badzra p'a da badzra ma
T02D2531:287a-37: h'a krodha bham dza sarba du shta aa su r'a
T02D2531:287a-38: na h'um phat / aa pas rantu bha banto //
T02D2531:287a-39: ye ka tsi ta de ba aa su ra n'a
T02D2531:287a-40: ga yaksha ma ho r'a garya pasma ra bh'u ta
T02D2531:287a-41: bhu dhi n+ya: bi sh'a tsa gu hya gandharba kinna
T02D2531:287a-42: roo sta ra ka ka ta p'u ta na sa
T02D2531:287a-43: nu tsa ma ha na li ka ma ha la
T02D2531:287a-44: ka tsa / aa n+ye pi ye ke tsi ta pri thi b'i ta le /
T02D2531:287a-45: aasminni ba sa na to bha banta /
T02D2531:287a-47: aa ha ma mu ka n'a ma ts'arya:/
T02D2531:287a-48: aa mu ka n'a ma n'am mandala rma yi shy'a mi /
T02D2531:287a-49: aa mu ka shi shya sy'a bhi sam bo dhi pa ri p'u ra n'arthi /
T02D2531:287a-50: aa to sm'a na m'a ma dzny'a shru ta sh'i ghra me bha pra kra mi ta byam /
T02D2531:287a-51: yo na pra kra metta sya badzra p'a ni ra
T02D2531:287a-52: dzva li ta ki ra na badzra na mudhi sha
T02D2531:287b-0: zhes brjod nas khro bo dpag tu @287b med pa spros te bgegs rnams bskrad par bya'o //
T02D2531:287b-1: dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi yang bcud kyi mthil la

T02D2531:287b-3: du byin gyis brlab par bya'o //

T02D2531:287b-6: skyes pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje bsams la sa gzhi

T02D2531:287b-8: phyogs dang mdun du rnam par bya zhing rkang pa
T02D2531:287b-9: g-yon pas rgyab dang g-yon phyogs su rnam par byas

T02D2531:287b-11: sngags brjod pas yongs su bcag par bya'o //
T02D2531:287b-12: aom bi shva badzra p'a da badzra ma h'a kro
T02D2531:287b-13: dh'a bham dza sarba dushta aa su ra na h'um
T02D2531:287b-14: phat / aa pa sa rantu ma h'a bighna ye ke tsi ta ka ta p'u ta n'a /
T02D2531:287b-15: ma h'a su kha dzny'a na sam bh'u tam badzra
T02D2531:287b-16: pa tra sva bh'a ba dz'a: aa ham ka ra
T02D2531:287b-17: n'a pa la: shr'i m'a na raksha tsakra pa yo
T02D2531:287b-18: dza ka: badzra n'a d'i p'a /
T02D2531:287b-19: ba p'u sh'a spha ya mi kri k'a ya dz'a na /
T02D2531:287b-20: lam gha ye ta ya di da ka shtsi ta me bi shr'i hyed aa tra na n+ya tha /
T02D2531:287b-21: zhes brjod nas khro bo dpag tu med pa spros te bgegs rnams bskrad par bya'o //
T02D2531:287b-22: dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi yang bcud kyi mthil la
