T02D2531:302a-6: r'a nu pra bishta: sarba dharmma: aa tyant'a nu pra
T02D2531:302a-7: bishta: sarba dharmma: aom badzra satva h'um zhes pas thig
T02D2531:302a-9: de'i rjes la sgrub pa po phyi ma dkyil 'khor
T02D2531:302a-10: gyi khang pa'i phyi rol gyi phyogs kyi rang gi
T02D2531:302a-11: mtshams su gnas nas lha la sogs pa rnams la

T02D2531:302a-17: // // de'i steng du ram yig las byung ba'i me'i dkyil 'khor dmar po'o //
T02D2531:302a-18: de'i steng du h'um yig gsum las yang dag par
T02D2531:302a-19: byung ba'i thab kyi steng du aa: yig las byung
T02D2531:302a-20: ba'i zas kyi snod dkar po chen po de las

T02D2531:302a-23: gi yi ge rnams las byung ba'i sgron ma lnga'i

T02D2531:302a-28: dog lta bu khu ba'i gzugs su khol te //
T02D2531:302a-29: de'i rlangs pa yongs su gyur pa las h'um yig

T02D2531:302a-31: ba las bdud rtsir gyur te dngul chu dang mtshungs
T02D2531:302a-32: pa shin tu 'bar bar rnam par bsgoms nas //
T02D2531:302a-33: de'i steng du aom yig las byung ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yang rnam par bsgoms te //
T02D2531:302a-34: de nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor las byung ba'i yi
T02D2531:302a-35: ge gsum las 'od zer 'phros pas phyogs bcur song
T02D2531:302a-36: ste lha dang lha mo rnams gdan drangs te 'o

T02D2531:302a-38: de la de bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D2531:302a-39: de la yi ge gsum gyis rdo rje dang zla
T02D2531:302a-40: ba'i dkyil 'khor la yang de la de bzhin du
T02D2531:302a-41: rnam par thim par bltas te //
T02D2531:302a-42: yi ge gsum gyis lan gsum du byin gyis brlabs
T02D2531:302b-0: @302b te de ye shes bdud rtsir bsgrubs nas 'chad
T02D2531:302b-1: par 'gyur ba'i rim pas dam tshig pa gdan drangs
T02D2531:302b-2: ba dang gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas bltas nas pi wang
T02D2531:302b-3: la sogs pa rol mo bcu'i sgra byas nas mchod
T02D2531:302b-4: yon la sogs pa phyi'i mchod pa rnams kyis mchod
T02D2531:302b-5: nas lha'i dbang po la sogs pa'i 'jig rten skyong
T02D2531:302b-6: ba rnams dpung pa bzang po'i rgyud kyi tshigs su

T02D2531:302b-10: de bzhin du skye mched la mngon par zhen pa'i
T02D2531:302b-11: lha rnams tshim par bya ba'i phyir rkang mar gyi
T02D2531:302b-12: rgyun no // de bzhin du phung po la mngon
T02D2531:302b-13: par zhen pa'i lha rnams tshim par bya ba'i phyir
T02D2531:302b-15: de bzhin du gzugs la sogs pa mngon par chags
T02D2531:302b-16: pa'i lha rnams tshim par bya ba'i phyir chang gi
T02D2531:302b-17: rgyun no // de bzhin du 'dod chags la sogs
T02D2531:302b-18: pa'i sems su 'gyur ba'i lha rnams tshim par bya
T02D2531:302b-19: ba'i phyir khrag gi rgyun no //
T02D2531:302b-20: de nas gshegs par bya ste /
T02D2531:302b-21: dung dang rnga la sogs pa'i rol mo'i sgra sngon
T02D2531:302b-22: du 'gro bas g-yas skor du rim gyis gtor ma
T02D2531:302b-23: chen po rab tu dbul bar bya'o zhes pa ni
T02D2531:302b-25: da ni 'dir lha lhag par gnas pa'o //
T02D2531:302b-26: dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su brtags nas dkyil 'khor
T02D2531:302b-27: gyi gnas thams cad du dri bzangs kyis nye bar
T02D2531:302b-29: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i gnas rnams su tsandan gyis
T02D2531:302b-30: gru bzhi pa byas nas me tog la sogs pa
T02D2531:302b-32: lha'i gnas lhag ma rnams su zlum phor bya'o //
T02D2531:302b-33: de la yang lha lnga bcu rtsa gsum gyi rnam par bsgoms te /
T02D2531:302b-34: rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa rnams kyis ye
T02D2531:302b-35: shes sems dpa' dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing
T02D2531:302b-36: ba dang dbang du bya ba rnams byas nas /

T02D2531:302b-38: pa'i me tog rnams kyis yang dag par mchod cing
T02D2531:302b-39: nyer spyod lngas kyang yang dag par mchod nas bstod

T02D2531:302b-41: ste / de'i rjes la sngon ma bzhin du lce rdo rjer rnam par bsams la /
T02D2531:303a-1: sa ra sva ti s'atya m'a bar ya sho dha
T02D2531:303a-2: ya h'um hr'i: ra hr'i: zhes pas lce rdo rjer
T02D2531:303a-3: byin gyis brlabs la pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga

T02D2531:303a-7: rigs pa'i rgyal po khyod la 'dud //
T02D2531:303a-8: mgon po rnams ni bzhed pa mthun //
T02D2531:303a-9: dkyil 'khor thugs rje'i bdag nyid can //
T02D2531:303a-10: slob ma rnams la brtse phyir dang //
T02D2531:303a-11: khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir //
T02D2531:303a-12: de la bcom ldan bdag gus la //

T02D2531:303a-14: sangs rgyas 'gro mgon bya don stsol //
T02D2531:303a-15: byang chub sems dpa' 'bras gnas dang //
T02D2531:303a-16: gzhan yang gang dag gsang sngags lha //
T02D2531:303a-17: lha dang 'jig rten skyong rnams dang //

T02D2531:303a-22: rdo rje can chen che ge bdag / che ge 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor ni //
T02D2531:303a-23: ji ltar nus shing nyer spyad pas //
T02D2531:303a-24: 'gro rnams dag phyir bdag gis bri //
T02D2531:303a-25: bdag gi slob ma dam pa yi //
T02D2531:303a-26: rjes su brtse ba yongs bzung la //
T02D2531:303a-27: dkyil 'khor dang bcas thams cad la //
T02D2531:303a-28: nye bar gnas par mdzad du gsol //

T02D2531:303a-31: 'khor lo'i bdag po la sogs pa rnams nam mkha'i
T02D2531:303a-33: 'di ni lha lhag par gnas pa'o //
T02D2531:303a-34: de nas dri yis nye bar byugs pa'i thig skud

T02D2531:303a-36: la sogs pas nye bar byugs te /
T02D2531:303a-37: dri dang me tog bdug spos dang mchod yon la
T02D2531:303a-38: sogs pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod nas sgeg
T02D2531:303a-39: mo la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang ngo //

T02D2531:303a-41: las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bskyed nas
T02D2531:303a-42: nam mkha' las byon zhing rang rang gi phyogs kyi
T02D2531:303a-43: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'dus par gyur nas /

T02D2531:303b-1: yig la sogs pa las bskyed pa'i ye shes kyi

T02D2531:303b-7: mi bskyod pa la gsol ba gdab par bya'o //

T02D2531:303b-14: zhes pas don yod grub pa la gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02D2531:303b-15: de bzhin du mtshan yongs su brjod pas /
T02D2531:303b-16: rdo rje sems dpa' nas brtsams te /
T02D2531:303b-17: ji srid rdo rje 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa la gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02D2531:303b-18: de nas dza yig ser po las zla ba dang nyi ma'i rang bzhin mig gnyis la /
T02D2531:303b-19: aom d'ipta dri shtya ku shi dz'a:/
T02D2531:303b-20: zhes brjod nas myur du rab tu bskyod pa'i mig

T02D2531:304a-0: skud bzung nas dzdza: dzdza: dzdza: zhes dzdza: @304a *
T02D2531:304a-1: // yig gis bkug nas de bzhin du de nyid la zhal mngon par phyogs pas gnas te /

T02D2531:304a-3: lho phyogs su gnas nas byang du zhal mngon par

T02D2531:305a-12: pa'i sum cu so bzhi sum cu so bzhi'i re
T02D2531:305a-13: kh'a rnams dbyi'o // de bzhin du ka ba brgyad
T02D2531:305a-14: rnams la so sor thig bzhi rnams dbyi bar bya'o
T02D2531:305a-15: kh'a rnams dbyi'o // // de bzhin du glang po
T02D2531:305a-16: dang seng ge'i gnas la so sor gnas pa'i thig
T02D2531:305a-17: kh'a rnams dbyi'o // // bzhi rnams dbyi'o // de
T02D2531:305a-18: bzhin du logs kyi ka ba dag gi bar du
T02D2531:305a-19: gnas pa'i so sor thig lnga lnga dbyi bar bya'o
T02D2531:305a-20: kh'a rnams dbyi'o // // bzhi rnams dbyi'o // //
T02D2531:305a-21: de bzhin du stegs bu'i gnas la gnas pa'i so
T02D2531:305a-23: de bzhin du rin chen pha gu la gnas pa'i so sor thig gsum rnams dbyi'o //
T02D2531:305a-24: de bzhin du dra ba dra phyed kyi sa gzhi
T02D2531:305a-25: la gnas pa'i so sor re kh'a bzhi bzhi rnams
T02D2531:305a-26: da byi'o // de bzhin du rin chen shar bu'i
T02D2531:305a-27: sa gzhi la gnas pa'i so sor re kh'a lnga
T02D2531:305a-28: da byi'o // lnga rnams dbyi'o // de bzhin du
T02D2531:305a-29: mda' yab kyis gzhil gnas pa'i so sor re kh'a
T02D2531:305a-31: kun bsdus pas lha'i snam bu rnams la thig drug
T02D2531:305a-32: cu rtsa bzhi rnams dbyi bar bya'o zhes pa ni
T02D2531:305a-33: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi thig rnams dbyi ba'i cho ga'o
T02D2531:305a-34: // thig gdab pa dang rdul tshon dgye ba la
T02D2531:305a-35: yang rdul tshon sbyang ba ni gzhung gzhan gyis bshad
T02D2531:305a-37: da ni rgyud du gsungs pa'i thig bshad par bya ste /
T02D2531:305a-38: srad bu gsar zhing shin tu mdzes //
T02D2531:305a-39: tshad dang nges par ldan pa yis //
T02D2531:305a-40: ji ltar nus bzhin dkyil 'khor la //
T02D2531:305a-41: shes rab can gyis thig gdab bya //
T02D2531:305b-0: zur bzhi @305b pa dang sgo bzhi pa //
T02D2531:305b-1: rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan //
T02D2531:305b-2: thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan //
T02D2531:305b-3: dar dpyangs me tog phreng bas brgyan //
T02D2531:305b-4: zur bzhi cha rnams thams cad dang //
T02D2531:305b-5: sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams rnams la //
T02D2531:305b-6: rdo rje rin chen gyis sbras pa'i //
T02D2531:305b-7: dkyil 'khor phyi thig gdab par bya'o //
T02D2531:305b-8: de yi 'khor lo so sor gsal //
T02D2531:305b-9: rab zhugs nang gi pho brang la //
T02D2531:305b-10: rdo rje'i thig ni yongs su gdab //
T02D2531:305b-11: ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes //
T02D2531:305b-12: phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid 'bab pa'i //
T02D2531:305b-13: mkhas pas dkyil 'khor thig gdab po //
T02D2531:305b-14: shar nub byang du gdong phyogs nas //
T02D2531:305b-15: dkyil 'khor la ni thig brgyad do //
T02D2531:305b-16: phyi yi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i //
T02D2531:305b-17: nang gi dkyil 'khor pho brang phyed //
T02D2531:305b-18: gru bzhi pa dang sgo bzhi pa //
T02D2531:305b-19: stegs bu dang ni bcas pas 'dod //
T02D2531:305b-20: rdo rje'i thig ni yongs bskor ba'i //
T02D2531:305b-21: rta babs dang ni bral ba gzhan //
T02D2531:305b-22: dkyil 'khor lnga yis brgyan pa yis //
T02D2531:305b-23: mkhas pas srad bus thig gdab po //
T02D2531:305b-25: de nas 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rim pas gdan drangs
T02D2531:305b-26: pa la sogs pa rang rang gi phyag rgyas rab
T02D2531:305b-27: tu brten nas rang rang gi phyogs na bzhugs pa'i
T02D2531:305b-28: dbang po la sogs pa'i 'jig rten skyong ba rnams
T02D2531:305b-29: la phyi'i gtor ma dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2531:305b-30: de nas dril bu'i sgra yis rdo rje glu ma
T02D2531:305b-31: rnams kyis mtshan mngan pa rnams bsal bar bya ste
T02D2531:305b-32: // chos dbyings 'di ni dag pa ste //
T02D2531:305b-33: sems can khams rnams rnam grol ba //
T02D2531:305b-34: rang 'byung rnam par snang mdzad rgyal //
T02D2531:305b-35: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas //
T02D2531:305b-36: nyes pa kun dang rnam phral ba'i //
T02D2531:305b-37: 'khor lo'i nang du yang dag bzhugs //
T02D2531:305b-38: zhes brjod nas chos kyi dbyings su mos par byas la /
T02D2531:305b-39: nang gi dkyil 'khor du gnas pas rdo rjes mtshan
T02D2531:305b-40: pa'i lag pa g-yas dang g-yon gyi rdo rje khu
T02D2531:305b-41: tshur gyis // aom badzra tsi tra yam ya ram
T02D2531:305b-42: ga aom a'a: h'um zhes brjod nas dbang ldan gyi
T02D2531:305b-43: phyogs nas brtsams te shar du zhal phyogs pas g-yas
T02D2531:305b-44: skor gyis rdul tshon dgye bar bya'o //
T02D2531:305b-45: sboms pa yis ni nang du 'gyur //
T02D2531:305b-46: phra mos nor rnams rnam par nyams //
T02D2531:305b-47: yon po yis ni rnam par 'gras //
T02D2531:306a-2: g-yas skor min pas btab gyur na //
T02D2531:306a-3: rdul tshon rnams ni phur bur 'gyur //
T02D2531:306a-4: phan tshun du ni rnam 'dres pas //
T02D2531:306a-6: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i skyon rnams dang bral bas rdo rje'i re kh'a dge ba rnams bya'o //
T02D2531:306a-7: nag po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang
T02D2531:306a-8: gu dang dkar po zhes pa rnams phyi nas rim
T02D2531:306a-9: bzhin du ste / rnam par snang mdzad kyi gtso bo la'o //
T02D2531:306a-10: gang gi tshe mi bskyod pas gtso bo byed pa
T02D2531:306a-11: de'i che dkar po dang ser po dang dmar po
T02D2531:306a-12: dang ljang gu dang nag po rnams so //
T02D2531:306a-13: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gtso bo la dkar po
T02D2531:306a-14: dang nag po dang dmar po dang ljang gu dang
T02D2531:306a-16: 'od dpag med kyi gtso bo la dkar po dang
T02D2531:306a-17: ser po dang nag po dang ljang gu dang dmar
T02D2531:306a-18: po rnams so // don yod grub pa'i gtso bo
T02D2531:306a-19: la dkar po dang ser po dang dmar po dang
T02D2531:306a-20: nag po dang ljang gu rnams so //
T02D2531:306a-21: de bzhin du yang rgyun du //
T02D2531:306a-22: nag po rdo rje'i rang bzhin rtse //
T02D2531:306a-23: gser gyi mdog tu 'bab pa gzhan //
T02D2531:306a-24: padma r'a ga'i rang bzhin rtse //
T02D2531:306a-25: de bzhin dmar po min pa gzhan //
T02D2531:306a-26: dkar po nang du shes bya ste //
T02D2531:306a-27: 'di ni tshon gyi rim par bshad //
T02D2531:306a-29: shar du nag po chen po ste //
T02D2531:306a-30: lho ru ser po yang dag ldan /
T02D2531:306a-31: dmar po nub kyi tsha la ste //
T02D2531:306a-32: btsod kha byang du yang dag ldan //
T02D2531:306a-33: dbus kyi sa gzhi'i cha la ni //
T02D2531:306a-34: shel gyi mdog ni bla na med //
T02D2531:306a-35: rtag tu rdo rje dril 'dzin pas //
T02D2531:306a-36: mnyam gzhag nas ni yang dag bri //
T02D2531:306a-37: rdo rje ka ba'i steng gnas pa'i //
T02D2531:306a-40: rdul tshon 'gongs pa dang thig 'gongs pa'i nyes pa yongs su gzhom pa'i phyir sngags brjod par bya'o //
T02D2531:306a-41: aom badzra be g'a kra ma h'um /
T02D2531:306a-42: de bzhin du yang gsungs te /
T02D2531:306a-43: yid kyis re kh'a yongs su gdab //
T02D2531:306a-44: de nas rdo rje'i thig skud la'ang /
T02D2531:306a-46: dam tshig nyams pa med pas so //
T02D2531:306a-48: lha lnga bcu rtsa gsum gyi gdan sna tshogs padma lnga bcu rtsa gsum gdab par bya'o //
T02D2531:306a-49: de rnams kyi ze'u 'bru rnams la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du mtshan ma dgod par bya'o //
T02D2531:306a-50: de la rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i rdo rje dkar po rtse lnga pa'o //
T02D2531:306b-0: de'i mdun du sems ma rdo rje ma'i rdo rje dmar po rtse @306b lnga pa'o //
T02D2531:306b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yas phyogs logs su rin chen
T02D2531:306b-2: rdo rje ma'i rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa'i
T02D2531:306b-3: yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'o //
T02D2531:306b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyi rgyab tu chos kyi rdo rje
T02D2531:306b-5: ma'i padma 'dab ma bcu drug pa dkar dmar te
T02D2531:306b-6: / 'dab ma brgyad rnams 'og tu rnam par rgyas
T02D2531:306b-7: shing steng du yang nang nas rdo rje rtse lnga
T02D2531:306b-8: pas mtshan pa'i kha 'bus pa rnams ni 'dab ma
T02D2531:306b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yon du las kyi rdo rje
T02D2531:306b-11: ma'i rtse mo bcu gnyis pa kha dog lnga pa'i
T02D2531:306b-13: dbus kyi kha dog dkar po'o //
T02D2531:306b-17: g-yon gyi mar ka ta'i kha dog lta bu'o //
T02D2531:306b-19: shar gyi dkyil 'khor la mi bskyod pa'i rdo rje nag po rtse lnga pa'o //
T02D2531:306b-20: rdo rje sems dpa'i rdo rje dkar po'o //
T02D2531:306b-21: rdo rje rgyal po'i rdo rjes mtshan pa'i lcags kyu'o //
T02D2531:306b-22: rdo rje chags pa'i mda' 'gengs pa'o //
T02D2531:306b-23: rdo rje legs pa'i rdo rje dang bcas pa'i lag
T02D2531:306b-24: pa gnyis kyis legs par byed pa rab tu sbyin
T02D2531:306b-25: pa'o // lho'i dkyil 'khor la rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rdo rjes mtshan pa'i rin po che'o //
T02D2531:306b-26: rdo rje rin chen gyi rdo rjes mtshan pa'i rin po che'i phreng ba'o //
T02D2531:306b-27: rdo rje gzi brjid kyi nyi ma'o //
T02D2531:306b-28: rdo rje tog gi yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan no //
T02D2531:306b-29: rdo rje bzhad pa'i rdo rjes mtshan pa'i so'i phreng ba'o //
T02D2531:306b-30: nub kyi dkyil 'khor la 'od dpag med kyi rdo rjes mtshan pa'i padma'o //
T02D2531:306b-31: rdo rje chos kyi gdong dang bcas pa'i padma'o //
T02D2531:306b-32: rdo rje rnon po'i ral gri dang pu sti'o //
T02D2531:306b-33: rdo rje rgyu'i 'khor lo ser po rtsibs brgyad pa'o //
T02D2531:306b-34: rdo rje smra ba'i chos kyi dung ngo //
T02D2531:306b-35: byang gi dkyil 'khor la don yod grub pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje'o //
T02D2531:306b-36: rdo rje las kyi de nyid dang bcas pa'o //
T02D2531:306b-37: rdo rje bsrung ba'i rdo rje las byas pa'i go cha'o //
T02D2531:306b-38: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi rdo rjes mtshan pa'i mche ba bzung ngo //
T02D2531:306b-39: rdo rje 'ching ba'i rdo rje khu tshur dag gis bzung ba'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa ser po'o //
T02D2531:306b-40: me la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams la rdo rje sgeg mo rdo rje gnyis so //
T02D2531:306b-41: rdo rje phreng ba ma'i rin po che'i phreng ba'o //
T02D2531:306b-42: rdo rje glu ma'i pi wang ngo //
T02D2531:306b-43: rdo rje gar ma'i rdo rje rtse gsum pas mtshan
T02D2531:306b-44: pa'i lag pa gnyis so zhes pa ni nang gi
T02D2531:307a-1: dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams rnams la mel sogs pa rnams so //
T02D2531:307a-2: rdo rje bdug sbos ma'i spos phor ro //
T02D2531:307a-3: rdo rje me tog ma'i me tog gi za ma tog go /
T02D2531:307a-4: rdo rje snang gsal ma'i mar me'i sdong po'o //
T02D2531:307a-5: rdo rje dri chab ma'i dri'i dung ser po'o //
T02D2531:307a-6: shar la sogs pa'i sgo'i logs gnyis su byams pa'i
T02D2531:307a-7: yal ga dang bcas pa'i klu shing gi me tog
T02D2531:307a-8: go // mthong ba don yod kyi spyan dang bcas pa'i chu skyes so //
T02D2531:307a-9: ngan song kun 'joms kyi lcags kyu'o //
T02D2531:307a-10: mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad 'joms pa'i blo gros kyi dbyug pa'o //
T02D2531:307a-11: spos kyi glang po'i dung ngo //
T02D2531:307a-13: nam mkha' mdzod kyi padma la gnas pa'i dam pa'i chos kyi sgron ma'o //
T02D2531:307a-14: ye shes tog gi yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan no //
T02D2531:307a-17: bzang skyong gi 'bar ba dang bcas pa'i rin po che'o //
T02D2531:307a-18: dra ba can gyi 'od zer rdo rje'i gur ro //
T02D2531:307a-19: rdo rje'i snying po'i rdo rje mthing ga dang bcas pa'i autpala'o //
T02D2531:307a-20: blo gros mi zad pa'i bum pa bzang po'o //
T02D2531:307a-21: stobs pa brtsegs pa'i padma la gnas pa'i rin po che brtsegs pa'o //
T02D2531:307a-22: kun du bzang po'i rin po che'i snye ma'o //
T02D2531:307a-23: shar la sogs pa'i sgo bzhi'i dbus su shar du rdo rje lcags kyu'i lcags kyu'o //
T02D2531:307a-24: rdo rje zhags pa'i zhags pa'o //
T02D2531:307a-25: rdo rje rgyas pa'i lcags sgrog go //
T02D2531:307a-26: rdo rje 'bebs pa'i rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dril bu'o
T02D2531:307a-27: zhes pa ni lha rnams kyi mtshan ma dgod pa'o
T02D2531:307a-28: // rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
T02D2531:307a-29: rdo rje rtse mo yongs su bzlas pa'i rnam lnga dang /
T02D2531:307a-30: rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pa'i bdud rtsi lnga dang /
T02D2531:307a-31: rdo rje bsrung ba yongs su bzlas pa'i dri bzangs
T02D2531:307a-32: kyi chus dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rnams bsang gtor bya
T02D2531:307a-33: ste / las thams cad yongs su bzlas pa'i 'bru thams cad kyis yongs su gang ba dang /
T02D2531:307a-34: rdo rje rin chen yongs su bzlas pa'i me tog sil ma yongs su bkram ste /
T02D2531:307a-35: rdul tshon lhag ma rnams aom a'a: h'um badzra mu:
T02D2531:307a-36: zhes pas ye shes kyi rdul tshon gshegs su gsol
T02D2531:307a-37: nas rdul tshon gyi snod rnams kyang dben par gzhag
T02D2531:307a-38: par bya'o zhes pa ni rdul tshon dgye ba'i cho
T02D2531:307a-40: / de nas sngon bzhin du gtor ma chen po
T02D2531:307b-0: phyi @307b rol du phul nas rab tu byed pa
T02D2531:307b-1: gsum par gsungs pa'i rim pas bum pa lhag par
T02D2531:307b-2: gnas par byas nas rab tu byed pa gsum par
T02D2531:307b-3: gsungs pa'i rim pa de nyid kyis bum pa dgod
T02D2531:307b-4: par bya'o // de nas slob dpon gyis 'khor lo'i
T02D2531:307b-5: dbang phyug gi bdag nyid kyis bri bar bya ba'i
T02D2531:307b-6: dkyil 'khor la skad cig gis gsungs pa'i 'khor lo
T02D2531:307b-7: dang bgegs la phur bus gdab pa la sogs pa
T02D2531:307b-8: par bya'o // bsgoms te / dkyil 'khor gyi rang
T02D2531:307b-9: bzhin du nges par brtags nas ye shes sems dpa'
T02D2531:307b-10: gdan drangs nas mchod yon dang zhal bsil la sogs
T02D2531:307b-11: pa sngon du 'gro bas me tog la sogs pa
T02D2531:307b-12: nams kyis yang dag par mchod cing bstod pa yang
T02D2531:307b-13: par bya'o // bsgoms te / bya ste / dam
T02D2531:307b-14: tshig gi 'khor lo rab tu bzhugs par bsam mo
T02D2531:307b-15: par bya'o // bsgoms te / bya ste / //
T02D2531:307b-16: 'khor lo'i dbang phyug gi sngags brgya rtsa brgyad dang
T02D2531:307b-17: par bya'o // bsgoms te / bya ste / //
T02D2531:307b-18: / de las gzhan dkyil 'khor la so so'i rnams
T02D2531:307b-19: kyis lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gis byin gyis brlabs
T02D2531:307b-20: par bya'o // bsgoms te / bya ste / //
T02D2531:307b-21: / te / yi ge brgya pa yang brjod nas
T02D2531:307b-22: nyer spyod lnga la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod nas
T02D2531:307b-23: sgeg mo la sogs pa brgyad kyi cho gas kyang
T02D2531:307b-24: gtor ma dang zhal zas dbul zhing dkyil 'khor lhag
T02D2531:307b-26: thig 'debs pa nas brtsams te ji srid me'i lha
T02D2531:307b-27: lhag par gnas pa'i mthar thug pa nyi ma so
T02D2531:307b-28: so la thun mtshams gsum du teng nge 'dzin bsgoms
T02D2531:307b-30: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs
T02D2531:307b-31: pa dam pa'i chos klog pa dang phyi rol gyi
T02D2531:307b-32: gtor ma yang dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2531:307b-33: mtshan mo tshogs kyi 'khor lo bya'o /
T02D2531:307b-34: gtor ma dbul bar bya ba'i phyir dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa las phyir byung ba dang /
T02D2531:307b-35: slar yang rab tu 'jug par bya ba'i phyir //
T02D2531:307b-36: lag pa g-yas pa gan rkyal du byas nas gung
T02D2531:307b-37: mo dang ming med cung zad bskum ste mngon par
T02D2531:307b-38: gdong gi phyogs su gzung bar bya'o //
T02D2531:307b-39: de'i pus mo'i nang du lag pa dag byas te
T02D2531:307b-40: tsog pur 'dug nas mi smra bas lag pa'i mthil
T02D2531:307b-41: gyi cha yis kha la mig tu yongs su reg
T02D2531:307b-42: cing lan gnyis sam gsum du rna ba'i bug dang
T02D2531:307b-43: mig dang kha dang lag pa dag dang lte ba
T02D2531:307b-44: dang mgo bo rnams la yang las thams cad pa'i
T02D2531:307b-45: bum pa'i chus reg cing nye reg kyang nyi ma
T02D2531:307b-47: de bzhin du nyi ma so so la dkyil 'khor
T02D2531:307b-48: la bcom ldan 'das nges par brtag pa la me
T02D2531:308a-2: aom badzro dgha ta ya sa ma ya pra be
T02D2531:308a-3: sha ya h'um zhes pa'i sngags kyis sgo rnams dbye
T02D2531:308a-4: bar bsams nas / aom sa ma ya pra bi
T02D2531:308a-5: sha ya mi zhes brjod pas me tog gi phreng
T02D2531:308a-6: ba gar gyis bzung ste rang gi spyi bor bcings
T02D2531:308a-7: te 'khor lo la phyag 'chal nas sems can thams
T02D2531:308a-8: cad la dngos grub thams cad kyis bka' drin mdzad
T02D2531:308a-9: du gsol lo zhes zhu ba bya zhing bsgom pa
T02D2531:308a-11: de'i rjes la slob ma rnams lhag par gnas par bya'o //
T02D2531:308a-12: 'ga' zhig gsang sngags dngos grub phyir //
T02D2531:308a-14: gzhan yang bsod nams 'dod de las //
T02D2531:308a-15: 'jig rten pha rol don gnyer gzhan //
T02D2531:308a-16: 'jig rten pha rol nyer bstan phyir //
T02D2531:308a-17: slar yang ngad par byas nas ni //
T02D2531:308a-18: blo ldan dkyil 'khor gzhug par bya //
T02D2531:308a-20: 'di nyid la ni ltos ldan na //
T02D2531:308a-21: de nyid pha rol 'jig rten min //

T02D2531:309a-44: spyod mchog 'di la gang rnams kyi //

T02D2531:311a-26: dang dngos grub thams cad kyi skal ba go rims
T02D2531:311a-28: de nas me tog gi phreng ba bzung nas 'phang bar bya'o //
T02D2531:311a-29: pra t'itstsha badzra ho: zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D2531:311a-30: de nas des 'phangs pa'i me tog gi phreng ba de'i mgo la bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2531:311a-31: aom pra ti grihna tva mi mam sa tva ma h'a ba la zhes so //
T02D2531:311a-32: de nas slob ma'i mig dag la aom yig 'bar
T02D2531:311a-33: ba dang bcas pa bsams te gdong g-yogs bsal bar
T02D2531:311a-34: bya'o // aom de ring rdo rje sems dpa' rang //
T02D2531:311a-35: khyed kyi mig ni dbye bar mdzad //
T02D2531:311a-36: rdo rje'i mig ni bla med pa //
T02D2531:311a-37: thams cad mig ni 'byed par mdzad //
T02D2531:311a-38: ces pas gdong g-yogs bsal bar bya'o //
T02D2531:311a-39: kye'i rdo rje ltos shig ces brjod nas so so'i
T02D2531:311a-40: zhing dkyil 'khor chen po'i rdo rje lcags kyu la
T02D2531:311a-41: sogs pa nas brtsams te rnam par snang mdzad chen
T02D2531:311b-0: po'i mthar thug par bstan @311b par bya'o //
T02D2531:311b-1: de la lha rnams kyi mtshan ma'i dam tshig la
T02D2531:311b-2: yang dad pa dang dang bas me tog gi phreng
T02D2531:311b-3: ba phog pa de'i rnal 'byor yang sbyin bar bya'o
T02D2531:311b-4: // yang na slob ma'i skal ba gang yod pa
T02D2531:311b-5: de'i rnal 'byor sbyin par bya'o zhes pa ni slob
T02D2531:311b-7: de nas shar gyi sgo la sogs pa rnams su dkyil 'khor la yang phyag btsal bar bya'o //
T02D2531:311b-8: de nas shar gyi sgor rang gi thugs kar me
T02D2531:311b-9: tog gi snyim pa sbyar la lus kyis phyag btsal
T02D2531:311b-10: bar bya ste / aom sarba ta th'a ga ta
T02D2531:311b-11: k'a ya b'a ka tsitta pra na me na badzra
T02D2531:311b-12: bandha nam ka ro mi sarba ta th'a ga t'ashts'a
T02D2531:311b-14: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dzo pa stha
T02D2531:311b-15: n'a y'atma n'am ni ry'a ta y'a mi sarba ta
T02D2531:311b-16: th'a ga ta badzra sa tv'a dhi tishtha m'am /
T02D2531:311b-17: lho'i sgor rdo rje thal mo snying gar sbyar nas dpral ba sal btud de /
T02D2531:311b-18: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dz'a bhi shi ka y'atma n'am ni ry'a ta y'a mi /
T02D2531:311b-19: sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra ratn'a bhi shinytsa m'am /
T02D2531:311b-20: de nas rdo rje'i thal mo spyi bor bzung nas zhal sa la btud de nub kyi sgo nas /
T02D2531:311b-21: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dz'a pra brtan y'atma n'am ni ry'a ta y'a mi /
T02D2531:311b-22: sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra dharma pra brta ya m'i /
T02D2531:311b-23: de bzhin du byang du mgo snying gar btud nas
T02D2531:311b-24: thal mo sbyar te sa la reg nas phyag btsal
T02D2531:311b-25: bar bya'o // aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u
T02D2531:311b-26: dza karma ni a'atma n'am ni ry'a ta y'a mi
T02D2531:311b-27: bar bya'o // ; sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra karma ku ru sv'a m'am /
T02D2531:311b-28: zhes brjod nas phyag lnga btsal bar bya'o //
T02D2531:311b-29: de'i tshe yang slob dpon gyis de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2531:311b-30: de rnams kyi de bzhin nyid du byin gyis rlob
T02D2531:311b-32: da ni dad pa rab tu bskyed //
T02D2531:311b-34: khyod ni sangs rgyas rigs su skyes //
T02D2531:311b-35: sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs //
T02D2531:311b-36: phun sum tshogs kun mngon gyur te //
T02D2531:311b-37: khyod kyi dngos grub sbyor nyid kyang //
T02D2531:311b-38: dam tshig bsrung bas dngos grub 'gyur //
T02D2531:311b-39: sngags rnams la yang brtson par gyis //
T02D2531:311b-40: de nas bus mo'i lha nga sa la btsugs te sdig pa so so yang bshags par bya'o //
T02D2531:311b-41: phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol //
T02D2531:312a-0: rdo rje dang nor bu dang padma dang las kyi rigs la zhugs pa'i de @312a * //
T02D2531:312a-1: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yang phyag rgya dang
T02D2531:312a-2: gsang sngags dang rig sngags dang lha rnams thams cad
T02D2531:312a-3: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams
T02D2531:312a-4: cad bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba mdun du bgyis
T02D2531:312a-8: las kyi rigs la zhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2531:312a-9: thams cad kyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags dang rig
T02D2531:312a-10: sngags dang lha thams cad kyi mdun du sdig pa
T02D2531:312a-11: thams cad bdag gis so sor bshags par bgyi'o //
T02D2531:312a-12: phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa'i 'das pa dang ma byon
T02D2531:312a-13: pa dang da ltar gyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub
T02D2531:312a-15: 'phags pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang yang
T02D2531:312a-16: dag par song ba dang yang dag par zhugs pa
T02D2531:312a-17: rnams dang / sems can gyi tshogs thams cad kyi
T02D2531:312a-18: dge ba thams cad la yang rjes su yi rang
T02D2531:312a-19: rnams dang / ngo // phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i
T02D2531:312a-20: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la chos kyi
T02D2531:312a-21: 'khor lo bskor bar bskul ma 'debs so //
T02D2531:312a-22: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku yongs su
T02D2531:312a-23: mya ngan las 'da' bar bzhed pa thams cad la
T02D2531:312a-24: mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol ba 'debs so
T02D2531:312a-25: zhes pa ni sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa'o
T02D2531:312a-26: // sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
T02D2531:312a-27: la rnam pa thams cad la rnam pa thams cad
T02D2531:312a-29: dus thams cad du bdag so so nas gzung du gsol //
T02D2531:312a-30: mgon po thugs rje chen po rnams kyis dam tshig
T02D2531:312a-31: chen po'i dngos grub rnams bdag la stsal du gsol
T02D2531:312a-32: lo // dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te /
T02D2531:312a-33: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad kyi
T02D2531:312a-34: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mi mthun
T02D2531:312a-35: pa'i phyogs thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig /'jig
T02D2531:312a-36: rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs
T02D2531:312a-37: pa thams cad dang ldan pas bde ba dang bcas
T02D2531:312a-38: shing bde ba dang bcas pa'i yid kyis mi'i mchog
T02D2531:312a-39: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur cig / bdag
T02D2531:312a-40: kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di yi myur du sangs
T02D2531:312a-41: rgyas nas 'gro ba rnams la phan pa'i phyir 'jig
T02D2531:312b-0: @312b rten du chos ston par gyur nas sdug bsngal
T02D2531:312b-1: mang pos mnar ba'i sems can rnams sgrol bar gyur
T02D2531:312b-2: cig / bla med yang dag rdzogs pa yi //
T02D2531:312b-3: byang chub tu ni bsngo bar bgyi //
T02D2531:312b-4: bdag nyid dbul ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D2531:312b-5: ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams //
T02D2531:312b-6: byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i //
T02D2531:312b-7: byang chub sems ni bla na med //
T02D2531:312b-8: dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi //
T02D2531:312b-9: bslab pa rnam gsum tshul khrims dang /
T02D2531:312b-10: dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang //
T02D2531:312b-11: sems can don byed tshul khrims rnams //
T02D2531:312b-12: bdag gis so sor brtan par gzung //
T02D2531:312b-13: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02D2531:312b-14: dkon mchog gsum mchog bla na med //
T02D2531:312b-16: deng nas brtsams te bdag gis gzung //
T02D2531:312b-17: rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la //
T02D2531:312b-18: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang //
T02D2531:312b-19: de nyid bdag gis so sor gzung //
T02D2531:312b-20: slob dpon dag kyang bdag gis gzung //
T02D2531:312b-21: rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi //
T02D2531:312b-22: dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la //
T02D2531:312b-23: nyin re nyin rer dus drug tu //
T02D2531:312b-24: sbyin pa rnam bzhi bdag gis sbyin //
T02D2531:312b-25: padma'i rigs chen dag pa la //
T02D2531:312b-26: byang chub chen po las byung ba'i //
T02D2531:312b-27: phyi dang gsang ba theg pa gsum //
T02D2531:312b-28: dam chos bdag gis so sor gzung //
T02D2531:312b-29: las kyi rigs mchog chen po la //
T02D2531:312b-30: sde ma pa thams cad yang dag ldan //
T02D2531:312b-31: de nyid so sor bdag gis gzung //
T02D2531:312b-32: mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi //
T02D2531:312b-33: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
T02D2531:312b-34: byang chub sems dpa' bla med pa //
T02D2531:312b-35: dam pa bdag gis bskyed bgyi zhing //
T02D2531:312b-36: sngom pa ma lus bzung bgyis nas //
T02D2531:312b-37: ma brgal ba rnams bdag gis bsgral //
T02D2531:312b-38: ma grol ba rnams bdag gis dgrol //
T02D2531:312b-39: dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung zhing //
T02D2531:312b-40: sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod //
T02D2531:312b-41: ces pa'i sdom pa bzung ba slob mas brjod par bya'o //
T02D2531:312b-42: de nas slob mas 'di nyid kyis gsol ba gdab par bya ste /
T02D2531:312b-43: mgon po 'khor lo lha dag gis //
T02D2531:312b-44: de nyid slob dpon las rnams dang //
T02D2531:312b-45: 'khor lo phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang //
T02D2531:312b-46: dam pa dga' stsal du gsol //
T02D2531:312b-47: de nas slob ma mi bskyod pa'i skur bsgoms nas
T02D2531:312b-48: rdo rje gnas pa'i bum pa rnams sems ma rdo
T02D2531:312b-49: rje la sogs pa 'dzin pa lhag par grol ba
T02D2531:312b-50: rdo rje khu tshur gyis chu'i dbang bskur ba 'dis
T02D2531:312b-51: 'dzin pa las / dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje che //
T02D2531:312b-52: khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas pa //
T02D2531:313a-2: gnas las byung ba sbyin par bya //
T02D2531:313a-3: aom badzra bhi shinytsa h'um zhes pas chu'i dbang bskur ba ni me long lta bu'i ye shes so //
T02D2531:313a-4: de nas rin chen 'byung ldan gyi skur bsgoms nas /
T02D2531:313a-5: aom sarba buddha ts'u da ma ni ma h'a mu ku ta tr'am /
T02D2531:313a-6: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug mas bzung ba'i bum pa'i chus /
T02D2531:313a-7: aom badzra dh'a tvi shva ri badzri ni aa bhi shinytsa h'um /
T02D2531:313a-8: spyi gtsug tu rnam par snang mdzad sku mdog dkar
T02D2531:313a-9: po byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyas bzhugs par bsam
T02D2531:313a-10: par bya'o // aom badzra badzri ni h'um /
T02D2531:313a-11: dpral ba'i steng du mi bskyod pa sku mdog mthing ga sa gnon gyi phyag rgyas bzhugs pa'o ;
T02D2531:313a-12: / aom ratna badzra ni tram rna ba g-yas pa'i
T02D2531:313a-13: steng du rin chen 'byung ldan sku mdog ser po
T02D2531:313a-14: mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgyas bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2531:313a-16: mgo bo'i rgyab tu 'dod dpag med sku mdog dmar po ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgyas bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2531:313a-18: rna ba g-yon pa'i steng du do na yod grub
T02D2531:313a-19: pa sku ma dog ljang gu mi 'jigs pa'i phyag
T02D2531:313a-20: rgyas bzhugs par bsam par bya'o zhes pa ni /
T02D2531:313a-21: dbu rgyan gyi dbang bskur pa ste mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
T02D2531:313a-22: slob ma 'od dpag tu med pa'i skur bsams nas /
T02D2531:313a-23: sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje yis //
T02D2531:313a-24: bdag gis de ring khyod dbang bskur //
T02D2531:313a-25: de 'dir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D2531:313a-26: rdo rje rab tu grub phyir zungs //
T02D2531:313a-27: thugs ka'i dang por rdo rjes reg nas lag tu
T02D2531:313a-28: sbyin par bya'o zhes pa ni rdo rje'i dbang bskur
T02D2531:313a-29: ba ste so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so //
T02D2531:313a-30: slob ma don yod grub pa'i skur bsams nas ;
T02D2531:313a-31: aom badzra dhi pa ti stvam aa bhi shnytsi m'i tishtha badzra sa ma ya stvam /
T02D2531:313a-33: lag pa g-yon par dril bu sbyin par bya'o zhes
T02D2531:313a-34: pa ni dril bu'i dbang bskur ba ste bya ba
T02D2531:313a-36: slob ma rnams par snang mdzad du bsams nas //
T02D2531:313a-37: aom badzra satva stvam aa bhi shinytsa mi badzra n'a m'a bhi she ka ta:/
T02D2531:313a-38: kye dpal rdo rje che ge mo zhes bya ba'i
T02D2531:313a-39: de bzhin gshegs pa sa 'og sa stengs mtho ris
T02D2531:313a-40: rnams so // aom mgo bor rdo rje dang dril
T02D2531:313a-41: bu gzung bar bya'o zhes ba ni ming gi dbang
T02D2531:313a-42: rnams so // bskur ba ste / chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ye shes so //
T02D2531:313b-0: dbang lnga bskur @313b pas sngags kyi rgyud nyan pa dang bshad pa la dbang bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2531:313b-1: dbang lnga po 'di nyid la rig ma'i dbang zhes brjod par bya ste /
T02D2531:313b-2: thams cad du rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa'i
T02D2531:313b-3: lha mo rnams kyi bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro
T02D2531:313b-4: // slar yang rdo rje slob dpon gyi dbang gi don du gsol ba gdab bar bya ste /
T02D2531:313b-5: gang gis bdag ni khyod drin las //
T02D2531:313b-6: rang dang gzhan don gyur pa yi //
T02D2531:313b-7: rdo rje slob dpon gyi ni dbang //
T02D2531:313b-8: rdo rje'i gter gyis bdag la stsol //
T02D2531:313b-9: slob ma la rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan par bsgoms te /
T02D2531:313b-11: deng 'dir sangs rgyas thams cad nyid ;
T02D2531:313b-12: ; rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag na gnas //
T02D2531:313b-13: phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan //
T02D2531:313b-14: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu zungs //
T02D2531:313b-15: thog mth'a med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
T02D2531:313b-16: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che //
T02D2531:313b-17: kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid //
T02D2531:313b-18: rdo rje snyems ma bdag po'i bdag /
T02D2531:313b-20: bcom ldan 'das dang po'i mchog gi skyes bu'o //
T02D2531:313b-21: aa yig las skyes pa'i dril bu ni //
T02D2531:313b-22: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta sidhhi badzra sa ma
T02D2531:313b-23: ya tishtha ae sha stvam dha ra y'a mi badzra
T02D2531:313b-24: satva hr'i: hi hi hi hi h'um /
T02D2531:313b-25: zhes brjod nas slob mas dril bu gzung par bya'o //
T02D2531:313b-26: de ring sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D2531:313b-27: shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror shes //
T02D2531:313b-28: byang chub mchog tu rgyal bas bzhed //
T02D2531:313b-29: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu zungs //
T02D2531:313b-30: srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag / ngo bo nyid kyis srid 'gal byas //
T02D2531:313b-31: rang bzhin dag mchog sems dpa' yis //
T02D2531:313b-32: dam pa yi ni srid par bya //
T02D2531:313b-33: zhes ba ni rdo rje'i brtul zhugs sbyin pa'o //
T02D2531:313b-34: dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje che //
T02D2531:313b-35: khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas pa //
T02D2531:313b-36: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang gsum gyi //
T02D2531:313b-37: gnas las byung ba sbyin par bya //
T02D2531:313b-40: yid kyi dkyil 'khor mchog tu ni //
T02D2531:313b-41: ye shes gzhal yas khang pa zhes //
T02D2531:313b-42: thugs ni yang dag mthong par brtsegs //
T02D2531:313b-43: phung po lnga rnams bsdus pa yis //
T02D2531:313b-44: sangs rgyas lnga rnams rab tu grags //
T02D2531:313b-45: zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi de nyid do //
T02D2531:314a-1: rkang pa dag gi dbus su bzhag nas lag pa
T02D2531:314a-2: g-yas su dung byin nas 'di nyid brjod par bya
T02D2531:314a-3: ste / deng nas brtsams te lhan cig pa'o //
T02D2531:314a-4: sems ni bskyed pa tsam gyis ni //
T02D2531:314a-5: de ring phan chad 'jig rten la //
T02D2531:314a-6: chos kyi 'khor lo bla med pa //
T02D2531:314a-7: kun nas yongs su bkang nas ni //
T02D2531:314a-8: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyis //
T02D2531:314a-9: skyo med dogs dang bral ba yis //
T02D2531:314a-10: de ltar sems can don gyis shig / gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga ni //
T02D2531:314a-11: 'jig rten du ni rtag tu ston //
T02D2531:314a-13: byas gzo sangs rgyas thams cad kyis //
T02D2531:314a-14: nye bar phan pa nyid du gsungs //
T02D2531:314a-15: rdo rje 'dzin pa de rnams kyis //
T02D2531:314a-16: khyed kyang kun nas kun du gsungs //
T02D2531:314a-17: slar yang slob ma rnam par snang mdzad kyi skur bsams nas /
T02D2531:314a-18: sems can kun la phan don phyir //
T02D2531:314a-19: 'jig rten kun du thams cad nas //
T02D2531:314a-20: ji ltar gdul bya sna tshogs la //
T02D2531:314a-21: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyis //
T02D2531:314a-22: de bzhin du slob ma mi bskyod pa'i skur bsams nas /
T02D2531:314a-23: go rims ji lta ba bzhin du rdo rje'i 'khor lo dang /
T02D2531:314a-25: padma'i 'khor lo dang sna tshogs 'khor lo rab tu
T02D2531:314a-26: bskor zhes brjod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa lngas slob
T02D2531:314a-27: ma la rjes su gnang ba sbyin par bya'o //
T02D2531:314a-28: de las byung ba gang gyur kun //
T02D2531:314a-29: sangs rgyas kun dngos bdag nyid pas //
T02D2531:314a-30: rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur ba'i //
T02D2531:314a-31: de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan bya //
T02D2531:314a-32: srid pa'i ngan 'gro las bton nas //
T02D2531:314a-33: srid pa shin tu zhi bya'i phyir //
T02D2531:314a-34: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
T02D2531:314a-35: bdag gis khyed 'dir lung bstan bgyi //
T02D2531:314a-36: kye'i rdo rje che ge mo zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pas khyod kyi dam tshig 'grub ste /
T02D2531:314a-38: de la 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod lam gyi
T02D2531:314a-39: tshul du byas nas chos gos kyi grva bzung ba'i
T02D2531:314a-40: khu tshur g-yon pa snying gar byas shing g-yas pa
T02D2531:314a-42: de nas yang de nyid slob ma rnams la bstan bar bya'o //
T02D2531:314a-43: gang 'di dag las byung ba'i phyag rgya chen po

T02D2531:320b-25: bil bas bu dang tsha rgyud la sogs pa rnam par 'phel bar byed do //
T02D2531:320b-26: padma dang autpala la sogs pa'i me tog gis kha dog dang gzi brjid 'phel bar byed do //
T02D2531:320b-27: tsandra na la sogs pas dpal 'phel bar byed do //
T02D2531:320b-28: dri dang so rtsis bkra shis par byed do //
T02D2531:320b-29: de nas me la dge ba dang mi dge ba'i mtshan ma yongs su brtag par bya ste /
T02D2531:320b-30: de la rtse mo gcig tu 'bar na phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'byung ngo //
T02D2531:320b-31: rtse mo bzhir gyur na rgyas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2531:320b-32: phung po gcig tu gyur na don chen po ster ro //
T02D2531:320b-33: rtse mo gnyis mi yo bar gnas na bar ma'o //
T02D2531:320b-34: chu shel dang nor bu'i 'od dang ba mo dang
T02D2531:320b-35: kunda dang zla ba'i gzugs dang kha dog rnams ni
T02D2531:320b-36: sdig pa thams cad rnam par zhi ba'o //
T02D2531:320b-37: gser dang pushta r'a ga lta 6bus ni dpag tu med pa'i phun sum tshogs par byed do //
T02D2531:320b-38: dza ba dang mya ngan med pa'i me tog dang
T02D2531:320b-39: bandu ka dang kim sh'u ka dang aindra go pa
T02D2531:320b-41: gser btso ma lta bus ni rgyal srid dang dbang phyug la sogs pa la dbang du pyad do //
T02D2531:320b-42: du ba med cing snum pa dang bee d'u rya'i
T02D2531:320b-43: kha dog lta bus ni tshe 'phel ba dang nad
T02D2531:320b-45: aa ga ru dang tsam pa ka dang /
T02D2531:321a-5: ga pur dang gur kum dang /
T02D2531:321a-6: gla ba la sogs pa'i dri bzang po rnams kyis
T02D2531:321a-7: rig pa'i gnas las 'khor byed pa rab tu ster
T02D2531:321a-8: ro // pi wang dang gling bu dang zangs dung
T02D2531:321a-9: dang rnga bo che la sogs pa'i sgra'i dbyangs kyis
T02D2531:321a-10: bde ba thams cad rab tu ster ro //
T02D2531:321a-11: rgyal mtshan dang nya dang bum pa dang padma dang dung dang ral gri dang /
T02D2531:321a-20: mar gyis gang ba'i dgang blugs dang /
T02D2531:321a-21: gdugs dang g-yas su 'khyil pa dang /
T02D2531:321a-22: rdo rje bzang po'i rnam pas ni don chen po'o zhes pa ni me'i dge ba'i mtshan ma'o //
T02D2531:321a-23: g-yo zhing 'khrug par 'bar ba dang me du ba
T02D2531:321a-24: chen pos ni nad rab tu mang por 'gyur ro
T02D2531:321a-25: // mdangs med cing me stag 'phro ba gdong dang
T02D2531:321a-26: rtse mo rnam par 'chad cing 'phro zhing 'tshogs pas
T02D2531:321a-28: g-yo zhing g-yon du 'khor ba dang skad cig re
T02D2531:321a-29: re la g-yon skor du 'khor zhing 'khyog pas ni
T02D2531:321a-30: sa gzhi dang rigs zad par byed do //
T02D2531:321a-31: rtsub pa dang mdog ngan pa dang shin tu 'dres
T02D2531:321a-32: pa dang nag po dang sngo bsangs kyang don rnam
T02D2531:321a-34: chu las skyes pa'i srog chags kyi dri dang dri
T02D2531:321a-35: mi zhim pa dang ma he dang byil dang khyi
T02D2531:321a-36: dang ce sbyang gi dri dang ra dang bya rog
T02D2531:321a-37: gi dri dang rdul gyi dri rnams kyis rnam par
T02D2531:321a-39: sprin gyi sgra dang khyi dang tsa tstsha ta dang
T02D2531:321a-40: tshi tstsha ma sim mi si m'a ya m'a na
T02D2531:321a-41: dang mi mnyam pa'i dbyangs dang sgra drag pos ni
T02D2531:321a-43: sram dang g-yi dang sprul rnams 'jigs pa'i rnam par
T02D2531:321a-44: byed na me dang dgra la sogs pa'i 'jigs par
T02D2531:321a-45: 'gyur ro zhes pa ni mi dge ba'i mtshan ma'o
T02D2531:321a-46: // gal te mi dge ba'i mtshan mar gyur na
T02D2531:321a-47: las thams cad pa'i bum pa'i chus lan bdun du
T02D2531:321a-48: bsangs la slar yang mar gyi dgang blugs lan bdun
T02D2531:321a-49: // dbul bar bya'o // de nas me 'od dang
T02D2531:321a-50: ldan par byas nas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye
T02D2531:321a-51: shes kyi me rnam par bsgoms te 'bar bzhin pa'i
T02D2531:321a-52: rnam pas me lha'i thugs kar chu skyes dang zla
T02D2531:321a-53: ba'i gdan gyi steng du dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i
T02D2531:321a-54: sa bon las byung ba'i mtshan ma dang sa bon
T02D2531:321a-55: yongs su gyur pa las dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po
T02D2531:321b-0: dang dkyil 'khor sa dang @321b bcas pa rnam par
T02D2531:321b-1: bsgoms te ye shes sems dpa' yang rdo rje lcags
T02D2531:321b-2: kyu la sogs pa rnams kyis dgug pa dang gzhug
T02D2531:321b-3: pa dang bcing ba dang mnyes par byas te /
T02D2531:321b-4: 'o ma dang 'o ma 'dres pa bzhin du ro
T02D2531:321b-5: gcig par lhan cig byas la dbang bskur bar bya
T02D2531:321b-6: ste / bsang gtor dang mchod yon dang zhabs bsil dang /
T02D2531:321b-7: zhal bsil la sogs pa mchod pa dang bstod pa'i mthar thug pa byas te sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D2531:321b-8: sngon bzhin du de nas gang ba'i dgang blugs rang
T02D2531:321b-9: gi snying ga'i sngags kyis lan gsum mam lnga'am lan
T02D2531:321b-10: bdun rnam nyi shu rtsa gcig rnams mar gyis gang
T02D2531:321b-11: ba'i dgang blugs srog aa wa dhu t'ir gyur par
T02D2531:321b-12: byas nas sbyin bdag dang bcas pas dbul bar bya'o
T02D2531:321b-13: // bsang gtor dang zhal bsil yang byas nas yang dag par mchod nas bstod pa yang bya'o //
T02D2531:321b-14: de nas aom a'a: sa m'a dhi pa l'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:321b-16: aom a'a: badzra b'a sa se sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:321b-18: aom a'a: badzra t'a m'u l'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:321b-20: aom su pushpe su ku le ba le dzva la n'i ye pushtim ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:321b-21: padma dang autpala la sogs pa'i me tog la sogs pa rnams kyi'o //
T02D2531:321b-22: aom dharme dharmma r'a dze da ha da ha sarba bi ghnam pra sh'anta pushpim ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:321b-23: tsandan ya sogs pa dri bzangs rnams kyi'o //
T02D2531:321b-24: aom a'a: badzra dh'u pe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:321b-26: ; aom a'a: badzr'a lo ke hr'i: sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:321b-28: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po dkyil 'khor pa
T02D2531:321b-29: dang bcas pa rang gi lus la rnam par gzhug
T02D2531:321b-30: par bya'o // sngon ma bzhin du me'i lha rnam
T02D2531:321b-31: par bsgoms te mchod yon la sogs pa phyi'i mchod
T02D2531:321b-32: par bya'o // pas mchod nas / aom a'a: ha
T02D2531:321b-33: bya bhu ka ha bya pa ri shishta na bhum
T02D2531:321b-34: dza bhum dza h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:321b-35: zhes pa'i sngags kyis rdzas rnams dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2531:321b-36: mar gyis gang ba'i dgang blugs kyang dbul lo //
T02D2531:321b-38: aom a'a: kye byin za ba sbyin bdag mngon par 'dod pa'i don rdzogs par gyis shig /
T02D2531:321b-39: purnna hu ti pra t'itstsha h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:321b-40: bsang gtor dang zhal bsil yang nas yang sngon bzhin du shing thog dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2531:321b-41: phyi'i mchod pa dang bstod pa yang bya'o //
T02D2531:321b-42: de nas rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las 'od
T02D2531:321b-43: 'phros pa'i lha'i sprin tshogs rnams kyis ye shes kyi
T02D2531:321b-44: bdud rtsis gang ba'i rin po che'i bum pa bzung
T02D2531:321b-45: ba rnams kyis sbyin bdag la dbang bskur zhing shis
T02D2531:322a-1: de nas chad lhag gi nyes pa bsal ba'i phyir bzod pa gsol bar bya'o //
T02D2531:322a-2: gang yang bdag blo rmongs pa yis //
T02D2531:322a-3: nyes byas cung zad gang bgyis pa //
T02D2531:322a-4: gang phyir lus can skyabs yin phyir //
T02D2531:322a-5: mgon po khyod la 'dzom pa mdzod //
T02D2531:322a-6: de nas aom badzra sa tva aa: zhes lan mang
T02D2531:322a-7: du brjod nas yi ge brgya pa bzlas par bya'o
T02D2531:322a-8: // gtor ma phul nas gshegs te langs nas dbang
T02D2531:322a-9: po la sogs pa 'jig rten skyong ba rnams la
T02D2531:322a-10: phyi rol du gtor ma dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2531:322a-11: g-yas brkyang gi gom stabs kyis zhal shar du phyogs
T02D2531:322a-12: par gnas te g-yon pa'i rdo rje bstan nas g-yas
T02D2531:322a-13: pa'i rdo rje red pa'i phyogs su yang dag par
T02D2531:322a-14: bzung ste sdigs mdzub g-yas pa'i lcags kyus spyan drang
T02D2531:322a-15: par bya'o // spyan 'dren pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2531:322a-16: de nas mnyam pa'i rkang stabs kyis gnas te sdigs
T02D2531:322a-17: mdzub kyi lcags kyu dang bral ba ni dam tshig
T02D2531:322a-18: gi phyag rgya'o // bsang gtor dang mchod yon dang
T02D2531:322a-19: zhabs bsil dang zhal bsil rnams kyang phul nas me
T02D2531:322a-20: tog la sogs pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod
T02D2531:322a-21: la sgeg mo la sogs pa brgyad po rnams kyis
T02D2531:322a-23: aom na mo badzra sya tsa di shi di shi badzra p'a ne raksha raksha sv'a h'a //
T02D2531:322a-24: zhes pa 'dis gtor ma dbul lo //
T02D2531:322a-25: de nas g-yon brkyang ba'i gom stabs kyis gnas te
T02D2531:322a-26: spyan 'dren pa'i phyag rgya las sdigs mdzub rab tu
T02D2531:322a-27: brkyang ste slar yang brgya byin gshegs su gsol //
T02D2531:322a-28: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i yang spyan drangs pa dang dam
T02D2531:322a-29: tshig pa gshegs su gsol ba rnams la go rims
T02D2531:322a-30: ji lta ba bzhin du g-yas brkyang dang mnyam pa
T02D2531:322a-31: dang g-yon brkyang gi gom stabs rnams so //
T02D2531:322a-32: bsang gtor la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams kyang sngon bzhin du'o //
T02D2531:322a-33: sngags dang phyag rgya rnams kyi khyad par du ste /
T02D2531:322a-34: sdigs mdzub g-yas pa thabs kyi rnam par bkug nas
T02D2531:322a-35: gung mo'i rtse mo tshigs gsum par bzung nas mthe
T02D2531:322a-36: bong lag pa'i dbus su gzhag par bya'o zhes pas
T02D2531:322a-37: spyan drang ngo // de'i phyag rgya las mthe bong
T02D2531:322a-38: mdzub mo'i logs su brten pa ni dam tshig go
T02D2531:322a-39: spyan drang ngo // // aom ae hye hi ga
T02D2531:322a-40: si la dzva la dzva la ha ha shi khi
T02D2531:322a-41: to li bi r'u p'aksha sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:322a-42: de'i phyag rgyas mdzub mo dang mthe bo sor mo'i gtogs pa ni /
T02D2531:322b-0: slar gshegs @322b pa ste 'di ni me'i'o //
T02D2531:322b-1: ming med dag rtse mor byas te lhag ma rnams
T02D2531:322b-2: kha nang du phyogs pas rdo rje bsdams nas slar
T02D2531:322b-3: yang ming med so sor byas pa'i lcags kyus spyan
T02D2531:322b-4: drang bar bya'o // 'di'i phyag rgya las lcags kyu
T02D2531:322b-5: dang bral nas thugs kar bzung nas dam tshig gi'o
T02D2531:322b-6: drang bar bya'o // // aom ya m'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:322b-7: dam tshig gi phyag rgyas yongs su bskor ba las gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02D2531:322b-9: khu tshur g-yon pa rked pa'i phyogs su bzhag ste /
T02D2531:322b-10: sdigs mdzub bkug nas khu tshur g-yas pa'i gung mo
T02D2531:322b-11: dang mdzub mo dang ral gri 'dren pa ni spyan
T02D2531:322b-12: 'dren pa'o // 'di nyid las g-yon pa'i sdigs mdzub bkug pa dang bral ba ni dam tshig gi'o //
T02D2531:322b-13: aom sarba bh'u ta bha yam ka ra ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:322b-14: 'di'i phyag rgya nyid las g-yon pa'i sdigs mdzub brkyang
T02D2531:322b-15: ba ni gshegs su gsol ba ste bden bral gyi'o
T02D2531:322b-16: // khu tshur g-yas pa'i mdzub mo dang mthe bong dag sbyar te /
T02D2531:322b-17: khu tshur g-yon pa'i sdigs mdzub kyi lcags kyu'i rnam pas spyan drang bar bya'o //
T02D2531:322b-18: de nyid kyi lcags kyu dang bral ba ni dam tshig gi'o //
T02D2531:322b-19: aom tri tri pu na stri stri shi khi lo li bi r'u p'aksha sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:322b-20: g-yon gyi sdigs mdzub rab tu brkyang ba gshegs su gsol te chu bdag gi'o /
T02D2531:322b-21: khu tshur g-yon pa bsgrengs te gung mo'i tshigs gsum
T02D2531:322b-22: par mdzub mo 'khyil ba'i rnam par gzung bar bya'o
T02D2531:322b-23: // khu tshur g-yas pa rked pa'i phyogs su bzhag ste mthe bong bkug pa ni spyan drang ba'o //
T02D2531:322b-24: de nyid du mthe bo g-yas pa rab tu bcug pas dam tshig gi'o ;
T02D2531:322b-25: / aom su sa kha kh'u kha kh'u: sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:322b-26: 'di nyid las mthe bo rab tu brkyang bas gshegs su gsol ba ni rlung gi'o //
T02D2531:322b-27: nang du rdo rje bsams pa mtheb chung gnyis rtse mor byas la /
T02D2531:322b-28: de'i phyi nas ming med zung dag so sor bzung la /
T02D2531:322b-29: gung mo gnyis rtse mor byas pa rdo rje'i rnam pas spyan drang bar bya'o //
T02D2531:322b-30: 'di nyid las gung mo gnyis rab tu bcug pa ni dam tshig gi'o //
T02D2531:322b-31: aom ku be r'a ya sv'a h'a //
T02D2531:322b-32: spyan drangs pa'i phyag rgya las gung mo gnyis rab
T02D2531:322b-33: tu brkyang ba ni gshegs su gsol ba'o phyag rgya
T02D2531:323a-1: dang ming med dag mthil du rdo rje bzung nas
T02D2531:323a-2: gung mo la brten la gung mo rtse mor byas
T02D2531:323a-3: la rgyab tu mdzub mo rab tu brkyang ba ni
T02D2531:323a-4: spyan drang ba'o // de nyid dang bral ba ni dam tshig go //
T02D2531:323a-5: aom a'i shva n'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:323a-6: sdigs mdzub rab tu brgyad ba ni gshegs su gsol ba ste dbang ldan gyi'o //
T02D2531:323a-7: steng du bltas te thal mo sbyar nas mdzub mo gnyis bkug nas spyan drang ba'o //
T02D2531:323a-8: 'dir de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis sdon bzhin du gnas pa ni dam tshig gi'o //
T02D2531:323a-9: aom aurdham brahma ne sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:323a-10: aom s'urya gra h'a dhi pa ta ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:323a-11: aom tsandra na ksha tr'a dhi pa ta ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:323a-12: spyan drangs pa'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis rab
T02D2531:323a-13: tu brkyang ba ni gshegs su gsol ba ste tshangs
T02D2531:323a-14: pa la sogs pa rnams kyi'o //
T02D2531:323a-15: lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar nas mthe bong dag
T02D2531:323a-16: zlum po'i rnam par byas te 'og tu bltas nas
T02D2531:323a-17: mdzub mo dag lcags kyu'i rnam pas spyan drang bar
T02D2531:323a-18: bya'o // mdzub mo lcags kyu dang bral ba ni dam tshig go //
T02D2531:323a-19: aom aa dhi: pri thvi de bye sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:323a-20: aom aa su re bhya: sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:323a-21: aom n'a ge bhya: sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:323a-22: 'dir de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis rab tu brkyang
T02D2531:323a-23: ba ni gshegs su gsol ba ste sa la sogs
T02D2531:323a-24: pa rnams kyi'o // slar yang dkyil 'khor gyi khang
T02D2531:323a-25: par rab tu zhugs te dkyil 'khor rnams la me
T02D2531:323a-26: tog la sogs pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod
T02D2531:323a-27: pa rnams kyi'o // nas / g-yas su bskor ba lan gsum byas te /
T02D2531:323a-28: dbu rgyan dang gos kyi rgyan la sogs pa rnams gnas ji ltar gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2531:323a-29: de nyid ji srid bya ba ma rdzogs kyi bar du nyi ma so so la bya'o //
T02D2531:323a-30: da ni sbyin sreg 'bum gyi rdzas kyi tshad brjod par bya'o //
T02D2531:323a-31: til rnams ni snod brgya rtsa brgyad dgod par bya'o //
T02D2531:323a-32: mar gyi bum pa rnams ni nyi shu rtsa lnga dgod par bya'o //
T02D2531:323a-33: so ba dang nas dang gro rnams kyi snod bcu gnyis dgod par bya'o //
T02D2531:323a-34: 'bras mnyams pa rnams kyi snod dgu dgod par bya'o //
T02D2531:323a-35: ko la ste rag chung gi 'bras bu rnams kyi dang /
T02D2531:323a-36: 'bras yos dang sran ma sha rnams kyi snod dag bcu dgod par bya'o //
T02D2531:323b-0: rdzas rang @323b pa ste bil ba rnams kyi nyi shu rtsa lnga'o //
T02D2531:323b-1: rdzas lhag ma rnams ni ji ltar 'byor pa'o //
T02D2531:323b-2: yam shing rnams ni gza' nyi ma'i nyin mo aarka'i bcu gnyis so //
T02D2531:323b-3: n+ya gro dha'i nyi shu rtsa lnga'o //
T02D2531:323b-4: zla ba'i nyi ma pa la sha'i nyi shu'o //
T02D2531:323b-6: pa ba sangs kyi nyi ma la au dumw'a ra'i bcu dgu'o //
T02D2531:323b-7: ka dam pa'i bco brgyad do //
T02D2531:323b-8: sa skyes kyi nyi ma la seng ldeng gi nyi shu rtsa gcig go //
T02D2531:323b-10: lag gi nyi ma la aa pa marga'i nyi shu rtsa gnyis so //
T02D2531:323b-12: phur bu'i nyi ma la aa shvadtha'i nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o ;
T02D2531:323b-13: ; sbrang shing gi bcu gsum mo //
T02D2531:323b-14: spen pa'i nyi ma la sa mya'i bcu bzhi'o //
T02D2531:323b-15: mya ngan med pa'i nyi shu rtsa gsum mo //
T02D2531:323b-16: yam shing lhag ma rnams ji ltar 'byor pa'o //
T02D2531:323b-17: da ni cho ga bshad par bya ste /
T02D2531:323b-18: dang por re zhig gtsug lag khang la sogs pa'i
T02D2531:323b-19: rab tu gnas par bya bar 'dod pa'i sbyin bdag
T02D2531:323b-20: gis slob dpon dag dang slob dpon gyi khang par
T02D2531:323b-21: song ste bshad pa bzhin mandala byas nas dri bzang
T02D2531:323b-22: dang me tog gi phreng ba dang so rtsi la
T02D2531:323b-23: sogs pa dang gos zung dag so sor phul nas
T02D2531:323b-25: kye khyab bdag chen po mgon po ston pa khyod nyid la bdag gsol ba 'debs te /
T02D2531:323b-26: sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las gdon
T02D2531:323b-27: cing sangs rgyas nyid la dgod pa dang khyed rnams
T02D2531:323b-28: kyi yang mchod pa'i phyir gtsug lag khang la sogs
T02D2531:323b-29: pa'i rab tu gnas pa dang dkyil 'khor chen po
T02D2531:323b-30: bri ba dang sbyin sreg gi bya ba yang khyed
T02D2531:323b-31: kyis mdzad par zhu zhes pas gsol ba gdab par
T02D2531:323b-32: bya'o // gang byed pa de bsgrub par bgyi'o zhes so //

T02D2531:327a-27: par na'o // de'i steng du aindra n'i la gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2531:327a-28: h'um gam h'um zhes pa 'di brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2531:327a-29: lho'i re mig la 'bras so ba dang ba bla dang sa ha de ba dang /
T02D2531:327a-30: gur gum gyi steng du dngul gyi padma'i steng du
T02D2531:327a-31: gser gyi rta dang de'i steng du pushpa gzhag par
T02D2531:327a-32: bya'o // tram bam tram zhes pa 'dis lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2531:327a-33: nub kyi re mig la ra k'a ti la dang mtshal dang sa ha nge pa'i dang /
T02D2531:327a-34: ga bur gyi steng du dpal gyi padma'i steng du
T02D2531:327a-35: gser gyi rma bya de'i steng du padma r'a ga
T02D2531:327a-36: gzhag par bya'o // hri mam hri: zhes pa 'dis brgya rtsar yongs su bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2531:327a-37: byang gi re mig la sran ma sha dang spangs ma dang gi ri kanni ka dang /
T02D2531:327a-38: si la ha'i steng du dngul gyi padma'i steng du
T02D2531:327a-39: gser gyi bya khyung de'i steng du mar ka ta
T02D2531:327b-1: aa ka aa zhes pa 'dis lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2531:327b-2: de'i phyi rol du re mig brgyad rnams la shar
T02D2531:327b-3: du til dkar po dang mig sman gyi khu ba
T02D2531:327b-4: dang mig sman gyi rtsa ba dang /
T02D2531:327b-5: aa ka ru rnams kyi steng du gser gyi padma
T02D2531:327b-6: de'i steng du dngul gyi padma'i steng du dud gzhag
T02D2531:327b-7: par bya'o // aom badzra badzri ni h'um zhes pa
T02D2531:327b-8: 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas par bya'o
T02D2531:327b-9: par bya'o // // lho ru sran mung+ga dang ko
T02D2531:327b-10: shi ra dang ra la ka'i steng du gser gyi
T02D2531:327b-11: padma de'i steng du dngul gyi padma'i steng du mu
T02D2531:327b-14: 'dis lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas par bya'o ;
T02D2531:327b-15: / nub tu 'bras s'a lu dmar po dang so
T02D2531:327b-16: ba dang gser dang btsag dang lakshma ni'i rtsa ba
T02D2531:327b-17: dang tsandan dmar po'i steng du gser gyi padma dang
T02D2531:327b-18: de'i steng du dngul gyi padma dang de'i steng du
T02D2531:327b-20: aom dharma badzra ni hr'i: 'dis lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2531:327b-21: byang du yungs kar dang m'a kshi ka dang spang
T02D2531:327b-22: spos dang bishna kran ta rnams kyi steng du gser
T02D2531:327b-23: gyi padma dang / de'i steng du dngul gyi padma
T02D2531:327b-24: de'i steng du rin po che ljang gu gzhag par
T02D2531:327b-25: gyi padma dang / bya'o // aom karma badzra ni
T02D2531:327b-26: aa: zhes pa 'dis lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su
T02D2531:327b-27: gyi padma dang / bya'o // bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2531:327b-28: me ru sran ku lattha dang lhang tsher dang dz'a
T02D2531:327b-29: ti pha la dang grenthi'i lo ma'i steng du gser
T02D2531:327b-30: gyi padma dang de'i steng du dngul gyi padma'i steng
T02D2531:327b-31: du mu tig gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2531:327b-32: aom badzra l'a sye h'um zhes pa 'dis lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2531:327b-33: bden bral du zar ma dang bri yang ku dang bha tsho ra ka dang /
T02D2531:327b-34: zha nye'i steng du gser gyi padma dang de'i steng
T02D2531:327b-35: du dngul gyi padma dang de'i steng du bhishma kam
T02D2531:327b-36: gzhag par bya'o // aom badzra m'a le tram /
T02D2531:327b-37: 'dis lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2531:327b-38: rlung du ti la nag po dang sindhu ra dang
T02D2531:327b-39: sug smel dang su ra bha'i rnams kyi steng du
T02D2531:327b-40: gser gyi padma dang de'i steng du dngul gyi padma
T02D2531:327b-41: dang de'i steng du beed'urya gzhag par bya'o ;
T02D2531:327b-42: / aom badzra g'i ti hr'i: zhes pa 'dis lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2531:327b-43: dbang ldan du shya ma ka dang bam ga dang
T02D2531:327b-44: li shi'i shing dang padma rnams kyi steng du gser
T02D2531:327b-45: gyi padma dang de'i steng du dngul gyi padma dang
T02D2531:327b-46: de'i steng du shel gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2531:328a-0: aom badzra n+ri tya aa: 'dis lan brgya rtsa @328a * //
T02D2531:328a-2: tshul khrims kyi phung po rnam par dag pa ni rin po che'o //
T02D2531:328a-3: ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po rnam par dag pa ni sman no //
T02D2531:328a-4: shes rab kyi phung po rnam par dag pa ni khams rnams so //
T02D2531:328a-5: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po rnam par dag pa ni sa bon gzhag pa'o //
T02D2531:328a-6: rdo rje'i sa rnam par dag pa ni rdo rje gzhag pa'o //
T02D2531:328a-7: ye shes ldan pa'i sa'i rnam par dag pa ni aindra n'i la'o //
T02D2531:328a-8: kun du bzang po'i sa'i rnam par dag ba ni pushpa r'a ga'o //
T02D2531:328a-9: chos kyi sprin gyis rnam par dag pa ni padma r'a ga'o //
T02D2531:328a-10: legs pa'i blo gros kyi sa'i rnam par dag pa ni ma ra ka ta'o //
T02D2531:328a-11: mi g-yo ba'i sa'i rnam par dag pa ni dung ngo //
T02D2531:328a-12: ring du gyur pa'i sa'i rnam par dag pa ni gser ro //
T02D2531:328a-13: mngon du gyur pa'i sa'i rnam par dag pa ni mu men no //
T02D2531:328a-14: sbyang dka' ba'i sa'i rnam par dag pa ni byi ru'o //
T02D2531:328a-15: 'od 'phro ba'i sa'i rnam par dag pa ni shel lo //
T02D2531:328a-16: 'od byed pa'i sa'i rnam par dag pa ni beed'u rya'o //
T02D2531:328a-17: dri ma med pa'i sa'i rnam par dag pa ni bh'ishma'o //
T02D2531:328a-18: rab tu dga' ba'i sa'i rnam par dag pa ni mu tig go //
T02D2531:328a-19: thabs dang shes rab kyi rnam par dag pa ni gser dang dngul gyi padma dag go //
T02D2531:328a-20: thams cad kyi steng du zangs ma'i glegs bus dgab
T02D2531:328a-21: par bya'o zhes pa ni rin po che dgod pa'i
T02D2531:328a-22: cho ga'o // da ni stegs bu'i mtshan nyid brjod par bya ste /
T02D2531:328a-23: bzhugs par bya ba'i lha'i phyed dang bcas pa'i mtho bdun gyis ring ba'i stegs bu'o //
T02D2531:328a-24: zhed du rkang pas dman pa'i mtho lnga'i tshad do //
T02D2531:328a-25: srid kyi phyed kyis steng du'o //
T02D2531:328a-26: 'di la steng gi ji ltar mtshungs pas khyad par du steng gi nges pa'o //
T02D2531:328a-27: sgo'i dbus su blta ba'i lha dgod par bya'o //
T02D2531:328a-28: de'i phyir gang du gsang ba'i dbus su lha skal ba bzang po rab tu ster ba'o //
T02D2531:328a-29: lte ba'i dbus su don rab tu ster ba'o //
T02D2531:328a-30: snying ga'i dbus su chos rab tu steng ba'o //
T02D2531:328a-31: mgrin pa'i dbus su shes rab rab tu ster ba'o //
T02D2531:328a-32: mdzod spu'i dbus su thar pa rab tu ster ba'o //
T02D2531:328a-33: stegs bu'i tshad las seng ge'i khri ji ltar mdzes pa'i khyad par la bzhugs pas so //
T02D2531:328a-34: lha bzhengs pa'i cha gsum gyi cha gnyis kyi tshad la bya'o //
T02D2531:328b-0: tshes @328b grangs dang rgyu skar dang /
T02D2531:328b-1: gza' dang yud tsam bzang po rnams la lha dang
T02D2531:328b-2: mi dag gi dbus su stegs bu gzhag par bya'o
T02D2531:328b-4: / // / da ni gtsug lag khang gi rab tu gnas pa brjod par bya ste /
T02D2531:328b-5: de la gtsug lag khang zin nas zhal byas nas
T02D2531:328b-6: tshon bzang pos lha la sogs pa sna tshogs pas
T02D2531:328b-7: brgyan pa bshad pa rnams bri bar bya'o //
T02D2531:328b-8: rim pa ji snyed pa rnams la rnam par rgyal ba dang stobs sna tshogs par dmigs par bya'o //
T02D2531:328b-9: tshon sna lnga'i skud pa yungs kar gyi thum bu
T02D2531:328b-10: dang byang chub shing gi lo ma dang gtor ma
T02D2531:328b-11: dang d'urwa dang / kunda sbyang ba'i me tog gi
T02D2531:328b-12: phreng pas rtsig pa'i phyi rol yongs su bskor bar
T02D2531:328b-13: dang d'urwa dang / bya'o // de nas aom sva
T02D2531:328b-14: bh'a ba shuddha: sarba dharmm'a: sva bh'a ba shuddho &
T02D2531:328b-15: ham zhes brjod nas nam mkha' bzhin du rnam par
T02D2531:328b-16: bsgoms la ya yig las rlung gi dkyil 'khor /
T02D2531:328b-18: bam yig las rgya mtsho chen po //
T02D2531:328b-19: de'i dbus su lam yig ser po las dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor ser po gru bzhi pa'o //
T02D2531:328b-20: de'i steng du sum yig las rin po che bzhi'i rang bzhin gyi ri rab rnam par bsgoms te /
T02D2531:328b-21: de'i steng du h'um yig las sna tshogs rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyis gzhi rnam par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2531:328b-22: de'i dbus bhr'um dkar po las byung ba'i 'khor lo bhr'um yig gnas pa'o //
T02D2531:328b-23: de yongs su gyur pa las rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'o //
T02D2531:328b-24: de yongs su gyur pa las gtsug lag khang gzhal
T02D2531:328b-25: yas khang du rnam par bsgoms nas rdo rje'i rab
T02D2531:328b-26: la sogs pas mtshams bcad pa la sogs pa bya'o
T02D2531:328b-27: // aom h'um hri: bhr'um kham badzri bha ba dri
T02D2531:328b-28: dha tishtha h'um kham 'dis lan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis
T02D2531:328b-30: de nas ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs nas bsang
T02D2531:328b-31: gtor dang mchod yon la sogs pa phul nas bkra
T02D2531:328b-32: shis gang zhig ces pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su
T02D2531:328b-33: bcad pa brjod pa sngon du 'gro bas bum pa'i
T02D2531:328b-34: chus dbang bskur nas me tog la sogs pas yang
T02D2531:328b-36: / som su pra tishtha badzre sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:328b-37: 'dis lan bdun du lhag par gnas par bya'o //
T02D2531:328b-38: ye dharm'a zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad
T02D2531:328b-39: pas kyang rab tu gnas par byas nas yi ge
T02D2531:329a-0: @329a * // gtor ma chen po yang rab tu dbul bar bya'o /
T02D2531:329a-2: // / da ni sku gzugs bzhugs par bya ba'i phyir de'i mtshan nyid brjod par bya ste /
T02D2531:329a-3: de la sku gzugs thams cad sor bcu gnyis kyi cha yis zhal lo //
T02D2531:329a-4: de dang mnyam pa zheng du'o //
T02D2531:329a-5: til dang aa mra dang bya'i sgo nga dang //
T02D2531:329a-6: 'khor lo'i rnam pa 'dra ba'i dbye bas zhal gyi dbyibs ni rnam pa bzhi'o //
T02D2531:329a-7: cha gsum dang cha gnyis dang phyed dang bcas pa'i
T02D2531:329a-8: cha gnyis dang cha gcig gi go rims kyis 'gram
T02D2531:329a-10: de la mo rnams kyi sku'i zhal la de nyid kyi dbyibs cha brgyad dang /
T02D2531:329a-11: nas kyi cha gcig gis so //
T02D2531:329a-12: cha bzhi yis spyi bo'i cha ste de gdugs kyi rnam pa'o //
T02D2531:329a-13: phyed dang bcas pa'i cha bzhi yis dpral ba la'o //
T02D2531:329a-15: nas gnyis lhag pa'i cha bzhi yis sna'i dkyus so //
T02D2531:329a-16: nas gnyis kyi rtse mo'i rgya'o //
T02D2531:329a-17: 'byung ba'i mtshams nas phyed dang bcas pa'i cha gcig go //
T02D2531:329a-18: rgya che ba la cha gnyis so //
T02D2531:329a-19: cha gsum gyi logs dag gi steng du'o //
T02D2531:329a-20: sna'i ka ba la gsum 'jug pa'i bu ga la nas gnyis so //
T02D2531:329a-21: til gyi me tog 'dra bar bya'o //
T02D2531:329a-22: de'i 'og gi cha la rkang pa gcig gis lhag pa'i cha gsum mo //
T02D2531:329a-23: de la mchu la nas drug go //
T02D2531:329a-24: de la mnyam par ma mchu la'o //
T02D2531:329a-26: phyed dang bcas pa'i cha gcig gis ma mchu la'o //
T02D2531:329a-27: de'i steng du nas gnyis kyi tshad kyis smra bya'o //
T02D2531:329a-28: ma mchu'i 'byung sa nas drug ste /
T02D2531:329a-29: de'i dbus su gzugs brnyan gyi re kh'a bya'o //
T02D2531:329a-31: nas gnyis lhag pa'i cha gcig gis ko sko'i srid do //
T02D2531:329a-33: cha gnyis kyis rna ba'i rgyar ro //
T02D2531:329a-35: rgyab nas 'byung sa nas cha gnyis so //
T02D2531:329a-36: cha gnyis kyis rna ba'i nang zur ro //
T02D2531:329a-38: rna ba'i khugs la nas gnyis so //
T02D2531:329a-39: rna ba'i bu ga la nas gsum mo //
T02D2531:329a-40: de dang mnyam pa rna ba'i gsang ba'o //
T02D2531:329a-41: rna shal 'phyang ba dang bug pa ni ji ltar
T02D2531:329a-42: mdzes pa'i rna ba gnyis po dag gi dbus su
T02D2531:329a-43: mgo la cha bco brgyad do //
T02D2531:329a-45: smin ma dag gi mthar nas bzhi'o //
T02D2531:329b-0: smin ma'i ri mo la @329b nas phyed de yang gzhu'i rnam pa lta bu'o //
T02D2531:329b-1: mig gi dkyus la cha bzhi'o //
T02D2531:329b-2: rkang pa gcig gis lhag pa'i cha gcig gis zheng du'o //
T02D2531:329b-3: cha gcig gis mig gi 'bras bu'o //
T02D2531:329b-4: de'i cha gsum gyis dkar pa'i cha'o //
T02D2531:329b-5: rnam pa ni ku mu ta dang autpala dang padma'i 'dab ma dang nya'i lto ba 'dra bar bya'o//
T02D2531:329b-6: mig gi mthar cha gnyis so //
T02D2531:329b-7: smin ma'i re kh'a dang mig gi bar du cha gnyis so //
T02D2531:329b-8: dpral ba dad mig dang mgo dang ko sko'i 'byung ba rnams mnyam pa'o //
T02D2531:329b-9: kha'i zur nas mig gi 'bras bu dang glo dag
T02D2531:329b-10: nas rna bar thig dang mgo bo nas smin ma'i
T02D2531:329b-11: ra k'a dag dang thig mnyam pa dang rna ba'i
T02D2531:329b-12: mdun du zur dang mig gi dbus dag thig ge
T02D2531:329b-13: mnyam pa'o // kha'i sgrol cha bzhi'o //
T02D2531:329b-14: de dang mtshungs pa mgrin pa'i srid do //
T02D2531:329b-15: phrag pa'i rtsa ba nas rna ba'i rtsa ba la cha drug go //
T02D2531:329b-16: ko sko'i 'og nas ji ltar mdzes pa'i sha'i 'khyil du bya'o //
T02D2531:329b-17: thor tshugs dang ral ba'i thor cog dang zur phud dang /
T02D2531:329b-20: gtsug gi nor bu rnams kyi tshad cha brgyad kyis mtho ba dang dma' bar bya'o //
T02D2531:329b-21: cung zad dgyes pa dang mngar ba dang /
T02D2531:329b-22: lan tshva ba dang ldan par bya ba ni dge bar byed pa'i zhal lo //
T02D2531:329b-27: khro ba'i zhal dang ldan pa ni mi dge bar byed pa'o //
T02D2531:329b-28: bstan bcos kyi mtshan nyid las gzhan pa'i zhal gyi
T02D2531:329b-29: byed pas sbyin bdag mi 'tsho bar byed pa dang
T02D2531:329b-30: bstan bcos kyi mtshan nyid kyi zhal gyi byed pas
T02D2531:329b-31: skye bo dang nor dang rnam par rgyal ba dang
T02D2531:329b-32: tshe dang phun sum tshogs pa rnam par 'phel lo
T02D2531:329b-34: / // / nga ni lus kyi mtshan nyad brjod par bya ste /
T02D2531:329b-35: de la rked pa'i 'og nas lte ba'i mthar thug pa'i bar la mtho ngo'o //
T02D2531:329b-36: lte ba'i 'og nas gsang ba'i rtsa ba'i bar la mtho gang /
T02D2531:329b-37: nam tshong steng mo nas 'phred du logs dag tu
T02D2531:329b-38: nu ma'i bar dag dang mgrin pa'i logs dag nas
T02D2531:329b-39: dpung mgo'i rtse mo dag dang /
T02D2531:329b-40: de rnams kyi tshad du mtho re re'o //
T02D2531:329b-41: nu ma dang lte ba'i bar du cha bcu bzhi'o //
T02D2531:329b-42: thal gong dag dang nam tshong stod mo dang lag ma rnams thig mnyam pa'o //
T02D2531:329b-43: dpung ba dag gi rgyar bar du gdong gsum mo //
T02D2531:330a-1: logs dang nu ma dag gi bar la cha drug go //
T02D2531:330a-2: nu ma'i dkyil la cha gnyis so //
T02D2531:330a-3: nu ma'i zlum la nas gnyis so //
T02D2531:330a-4: lte ba'i dkyil 'khor la nas gsum mo //
T02D2531:330a-5: g-yas su 'khyil zhing lte ba dma' ba'o //
T02D2531:330a-6: gsang ba'i gnas la cha gsum mo //
T02D2531:330a-9: mdzes pa rgyas pa zlum pa dag go //
T02D2531:330a-10: phi tsa dag gi steng du cha brgyad do //
T02D2531:330a-11: lte ba dang gsang ba dag gi dbus su brla'i rtsa ba'o //
T02D2531:330a-12: brla dang byin pa 'di gnyis la tshad mtho do'o //
T02D2531:330a-13: pus mo'i lha nga la bzhi'o //
T02D2531:330a-14: long bu ngag la cha gnyis so //
T02D2531:330a-15: rting pa dag la cha bzhi'o //
T02D2531:330a-16: rkang pa dag gi zheng du cha brgyad do //
T02D2531:330a-18: phyed dang bcas pa'i cha gnyis kyis rkang pa'i mthe bo che'i srid du'o //
T02D2531:330a-19: de dang mnyam pa rtse mo'o //
T02D2531:330a-20: nas gnyis kyis dman pa ni gung mo'o //
T02D2531:330a-21: nas gsum gyis dman pa ni ming med do //
T02D2531:330a-22: mthe'u chung ni cha gnyis so //
T02D2531:330a-23: mthe bo che'i rgyar nas bcu gcig go //
T02D2531:330a-24: mthe bo che'i rtse mo'i bar du nas gsum mo //
T02D2531:330a-25: rtse mo'i zheng du nas dgu'o //
T02D2531:330a-26: gung mo dag gi phyed dang bcas pa'i nas brgyad do //
T02D2531:330a-27: ming med la cha gcig go //
T02D2531:330a-28: mthe'u chung la nas bdun no //
T02D2531:330a-29: sor mo gsar du skyes pa lta bu'o //
T02D2531:330a-30: sen mo rnams zla ba phyed pa lta bu'o //
T02D2531:330a-32: dpung ba dag gi srid du cha bcu drug go //
T02D2531:330a-33: lag ngar dag gi srid du cha bco brgyad do //
T02D2531:330a-34: lag pa'i mthil la cha drug go //
T02D2531:330a-35: de dang mnyam pa ni gung mo'o //
T02D2531:330a-37: de dang mnyam pa'i mthe'u chung ngo //
T02D2531:330a-38: ming med dang mdzub mo dag nas gsum gyis dman pa'i cha drug go //
T02D2531:330a-39: mthe bong zheng dag la nas gcig lhag ma'i cha gcig go //
T02D2531:330a-40: de las nas phyed kyis dman pa'i gung mo'o //
T02D2531:330a-41: ming med dang mdzub mo dag ni cha gcig go //
T02D2531:330a-42: mthe'u chung ni nas bdun no /
T02D2531:330a-43: nor bu 'ching ba nas mthe'u chung rtsa ba la cha lnga'o //
T02D2531:330a-44: de dang mnyam pa lag mthil gyi rgya'o //
T02D2531:330a-45: nor bu 'ching nas mthe bo'i rtsa bar cha bzhi'o //
T02D2531:330a-46: mdzub mo las mthe bo'i rtsa bar cha gsum mo //
T02D2531:330a-47: mthe bo la tshigs gnyis so //

T02D2531:333b-28: sngon ma ji lta ba bzhin du snying ga la
T02D2531:333b-29: sogs pa rnams su h'um a'a: aom zhes pa'i yi
T02D2531:333b-30: ge rnams bltas nas de rnams sa bon de nyid
T02D2531:333b-32: de nas rnam par dag pa'i sa dang spra tshil
T02D2531:333b-33: la sogs pa skad cig gis stong pa nyid kyis
T02D2531:333b-34: lhag par grol bar snying ga'i sa bon las bzhengs

T02D2531:333b-36: de bzhin gshegs kyi rang bzhin gang /
T02D2531:333b-38: rang bzhin med pa'i de bzhin gshegs //
T02D2531:334a-1: po rnam par sbyang bar bya'o //
T02D2531:334a-2: nam mkha' la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bltas
T02D2531:334a-3: nas me tog la sogs pa rnams kyis yang dag
T02D2531:334a-4: par mchod nas sgeg mo la sogs pa rnams kyis
T02D2531:334a-5: kyang nye bar bsnyen par bya'o //
T02D2531:334a-6: mkha' khyab kun du 'gro ba yi //
T02D2531:334a-7: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' kun //
T02D2531:334a-8: sangs rgyas mdzad pa'i gnas 'di la //
T02D2531:334a-9: mchod phyir nye bar gshegs su gsol //
T02D2531:334a-11: de nas bzhengs par bya ba'i lha'i thugs ka'i sngags
T02D2531:334a-12: kyis lan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis lhag par gnas la
T02D2531:334a-13: ye shes sems dpa' dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang
T02D2531:334a-14: bcing ba dang dbang du bya ste /

T02D2531:334a-16: aom badzra satva a'a: 'dis rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bltas nas /
T02D2531:334a-17: aom badzr'a be sha ho: 'dis rdo rje 'bebs pa'i
T02D2531:334a-18: dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas yi ge brgya
T02D2531:334a-19: pas lan gsum du brtan par bya'o //

T02D2531:334a-23: sogs pa byin nas gtad par bya'o //

T02D2531:334a-31: byed pas de'i snying ga'i sa bon gser gyis bris
T02D2531:334a-32: pa'i yi ge snying gar gzhug cing sbyang bar bya'o
T02D2531:334a-33: // gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i skud pas dkris nas de'i phyis rnams kyis bskor bar bya'o //
