T02D2531:340a-20: la sogs pa'i phyag rgya'i bdag nyid rdo rje dbyings
T02D2531:340a-21: kyi dbang phyug ma'i gzugs su bskyed nas rang gi
T02D2531:340a-23: sku gzugs la sogs pa'i g-yon logs su padma dang zla ba'i gdan la dgod do //
T02D2531:340a-24: aom badzra satva aa: zhes pa'i sngags kyis de'i spyi
T02D2531:340a-25: bo ru rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig gi phyag
T02D2531:340a-26: rgyas rgyas btab nas cho ga bzhin du bag ma'i
T02D2531:340a-28: gang der rdo rje sgeg mo mchog gi glu ma gar bcas dang //
T02D2531:340a-29: gang yang me tog bdug spos mar me mchog dang sna tshogs dri //
T02D2531:340a-30: dri med snyan pa'i glu dbyangs mtshungs med mchod pa rnams kyis ni //
T02D2531:340a-31: khyed kyis dbang bskur mchog la bkra shis de ni
T02D2531:340a-32: 'byung gyur cig / ces pa'i tshigs su bcad pas
T02D2531:340a-33: sgeg mo la sogs pa lhag par ga nas pa'i
T02D2531:340a-35: kakko la dang li shi dang dz'a ti phal dang
T02D2531:340a-36: gur gum dang sih'a dang ga pur rnams kyis tshogs
T02D2531:340a-37: pas yang dag par byug go //
T02D2531:340a-38: lha'i gos dmar po phu thung ma dang dbu la
T02D2531:340a-39: con pan dang smad gos dar sna tshogs pa dang
T02D2531:340a-40: ska rags kyang bcings bar bya zhing na bza' phul
T02D2531:340a-41: nas rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas /
T02D2531:340a-42: shing tog pi pi ling dang /
T02D2531:340b-0: sh'im @340b g'a da ka dang aa mra dang dzam
T02D2531:340b-1: bu dang dzam b'i ra dang n'a ram ga dang
T02D2531:340b-2: / rgun 'brum la sogs pa dus dang rjes su
T02D2531:340b-3: mthun pa'i shing thog gi rigs rnams kyis dbang bskur
T02D2531:340b-4: / bar bya'o // rin po che lnga la sogs
T02D2531:340b-5: pa'i nor bu'i rigs rnams kyis mchod yon phul nas
T02D2531:340b-6: bud med dam skyes bu nye bar gnas pa'i don
T02D2531:340b-7: dang glang po che dang rta dang bzhon pa'i don
T02D2531:340b-8: dang 'khor lo dang mda' gzhu dang 'dam bu'i gdan
T02D2531:340b-9: dang mda' phyed lcags las byas pa la sogs pa
T02D2531:340b-10: rnams skye bo gdug pa can bsrung ba'i don dang
T02D2531:340b-11: / bar bya'o // / khab dang gri gug dang
T02D2531:340b-12: spu gri la sogs pa dang tshem bu la sogs
T02D2531:340b-14: pa'i shing dang khyim gyi longs spyod la sogs pa
T02D2531:340b-15: mngon par 'dod pa'i don rnams yi ge gsum gyi
T02D2531:340b-17: yang dag par mchod nas sngon ma bzhin du gshegs su gsol lo //
T02D2531:340b-18: gser dang karka d'i dang 'o ma'i rgyun dang ;
T02D2531:340b-22: 'bras ma nyams pa rnams bkra shis pa'i don du dbul lo //
T02D2531:340b-23: aom yo dz'agna le sv'a h'a zhes pa'i sngags kyis
T02D2531:340b-24: sbyor par byed ba'i me bag ma'i dus kyi cho
T02D2531:340b-25: gas yang dag par mchod nas de'i me'o //
T02D2531:340b-26: bskor ba'i dus su dpal gyi 'bras bus dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2531:340b-28: nyi mas kyang yang dag par bsrung ngo //
T02D2531:340b-34: gser gyi me tog snod na gnas pa'i me tog gi rigs kyi char dang /
T02D2531:340b-35: aa ka ru'i bdug pas kyang yang dag par mdun du bya'o //
T02D2531:340b-36: de nas mchod pa la sogs pa sngon du 'gro
T02D2531:340b-37: bas bag ma'i tshigs su bcad pa brjod par bya'o
T02D2531:340b-38: // de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya 'dis //
T02D2531:340b-39: shes rab snang ba'i 'od mdzad ma //
T02D2531:340b-40: sangs rgyas phrin las rab 'jug phyir //
T02D2531:340b-41: phyag gis phyag ni bzung bar mdzod //
T02D2531:340b-43: de nas rdo rje bsrung ba dang /
T02D2531:340b-46: rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya rnams kyis yang dag par bsrungs la /
T02D2531:340b-47: aom a'a: kham b'i ra h'um zhes pa'i sngags kyis dkyil 'khor du 'jug par mos par bya'o //
T02D2531:341a-0: @341a * // sngon du gsungs pa'i rim pa'i tshad bzhis bya'o //
T02D2531:341a-1: de nas rdo rje can gyi sangs rgyas la //
T02D2531:341a-2: 'gro ba bskyab pa'i ched du dbang //
T02D2531:341a-3: yon tan 'byung gnas ji ltar stsal //
T02D2531:341a-4: da ltar 'di la stsal du gsol //
T02D2531:341a-5: zhes pa'i tshigs su bcad pas zhu zhing dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D2531:341a-6: de nas dri gtsang khang dang gzhan yang lhag pa'i
T02D2531:341a-7: gnas rnams su bzo bo mkhas pas byas pa'i seng
T02D2531:341a-8: ge'i khri mdzes pa la tshes grangs dang /
T02D2531:341a-11: yud tsam bzang po rnams las gnas par gyur pa'i sku gzugs la sogs par dgod par bya'o ;
T02D2531:341a-12: / slob dpon gyi lag pa g-yas pas rdo rje
T02D2531:341a-13: skud pa rnam pa lnga dang me tog gi phreng
T02D2531:341a-14: ba bzung nas / aom h'um hr'i /
T02D2531:341a-15: badzr'i bha ba dri dha tishtha bam kham h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:341a-16: aom su pra tishtha badzre sv'a h'a //
T02D2531:341a-17: 'dis lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas lhag par gnas par bya'o //
T02D2531:341a-18: ye dharmm'a he tu pra bha b'a he dunte sh'anta th'a ga to hya ba dat /
T02D2531:341a-19: te sh'a nytsa yo ni ro dha ae bam b'a
T02D2531:341a-20: d'i ma h'a shra ma na:de nyid kyis rab tu
T02D2531:341a-21: gnas la / de nas rang gi snying ga'i sa
T02D2531:341a-22: bon las yang dag par byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs
T02D2531:341a-23: gnas la / pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang /
T02D2531:341a-25: lha mo'i tshogs kyis nam mkha' yongs su gang bar bltas la /
T02D2531:341a-26: rig ma rnams kyi phyag na bdud rtsis yongs su gang ba'i bum pa bzung ba'i chus /
T02D2531:341a-27: bkra shis gang zhig lha yi rnam par dag mdzad pa //
T02D2531:341a-28: 'phags pa'i skye bo rnams kyis bsod nams bya ba skru na mdzad pa //
T02D2531:341a-29: 'gro ba ma lus kun la bcom ldan sh'akya seng ge yi //
T02D2531:341a-30: khyed kyis dbang bskur mchog la bkra shis de ni
T02D2531:341a-31: 'byung gyur cig / ces pa'i tshigs su bcad pa
T02D2531:341a-33: ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni //
T02D2531:341a-34: de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsol ltar //
T02D2531:341a-35: lha yi chu ni dag pa yis //
T02D2531:341a-36: de bzhin bdag gis khrus bgyi'o //
T02D2531:341a-37: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka sa ma ya shri ye h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:341a-38: aom badzra au da k'a bhi shinytsa h'um zhes brjod
T02D2531:341a-39: pas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i de nyid
T02D2531:341a-40: mchog gi bla ma dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i skus
T02D2531:341a-41: dbang bskur zhing 'dis brtan par lhag par mos shing
T02D2531:341a-42: dbang bskur ba ni chu'i dbang ngo //
T02D2531:341b-0: de bzhin gshegs @341b pa lhas lhag par gnas pa'i
T02D2531:341b-1: gos sam rin po che la sogs pa'i dbu rgyan
T02D2531:341b-2: aom tr'am h'um hr'i:aa:zhes brjod nas dkyil 'khor gyi bdag
T02D2531:341b-3: po'i sku rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid bla ma
T02D2531:341b-4: nyid du brtan par lhag par mos pas sku gzugs
T02D2531:341b-5: la sogs pa'i lha rnams kyi dbul bskon par bya'o
T02D2531:341b-6: // rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa'i phyag rgya'i
T02D2531:341b-7: sngags kyis lhag par gnas par bya'o zhes pa ni
T02D2531:341b-9: sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdo rje yi //
T02D2531:341b-10: dbang gis di ring khyod dbang bskur //
T02D2531:341b-11: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D2531:341b-12: rdo rje rab tu grub phyir zung //
T02D2531:341b-13: zhes brjod pa ni rdo rje ste //
T02D2531:341b-14: de bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa' de nyid bskyed par bsams la sbyin par bya'o //
T02D2531:341b-15: de yang sku gzugs la sogs pa'i lha rnams kyis
T02D2531:341b-16: gzung bar lhag par mos pa ni rdo rje'i dbang
T02D2531:341b-17: ngo // aom badzra dhi pa ti stvam aa bhi
T02D2531:341b-18: shinyts'a mi tishtha badzras ma ya stvam zhes brjod nas
T02D2531:341b-19: dril bus de bzhin du lhag par mos par bya'o
T02D2531:341b-20: ngo // // de yang sku gzugs la sogs pa'i
T02D2531:341b-21: lha rnams kyis bzung bar lhag par mos par bya'o
T02D2531:341b-23: aom badzra satva stvam aa bhi shinytsa mi badzra n'a m'a bhi shi ka ta /
T02D2531:341b-24: aom che ge mo badzra ta th'a ga ta stvam
T02D2531:341b-25: bhur bhum ba sva:zhes brjod nas de bzhin du rdo
T02D2531:341b-26: rje sems dpa' de nyid ji lta ba bzhin du
T02D2531:341b-27: sku gzugs la sogs pa'i lha gang gi ming du
T02D2531:341b-28: gyur par lhag par mos par bya'o zhes pa ni
T02D2531:341b-30: sku gzugs la sogs pa'i lha rnams kyi phyag tu
T02D2531:341b-31: rdo rje dang dril bu dang bcas pas ye shes
T02D2531:341b-32: kyi phyag rgya la 'khyud pa'i tshul du rnam par
T02D2531:341b-33: bsgoms nas / de nas bshad bzhin pa'i chu la
T02D2531:341b-34: sogs pa rnams kyis dbang bskur ba'i cho gas dbang
T02D2531:341b-35: bskur zhing rang rang gi rigs kyi spyi bor rgyas
T02D2531:341b-36: bsgoms nas / gdab par bya'o // rigs mi shes
T02D2531:341b-37: pa rnams la yang na rdo rje sems dpas so
T02D2531:341b-38: bsgoms nas / gdab par bya'o // // de nas aom su pra tishtha badzre sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:341b-39: zhes pa'i sngags kyis lhag par gnas par bya'o //
T02D2531:341b-40: aom h'um hr'i:bhr'um kham badzr'i bha ba dri d'a tishtha
T02D2531:341b-41: bhr'um kham zhes pa 'dis gtsug lag khang dang mchod
T02D2531:341b-43: pu sti rnams la ni aom su pra tishtha badzre sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:341b-44: zhes pa dang aom h'um hr'i:bhr'um kham zhes pa'i sngags 'di dag gis slob dpon gyi dbang ngo //
T02D2531:342a-1: dbang phyug gi sku rdo rje sems dpa' rang gi
T02D2531:342a-2: snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis bkug ste
T02D2531:342a-3: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rig ma dang
T02D2531:342a-4: bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs rnam par snang
T02D2531:342a-5: mdzad kyi sgo nas rab tu zhugs te //
T02D2531:342a-6: khu ba'i sku gzugs su gyur te bde ba chen
T02D2531:342a-7: po nyams su myong nas rdo rje dang padma dag
T02D2531:342a-9: byang chub sems kyi gzugs la sku gzugs la sogs
T02D2531:342a-10: pa'i lha rnams bde ba la rab tu zhugs par
T02D2531:342a-11: bsam par bya'o zhes pa ni gsang ba'i dbang ngo
T02D2531:342a-12: // de nas de yis rdo rje sems dpa'i lha
T02D2531:342a-13: mo gdan drangs nas snyoms par zhugs pa la sku
T02D2531:342a-14: gzugs la sogs pa'i lha rnams la lhan cig skyes
T02D2531:342a-15: pa'i dga' ba'i dam tshig nyid du lhag par mos
T02D2531:342a-16: par bya'o zhes pa ni shes rab ye shes kyi
T02D2531:342a-17: // dbang ngo // de'i rjes la rdo rje 'dzin
T02D2531:342a-18: pa nyid du bsgrub pa'i phyir dbang bzhi pa'i rang
T02D2531:342a-19: bzhin du sku gzugs la sogs pa'i lha rnams sgrib
T02D2531:342a-20: pa bag chags dang bcas pa spangs pa'i dge ba
T02D2531:342a-21: chen po stong pa nyid dang snying rje ro gcig
T02D2531:342a-22: par lhag par mos pas so zhes pas ni dbang
T02D2531:342a-23: // dbang ngo // bzhi pa'o // de nas aom
T02D2531:342a-24: a'a:badzra pushpe h'um aom a'a:badzra dh'u pe h'um aom a'a:
T02D2531:342a-25: badzra d'i pe h'um:aom a'a:badzra gndhe h'um:aom a'a:badzra nee bi
T02D2531:342a-26: dye h'um zhes pa'i sngags kyis me tog la sogs
T02D2531:342a-27: pas mchod nas bstod pa bya'o //
T02D2531:342a-28: de nas rdo rje'i thal mo sbyar nas lus kyis
T02D2531:342a-29: phyag 'tshal nas ting nge 'dzin gyi sngags dang ldan
T02D2531:342a-30: pa'i de kho na nyid kyi bden pa mnyam par
T02D2531:342a-31: bya'o // nam mkha' las byung mtshan pa'i phyir //
T02D2531:342a-32: thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog /
T02D2531:342a-33: dam tshig sems dpa' rdo rje che //
T02D2531:342a-34: che ge rdo rje deng bdag bsgrubs //
T02D2531:342a-35: dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog / dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha //
T02D2531:342a-36: rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal //
T02D2531:342a-37: mi 'gyur mchog tu bdag la bsgrubs //
T02D2531:342a-38: nyes pa med pa rtag pa khyod //
T02D2531:342a-39: 'dod chags la sogs kun chags mdzad //
T02D2531:342a-40: bcom ldan chags chen bde ba che //
T02D2531:342a-41: de nyid kho nas bdag la bsgrubs //
T02D2531:342a-42: shin tu rnam dag kun gyi mchog / gdod nas grol ba de bzhin gshegs //
T02D2531:342a-43: kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid //
T02D2531:342a-44: byang chub sems dpa' bdag la bsgrubs //
T02D2531:342b-0: dngos grub chen po @342b kun gyi mchog / dbang chen mchog gi phyag rgya yis //
T02D2531:342b-1: rdo rje chen po gsal ba las //
T02D2531:342b-2: rdo rje snyems bdag bdag la bsgrubs //
T02D2531:342b-3: sems can kun gyi yid khyab pa //
T02D2531:342b-4: sems can kun gyi snying la gnas //
T02D2531:342b-5: sems can kun gyi yab kyang yin //
T02D2531:342b-6: dam tshig mchog gi 'dod pa mchog /
T02D2531:342b-7: bden pa gang des ye shes mchog / shes rab thabs bdag dkyil 'khor la //
T02D2531:342b-8: bden pa gang des mgon po khyed //
T02D2531:342b-9: 'dod pa nyid ni yongs rdzogs mdzod //
T02D2531:342b-10: de nas 'di de me tog ces pa la sogs
T02D2531:342b-11: pa'i tshigs su bcad pas me tog la sogs pa
T02D2531:342b-12: rnams kyis yang dag bar mchod la bstod pa byas
T02D2531:342b-13: nas chad pa dang lhag pa'i nyes pa zhi bar
T02D2531:342b-14: bya ba'i phyir // aom badzra satva sa ma ya /
T02D2531:342b-16: badzra satva tve no pa tishtha /
T02D2531:342b-18: su to shyo me bha ba /
T02D2531:342b-19: aa nu rakto me bha pa /
T02D2531:342b-20: su po shyo me bha ba /
T02D2531:342b-22: sarba karmma su tsa me tsittam shre ya:ku ru h'um
T02D2531:342b-23: ha ha ha ha ho:bha ga b'a na sarba ta
T02D2531:342b-24: th'a ga ta badzra m'a me mu nytsa badzr'i bha
T02D2531:342b-25: ba ma h'a sa ma ya satva aa:zhes pa'i yi
T02D2531:342b-26: ge brgya pa lan gsum bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2531:342b-27: gang 'di rab tu gnas pa'i lha //
T02D2531:342b-28: bskal pa gzhan dag bskal pa brgyar //
T02D2531:342b-29: sa dang me dang chu dang rlung //
T02D2531:342b-30: kun nas lha rnams kun gyis bsrungs //
T02D2531:342b-32: ma rnyed yongs su ma shes dang //
T02D2531:342b-33: gzhan yang nus pa ma mchis pas //
T02D2531:342b-34: bya ba nyams pa gang bgyis pa //
T02D2531:342b-35: khyed la thams cad bzod par gsol //
T02D2531:342b-36: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lha rnams dang //
T02D2531:342b-37: de sras rnams la bzod par gsol ;
T02D2531:342b-38: / cho ga chad dang lhag pa rnams //
T02D2531:342b-39: tshangs sogs 'jig rten skyong rnams dang //
T02D2531:342b-40: lha rnams kun la bzod par gsol //
T02D2531:342b-41: sku gzugs yun rings gnas gyur cig / g-yon gyi bdag la zhi ba dang //
T02D2531:342b-42: rgyas dang bkra shis rgyun du mdzod //
T02D2531:342b-43: sbyin bdag gis kyang sku gzugs la sogs pa la bskor ba dang /
T02D2531:342b-44: mchod pa dang tsandan la sogs pa dbul lo //
T02D2531:342b-45: slob dpon kyang yang dag pa'i yon la sogs pas yongs su mnyes par bya'o //
T02D2531:342b-46: bya ba bsdus pa'i rnam par bshad pa las rab tu byed pa drug pa'o /
T02D2531:343a-2: / gand'i'i mtshan nyid de nas ni //
T02D2531:343a-3: de dang de rnams rab gnas dang //
T02D2531:343a-4: rab tu 'byin pa gzigs de bzhin //
T02D2531:343a-5: de la gtsug lag khang la sogs pa tshar nas phyi dang nang du ji ltar gnas pa la /
T02D2531:343a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' dang
T02D2531:343a-7: rig pa'i lha mo rnams dang khro bo'i tshogs rnams
T02D2531:343a-9: sgo so sor mig dang bum pa zung rnams kyang bri bar bya'o //
T02D2531:343a-10: de la yang lha khang gi phyi'i rtsig pa dag
T02D2531:343a-11: dang sgo'i g-yas g-yon gyi logs dag la bum sna
T02D2531:343a-12: gdong bcu pa bri bar bya'o //
T02D2531:343a-13: yang na gzhan dag bri bar bya'o //
T02D2531:343a-14: de dang nye bar rang gi mngon par 'dod pa'i
T02D2531:343a-15: rig ma lha mo rnams sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa'i
T02D2531:343a-17: grva sgo'i steng du de bzhin gshegs pa lnga rnams dang 'khor rnams dang /
T02D2531:343a-18: khra ma'i steng du rang lugs kyi byang chub sems
T02D2531:343a-19: dpa' rnams dang lhag ma la ji ltar mdzes pa'i
T02D2531:343a-21: nang du bzhugs pa'i lha'i rgyab la byang chub kyi shing bri bar bya'o //
T02D2531:343a-22: bcom ldan 'das kyi glo g-yon dang g-yas dag tu
T02D2531:343a-23: chu bdag dang gnod sbyin gyi bdag po bri bar
T02D2531:343a-24: bya'o // de la chu bdag sku mdog dkar po
T02D2531:343a-25: sbrul gyi gdengs ka dgu yis brgyan pa sems dpa'i
T02D2531:343a-26: skyil krung gis bzhugs pa phyag gnyis pa /
T02D2531:343a-27: g-yon pa dang g-yas pa'i phyag gis sbrul gyi zhags pa dang rin po che 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2531:343a-28: gnod sbyin gyi bdag po ni phyag na na ku
T02D2531:343a-29: li dang bi dza p'u ra ka bsnams pa sems
T02D2531:343a-30: dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa bri bar bya'o //
T02D2531:343a-31: sgo'i g-yas logs su stobs po che dang /
T02D2531:343a-32: nag po chen po dag ste /

T02D2531:356a-3: de bzhin du de'i g-yon logs su gnas pa la /

T02D2531:356a-6: 'dis lan nyi shu rtsa gcig mngon par yongs su

T02D2531:356a-16: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta ma ni shata d'i

T02D2531:356a-26: dbyings kyi mtshan ma nyon mongs pa dang sdig pa

T02D2531:356a-29: dpa' rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyis gdan drangs

T02D2531:356b-14: pam yig las bskyed pa'i padma dang /
T02D2531:356b-15: a'a yig las bskyed pa'i me long dang /
T02D2531:356b-16: aa yig las bskyed pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje dang /
T02D2531:356b-17: khyu mchog dang h'um yig las bskyed pa'i rdo rje dang ;

T02D2531:356b-22: dam tshig sems dpa'i nang du bsgom mo //

T02D2531:356b-26: zhes pa ni rgyal mtshan gyi rab tu gnas pa'o
T02D2531:356b-28: / // / de bzhin du pam yig las bskyed pa'i rab
T02D2531:356b-29: tu gsal bar byed pa'i rab tu tsha bar skyes
T02D2531:356b-30: pa'i ba dan dam tshig sems dpa'i skur bsgoms la
T02D2531:356b-31: / de dang mtshungs pa'i ye shes sems dpa' rang
T02D2531:356b-32: gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis bkug
T02D2531:356b-33: la dam tshig sems dpa'i nang du bsgoms nas bum
T02D2531:356b-34: pa'i chus bsangs la yang dag par mchod nas /

T02D2531:356b-36: 'dis lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2531:356b-37: 'di ni ba dan rab tu gnas ba'o /
T02D2531:357a-0: // / de nas dkyil 'khor pa dang lha'i gnas kyi bdag po rnams dang 'jig @357a * //
T02D2531:357a-1: rten skyong ba dang ltad mo pa'i skye bo rnams dang bzo bo dang /

T02D2531:357a-3: bo rnams ji ltar 'os pa'i mchod pas mchod nas
T02D2531:357a-4: sngon du gsungs pa'i cho gas gtor ma chen po

T02D2531:357a-8: dang / rgyal mtshan la sogs pa rnams rnyings pa
T02D2531:357a-9: dang gas pa dang mes tshig pa dang zhig pa
T02D2531:357a-10: la sogs pa la lha rnams gnas pa de la

T02D2531:357a-14: skye bos stongs pa la sogs pa'i nyes pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i phyir na /
T02D2531:357a-15: zhig pa rnams cho gas gso bar bya'o //
T02D2531:357a-16: de la slob dpon ting nge 'dzin gsum gyi rnal
T02D2531:357a-17: 'byor dang ldan pas mchod yon dang me tog dang
T02D2531:357a-20: zhal zas la sogs pas yang dag par mchod nas 'dis gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02D2531:357a-21: bcom ldan rdo rje che ge mchog / rig pa'i rgyal po khyed la 'dud //
T02D2531:357a-22: mgon po legs par bya ba'i phyir //

T02D2531:357a-25: khyed rnams la ni mchod par bgyi //
T02D2531:357a-26: ye shes bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin gyi //
T02D2531:357a-27: bum pa'i nang du rab tu gzhug / ces pas so //
T02D2531:357a-28: de nas rang nyid kyi sku la de'i snying ga'i
T02D2531:357a-29: sa bon bltas la lag ba g-yon pas bgrang phreng
T02D2531:357a-30: 'dzin zhing de dang bcings pa'i skud pa sna lnga
T02D2531:357a-31: rdo rje dang bcas pa lag pa g-yas pas bzung
T02D2531:357a-32: nas rang rang gi sngags kyis lan brgya rtsa brgyad
T02D2531:357a-33: yongs su bzlas la ho: yig gnyis kyi bar du

T02D2531:357a-35: // de nas sngon du gsungs pa'i rim pas sbyin
T02D2531:357a-36: sreg byas nas khyu mchog thag pas btags nas snod
T02D2531:357a-37: la sogs pa rnams kyis bskyod par bya'o //
T02D2531:357a-38: de nas de la bum pa ni gnas dben par
T02D2531:357a-39: bzhugs la rtag tu me tog la sogs pa rnams
T02D2531:357b-0: kyis yang dag par mchod par @357b bya'o ;
T02D2531:357b-1: ; gang zhig mchod rten la sogs pa rdo rje'i
T02D2531:357b-2: rang bzhin chag pa dang gas pa dang zhig pa
T02D2531:357b-3: mang por gyur pa de rnams gtsang po'i chu chen
T02D2531:357b-4: po la zam pa la sogs pa nas gshegs par
T02D2531:357b-5: bya'o // gang dang gang zhig sa'i rang bzhin gyi
T02D2531:357b-6: mchod rten la sogs pa gang gis mngon par 'dus
T02D2531:357b-7: byas pa rnams slar yang sbyar bar mi bya bar

T02D2531:357b-10: de dang de mar gyis brlan pa'i gos kyis yongs
T02D2531:357b-11: su dkris la sbyin sreg gi me la bsreg par
T02D2531:357b-12: bya'o // gang du de zangs ma la sogs pa'i
T02D2531:357b-13: rang bzhin de yongs su bzhu nas sngon ma'i tshad
T02D2531:357b-15: de nas mchod rten la sogs pa yongs su grub

T02D2531:357b-19: gdan drangs nas mchod rten la sogs pa'i dam tshig
T02D2531:357b-20: sems dpa' nang du bsgom par bya'o //

T02D2531:357b-28: de la slob ma rnams la me'i lha dang /
T02D2531:357b-31: chos sgrogs pa la sogs pa rnams mchod par bya
T02D2531:357b-32: zhing ltad mo ba rnams so rtsi la sogs pas
T02D2531:357b-35: rgyas pa rnam par 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir mthe
T02D2531:357b-36: bong g-yas pa lag pa g-yon pas bzung nas rdzas
T02D2531:357b-37: so so'i dgang blugs lan gsum mam bdun du dbul

T02D2531:357b-41: mar me la sogs pa phul nas yongs su gang
T02D2531:357b-42: ba'i dgang blugs gsum mam lan bdun gyi bar du
T02D2531:357b-43: phul nas bzod pa gsol bar bya'o //
T02D2531:358a-0: sbyin bdag gi tshogs rnams la bum pa'i chus dbang bskur @358a * //

T02D2531:358a-7: phud kyi cha gser la sogs pa'i snod du bzhag la /

T02D2531:358a-9: sngags 'dis lha la sogs pa rnams la dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2531:358a-10: sngon du gsungs pa'i cho gas phyogs kyi gtor ma
T02D2531:358a-11: chen po yang phul nas dge ba yongs su bsngo
T02D2531:358a-12: ba dang / dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bskor ba
T02D2531:358a-13: gsum byas la bcom ldan 'das la mngon par phyogs
T02D2531:358a-14: par gnas te yi ge brgya pa lan gsum du
T02D2531:358a-15: brjod pas bzod pa gsol bar bya'o //
T02D2531:358a-16: rdzogs sangs rgyas dang lha rnams dang ;

T02D2531:358a-19: cho ga'i bya rnams bzod par mdzod //
T02D2531:358a-20: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang //
T02D2531:358a-21: slang yang 'byon pa nyid du zhu //
T02D2531:358a-22: aom a'a: h'um badzra mu: zhes pa 'dis ye shes
T02D2531:358a-23: kyi 'khor lo gshegs nas sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D2531:358a-24: 'khor lo'i bdag nyid kyi nang du bsgom mo //
T02D2531:358a-25: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am a'adya
T02D2531:358a-26: nutpanna tv'a ta aom a'a: h'um mu: zhes brjod nas
T02D2531:358a-27: chos thams cad skye ba med par lhag par mos
T02D2531:358a-28: par byas nas dril bu dkrol zhing rdo rje dang
T02D2531:358a-29: bcas pa'i lag pas tshangs pa'i thig gi lam gyis
T02D2531:358a-30: gtso bo'i gnas su dbyi bar bya'o //

T02D2531:358a-33: dbyi bar bya'o // de nas sgo rnams dang zur

T02D2531:358a-38: skam pas 'khyil pa'i rnam par byas te phur bu'i
T02D2531:358a-39: rtse mor de nyid kyi sngags brjod nas phur bu
T02D2531:358b-1: / sngags ni aom badzra k'i l'i k'i l'a ya
T02D2531:358b-2: sarba k'i l'an badzra dha r'a dzny'a pa ya h'um
T02D2531:358b-3: h'um phat ho // de nas aom ru ru sphu
T02D2531:358b-4: ru dzva la tishtha siddha lo tsa ni sarb'a rtha
T02D2531:358b-6: 'dis brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags nas 'o mas bkru bar bya'o //
T02D2531:358b-7: phur bu'i lha rnams gshegs nas deng rnams dgang bar bya'o //
T02D2531:358b-8: zhib la sogs pa'i don du slong ba rnams la rdul tshon cung zad sbyin par bya'o //
T02D2531:358b-9: rdul tshon gzhan thams cad ni bum pa'i nang du blugs ta bzung nas /
T02D2531:358b-10: glang po che'i steng ma 'od li la sbyin bdag
T02D2531:358b-11: gis byin pa'i gos kyis brgyan pa'i rnal 'byor mas
T02D2531:358b-12: bzung ste / gdugs dang ba dan dang rol mo
T02D2531:358b-13: la sogs pas gdan drangs nas ba'i lci bas byugs
T02D2531:358b-14: te gtsang po chen po'i 'gram du 'dug nas rdul
T02D2531:358b-15: tshon dkar pos padma 'dab ma brgyad pa bris la

T02D2531:358b-17: bzung ste / h'um sv'a h'a / shar la sogs pa'i padma'i 'dab ma rnams la /

T02D2531:358b-19: aom a'a: padm'a ya h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:358b-20: aom a'a: taksha k'a ya h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:358b-21: aom a'a: ba su ki ne h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:358b-22: aom a'a: ma h'a padma ya h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:358b-23: aom a'a: sham kha p'a l'a ya h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:358b-24: aom a'a: karko t'a ya h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:358b-25: aom a'a: ku li k'a ya h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:358b-26: zhes pa 'dis klu rnams bkod la yang dag par mchod nas /
T02D2531:358b-27: aom a'a nanda b'a su ki /
T02D2531:358b-30: sham kha p'a la ku li ka / ba ru na ya /
T02D2531:358b-33: so ma shi kh'i ma h'a so ma shi kh'i /
T02D2531:358b-34: danda dha ra ma h'a da nda dha ra aa ba l'a la /
T02D2531:358b-36: nando pa nanda s'a ga ra ma h'a s'a ga ra /
T02D2531:358b-37: aa na ba ta pta ma h'a ta pta /
T02D2531:358b-38: shr'i k'anta ma h'a k'a nta ratna k'anta /
T02D2531:358b-39: su r'u pa ma h'a su r'u pa /

T02D2531:358b-42: 'dis klu rnams la 'o ma'i gtor ma phul nas
T02D2531:358b-43: mchod pa byas nas klu rnams la rdul tshon rnams
T02D2531:358b-44: yang dag par gtad par bya'o //
T02D2531:358b-45: aom g'i li g'i li h'um dza: sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:358b-46: sngags 'dis rab tu dor bar bya'o //
T02D2531:358b-47: de nas klu rnams kyis bkur sti chen pos sa
T02D2531:358b-48: 'og gi mthil du gdan drang par bsam par bya'o
T02D2531:358b-49: // gang du rdul tshon khyer ba'i bum pa chus
T02D2531:358b-50: yongs su bkang nas de bzhin du khyer bar byas
T02D2531:358b-51: nas des zhi bar bya ba'i don du dkyil 'khor
T02D2531:359a-0: khang pa la sogs pa bsang zhing @359a * //
T02D2531:359a-2: ba'i lci bas dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa byugs la gzhon nu ma'i mchod pa bya'o //
T02D2531:359a-3: sbyin bdag gis slob dpon dang sgon [?] gnas pa'i slob dpon dang las kyi rdo rje dang /
T02D2531:359a-4: bzo bo rnams la ji ltar 'os shing ji ltar nus pa'i gos la sogs pa dang /
T02D2531:359a-5: so rtsi la sogs pa rnams kyis mnyes par bya'o
T02D2531:359a-6: zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor gshegs su gsol ba'i cho
T02D2531:359a-8: / de nas mtshan mo'i dus kyi tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga bri bar bya ste /
T02D2531:359a-9: de la dbang bskur la gsungs pa'i brtul zhugs dang
T02D2531:359a-10: ldan pa khyim na gnas pa dang rnal 'byor ma
T02D2531:359a-11: rnams dang dam tshig kun nas spyod cing yongs su
T02D2531:359a-13: skal pa can de rnams la las kyi rdo rje
T02D2531:359a-14: can gyis song nas de rnams kyi mdun du mandala
T02D2531:359a-15: byas nas snyan gsan dbab par bya'o //
T02D2531:359a-16: ye shes sku can khyed la 'dud //
T02D2531:359a-17: srid pa las sgrol khyed la 'dud //
T02D2531:359a-18: di ring bdag khyim mchod don la ;
T02D2531:359a-19: / bdag ni gsol ba 'debs bgyid do //
T02D2531:359a-20: zhes pa 'dis snyan gsan dbab par bgyi'o //
T02D2531:359a-21: de nas byon pa na de rnams kyi zhabs la d'u rwa'i kunda dang /
T02D2531:359a-22: 'bras ma nyams pa dang tsandan la sogs pa'i mchod yon dbul bar bya ste /
T02D2531:359a-28: pri yang ku dang cha mnyam pa rnams ni yang
T02D2531:359a-29: dag par btags la de rnams kyis bsres pa'i dri
T02D2531:359a-30: ma med pa'i chus khrus bya'o //
T02D2531:359a-31: rgan rims bzhin du go rims kyis 'jug par bya'o //
T02D2531:359a-32: yongs su brtags pa'i gdan rnams la 'jug par bya'o ;
T02D2531:359a-33: ;'dir rgan pa ni rim pa bzhin du lnga ste dbang gis rgan pa'i go rims ni gcig go //
T02D2531:359a-34: brtul zhugs kyis rgan pa'i go rims ni gnyis pa'o //
T02D2531:359a-35: ye shes kyis rgan pa'i go rims ni gsum pa'o //
T02D2531:359a-36: skye bas rgan pa'i go rims ni bzhi ba'o //
T02D2531:359a-37: rig pas rgan pa'i go rims ni lnga pa'o //
T02D2531:359a-38: rjes su mthun pa'i me tog dri bzang pos dri dang /
T02D2531:359a-39: phreng ba dang snang gsal dang lde gu dang /
T02D2531:359a-40: mchod phyir thogs dang zhal zas dang /
T02D2531:359a-41: 'bras phye ser po dang gtor ma dang so rtsi la sogs pa mang po dang 'bras bu dang /
T02D2531:359a-42: shing thog dang phye ma la sogs pa rnams dang /
T02D2531:359b-1: sha'i rnam pa rnams yang dag par bsogs nas //

T02D2531:359b-4: ki r'a ta ru se na sa ra p'a d'i n'am tundam bandh'a ya h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:359b-5: sngags 'di la na nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas
T02D2531:359b-6: tshogs pa 'dus pa'i gnas kyi phyi rol du mtshams
T02D2531:359b-8: de nas sngags 'dis gtor ma 'god par bya ste /
T02D2531:359b-9: a'a: yig las byung ba'i rgya ma tsho'i rang bzhin du gtor ma'i snod do //
T02D2531:359b-10: de'i steng du zas ni aom yig las byung ba'i ri rab kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D2531:359b-11: h'um yig las byung ba'i rlung lnga'i rang bzhin gyi ba dan lnga'o //
T02D2531:359b-12: su yig las byung ba'i nor rgyas kyi ngo bo mchod phyir thogs so //
T02D2531:359b-13: ham yig las byung ba'i me tog gi phreng ba sna tshogs pa'o //
T02D2531:359b-14: ram yig las byung ba'i ma dang ta yig dag gi mig gi ri mo dag go //
T02D2531:359b-15: aom yig las byung ba'i til la sogs pa'i phye ma'o //
T02D2531:359b-16: tram yig las byung ba'i rakta'o //
T02D2531:359b-17: hram yig las byung ba'i nya'o //
T02D2531:359b-18: kham yig las byung ba'i sha'o //
T02D2531:359b-19: h'um yig las byung ba'i kha dog thams cad pa'o //
T02D2531:359b-20: de rnams khrag dang nya dang sha dang mig dang mchod phyir thogs pa dang /
T02D2531:359b-21: ba dan gyis mtshan pa rnams ni go rims ji lta ba bzhin no //
T02D2531:359b-22: rab tu 'gro dang chu bdag ko l'a'i ri dang /
T02D2531:359b-23: aattatta dgod rgyal bar byed pa nye bar rgyal byed
T02D2531:359b-24: tsa ri tra dang ko ts'i char pa rnams rgyud
T02D2531:359b-25: las gsungs pa'i rim pas dam tshig gi ri lu
T02D2531:359b-26: rnams bsgrubs nas khar bcug ste chang lhag par gnas
T02D2531:359b-27: pa dang / lcags kyu lhag par gnas pa yang bya'o //
T02D2531:359b-28: de la klu rigs brgyad kyi gzugs kyi padma 'dab
T02D2531:359b-29: ma brgyad pa'i steng du sum las gtor ma'i snod
T02D2531:359b-30: kyi gdan no // de'i steng du bam yig las
T02D2531:359b-31: byung ba'i chu bdag gi rang bzhin gyi snod do
T02D2531:359b-32: kyi gdan no // // de'i nang du h'um yig
T02D2531:359b-33: las byung ba'i byang chub sems kyi ye shes kyi
T02D2531:359b-34: bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin du rnam par bsgoms nas me
T02D2531:359b-35: tog gi phreng ba dang mchod phyir thogs kyis mgul
T02D2531:359b-36: du brgyan nas tsandan gyi lde gu dang /
T02D2531:359b-37: gur kum gyis rnam par byugs nas mig dang sindh'u ras rnam par brgyan par bya'o //
T02D2531:359b-38: slar yang chang de bzhin du lhag par gnas par bya'o //
T02D2531:360a-0: a'a: yig las byung ba'i bdud @360a * //
T02D2531:360a-2: ha yig las byung ba'i kha dog ho: yig las
T02D2531:360a-3: byung ba'i rlung gis dri ngan pa rnams pas la
T02D2531:360a-4: nas / aom a'a: h'um 'dis lhag par gnas par bya'o //
T02D2531:360a-5: slar yang ha ho: hri: aa: sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:360a-6: 'dis lag pa g-yon pa'i mthe bo dang ming med
T02D2531:360a-7: sbyar nas dkrugs te dbus su chos 'byung mngon par
T02D2531:360a-8: bri bar bya'o // aom aa mri te aa mri
T02D2531:360a-9: te sam bha be ae hye hi aa mri te
T02D2531:360a-10: pra ba sh'a ya hr'i: h'um /
T02D2531:360a-11: 'dis lan gsum mam nyi shu rtsa gcig gis bdud rtsi dgug par bya'o //
T02D2531:360a-12: aom h'um dzum grum shrum hram sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:360a-13: 'dis lcags kyu lnga lhag par gnas par bya'o //
T02D2531:360a-14: grub pa rnams kyi sngags bzang po //
T02D2531:360a-15: dpa' bo'i chos 'di gzung bar gyis //
T02D2531:360a-16: bram ze rgyal rigs gdol pa rnams //
T02D2531:360a-17: rnam pa gcig tu 'jug par gyis //
T02D2531:360a-18: tshigs su bcad ba 'di brjod cing //
T02D2531:360a-19: mi mo zhal gyi padma cung zad dmar zhing nu
T02D2531:360a-20: ma mkhregs shing rgyas pa zung ldan rgyan rnams kun
T02D2531:360a-22: shin tu yon tan rgya chen dang ldan yid kyi
T02D2531:360a-23: mi mthun phyogs bor rnam par dul bcas btsun mos
T02D2531:360a-24: bdud rtsi so sor dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2531:360a-26: legs 'ongs chos kyi rgyal po la //
T02D2531:360a-27: rnal 'byor yid ni chags spangs nas //
T02D2531:360a-28: gnyis dang gnyis min rnam grol khyod //
T02D2531:360a-29: de nyid gcig pa khyod phyag 'tshal //
T02D2531:360a-30: tshigs su ba cad pa 'dis pad skor sngon du 'gro bas blang par bya'o //
T02D2531:360a-31: aom sarba ta th'a ga t'a mri ta sv'a bh'a
T02D2531:360a-32: b'a a'atma ko& ham zhes brjod nas bdud rtsi myang
T02D2531:360a-33: bar bya'o // de nas sbyin bdag gis pus mo
T02D2531:360a-34: g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te snying gar
T02D2531:360a-35: thal mo sbyar nas bstod pa brjod par bya'o //
T02D2531:360a-37: ye shes stsol mdzad khyod la 'dud //
T02D2531:360a-38: dag pa'i gzugs can khyod la 'dud //
T02D2531:360a-39: srid pa sgrol mdzad khyod la 'dud //
T02D2531:360a-40: na ma ste tu na ma ste tu na mo na ma: bdag ni gus pas khyod phyag 'tshal //
T02D2531:360a-42: de nas rang rang gi lhag par mos pa'i dbye
T02D2531:360a-43: bas so so'i ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgom pa dang
T02D2531:360a-44: ldan pas gtor ma phul nas rdul tshon yang dag
T02D2531:360a-45: par gshegs te / gang ji ltar 'dus pa la
T02D2531:360b-0: @360b so sor dri bzangs kyi thig le phul nas
T02D2531:360b-1: dang por stong pa'i dang las tsog pur 'dug nas
T02D2531:360b-2: par gshegs te / / de nas skyur mo dang /
T02D2531:360b-4: spags la sogs pa rnams phul nas sh'a li'i zan dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2531:360b-7: sna tshogs pa'i nya dang sha'i rnam pa rnams dang /
T02D2531:360b-8: bza' ba la sogs pa sna tshogs pa pishta phu pa ka dang /
T02D2531:360b-9: la du la sogs pa khur ba'i rnam pa rnams dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2531:360b-10: so sor re re nas phung po las gsar pa
T02D2531:360b-11: rnams go rims bzhin du blangs nas chang dang chu
T02D2531:360b-12: dang / so rtsi dang me tog gi phreng ba dang /
T02D2531:360b-13: mar me yang de'i steng du phul nas las thams
T02D2531:360b-14: cad pa'i sngags bzlas nas sgo la mngon par phyogs
T02D2531:360b-15: pa'i sa phyogs gtsang mar gtor ma'i phung po gtang
T02D2531:360b-16: bar bya'o // de nas sbyin bdag gis dri bzangs
T02D2531:360b-17: kyi chus sngon bzhin du mandala byas nas tshigs su
T02D2531:360b-18: bcad pa gsum bo 'dis gsol ba gdab par bya'o
T02D2531:360b-19: bar bya'o // // rnal 'byor bdud rtsi'i ro gcig btung ba rnam dag sems kyi ni //
T02D2531:360b-20: gnas la sogs pa'i phyogs su 'jug pas rnam par dag pa'i lus //
T02D2531:360b-21: dpal gyi gnas dbus mchog gi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i mgon po ste //
T02D2531:360b-22: mchog gi bla ma la ni mgo bos rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2531:360b-23: lha yi phreng bas brgyan pa'i lus can rin po che //
T02D2531:360b-24: lus kun rtag tu rnam par mdzes pa dpa' bo yis //
T02D2531:360b-25: 'khor lo la gnas mgon po lhan skyes dri med pa //
T02D2531:360b-26: rtag tu rnal 'byor sngom pas 'jug la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2531:360b-27: rnam pa gcig tu mdzad pa de yang khu ba'i gnas la padma'i mchog gi snying po la //
T02D2531:360b-28: de'i dbus la mchog gi ham sa kunda dkar po
T02D2531:360b-29: rnam par skyed mdzad kun gyi bdag / thams cad
T02D2531:360b-30: mkhyen pa'i shin tu rnam dag gnas ni shin tu
T02D2531:360b-31: mdzes pa'i lha mo'i gnas la ni //
T02D2531:360b-32: lhan skyes dri med mchog gi bde ba lhan skyes 'byung ba'i 'dren pa khyed la bdag phyag 'tshal //
T02D2531:360b-33: zhes brjod nas ji ltar dgyes par mdzad du gsol zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D2531:361a-0: de la rjes su chags pa'i sdug bsngal la sogs yang @361a * //
T02D2531:361a-1: dag ldan pa'i lus kyi shing ni ye shes mi
T02D2531:361a-2: yis yang dag bsregs nas don dam sbyin sreg bya
T02D2531:361a-3: // gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg
T02D2531:361a-4: byas zhal dang spyan dang snyan dang shangs dang sku
T02D2531:361a-5: rnams bde bar tshim par bya //
T02D2531:361a-6: de nas nang du phra mo'i sangs rgyas dang sangs
T02D2531:361a-7: rgyas kyi rnam pa'i sku gzugs khyab bdag chen po
T02D2531:361a-8: dang // dkyil 'khor pa'i lha rnams dang bcas pa
T02D2531:361a-9: la mthe bong dang ming med dag gis bdud rtsi'i
T02D2531:361a-10: thigs pa yang dag par bzung nas legs par dbul
T02D2531:361a-11: dang // bar bya'o // de nas lte ba'i dkyil
T02D2531:361a-12: 'khor du gyur pa'i thur sel gyi rlung gis bcud
T02D2531:361a-13: rnams bku gnas hub gsum btung ste ye shes chen
T02D2531:361a-14: po dang ldan pa'i sngags pa bde bar gnas par
T02D2531:361a-15: dang // bar bya'o // bya'o // de nas bza' ba dang /
T02D2531:361a-20: chang la sogs pa rnams kyis yang dag par tshim par bya'o //
T02D2531:361a-21: mtshan mo ril po gnyid nyal bar mi bya'o //
T02D2531:361a-22: de nas gar dang glu dang rol mo rnams kyis rgyal ba'i tshogs pa thams cad mchod par bya'o //
T02D2531:361a-23: de'i rjes la bdag med pa'i ye shes kyi bdag
T02D2531:361a-24: nyid kyis sangs rgyas dang ldan pas rang rang gi
T02D2531:361a-25: spyi bo'i steng du mtho gang gi tshod kyi steng
T02D2531:361a-26: nas 'dzag pa'i mthar thug par gyur par ye shes
T02D2531:361a-27: bdud rtsi'i rgyun gyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par
T02D2531:361a-28: bsgoms la / de'i dbus su rang rang gi lha rnams su bon la gnas par gyur te /
T02D2531:361a-30: rang gi spyi bor gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2531:361a-31: gyi steng du rang rang gi lha rnams kyi mtshan
T02D2531:361a-32: ma nas kyi 'bru'i tshad tsam rnam par bsgoms la
T02D2531:361a-33: tshim par bya'o // de nas rnal 'byor dang gzhan
T02D2531:361a-34: rnal 'byor pa thabs dang shes rab kyi ngo bo
T02D2531:361a-35: nyid snying rje chen po'i ngo dang yang dag par
T02D2531:361a-36: ldan pas dngos po thams cad kyi rang bzhin rnam
T02D2531:361a-37: par thar pa gsum gyis rnam par dag pa 'gyur
T02D2531:361a-38: ba med pa don dam pa'i bde bas las thams
T02D2531:361a-39: cad la byed pa thams cad mtha' yas pa'i de
T02D2531:361a-40: bzhin gshegs pa'i skur rnam par bsam par bya'o //
T02D2531:361b-0: gang gi tshe zla ba'i lam gyis rlung @361b rab
T02D2531:361b-1: tu dbab pa de'i tshe sbyin bdag la yang dag
T02D2531:361b-2: par bsten pa'i shis pa brjod par bya'o //
T02D2531:361b-3: de nas aom shr'i badzri ghem h'um zhes pa 'di
T02D2531:361b-4: rnams kyi sa bon las skyes pa kha dog thams
T02D2531:361b-5: cad pa'i yi ge gsum gyi sngags kyis lan bdun
T02D2531:361b-6: yongs su bzlas nas rab tu spyad par bya'o //
T02D2531:361b-7: de nas so rtsi dang mar me dang spos kyi
T02D2531:361b-8: reng bu la sogs pa phul nas rtsa ba'i gtor
T02D2531:361b-9: ma shar phyogs su gnas pa'i gtor ma'i stegs bu
T02D2531:361b-11: lhag ma'i sngags rnams brjod par bya'o //
T02D2531:361b-12: de nas las kyi rdo rje can gyis 'khor lo'i
T02D2531:361b-13: dbang phyug la sogs pa rnams la rim pa bzhin
T02D2531:361b-14: thal mo sbyar nas gshegs pa'i gsol ba gdab par
T02D2531:361b-15: bya'o // 'khor lo'i dbang phyug la sogs pa rnams
T02D2531:361b-16: kyis yang bgyi'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas de
T02D2531:361b-17: nas so so'i lhag ma rnams bsdus te /
T02D2531:361b-18: zan dang tshod ma la sogs pa byin nas /
T02D2531:361b-19: 'khor lo'i dbang phyug gi mdun du phung por bkod
T02D2531:361b-20: nas ka ram ka ra dza:'i me tog rnams kyang
T02D2531:361b-21: snod chen po'i nang du spungs te //
T02D2531:361b-22: de nas zas gtsang ma'i lhag ma rnams kyang cung
T02D2531:361b-23: zad bsdus nas zan dang tshod ma la sogs pa
T02D2531:361b-24: byin nas / 'khor lo'i dbang phyug gi nam mkha'i
T02D2531:361b-25: mthil du dud pa dang sol me'i pho nya mo
T02D2531:361b-26: bltas nas me tog la sogs pa rnams kyis yang
T02D2531:361b-27: dag par mchod nas sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs la
T02D2531:361b-28: rang rang gi gnas la rab tu spyad par bya'o
T02D2531:361b-29: byin nas / // aom shuddha dharma aa a'a aam aa:sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:361b-30: hi li hu li ma h'a h'u li hu phem ho sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:361b-31: zhes pa ni lhag ma'i phung po'i sngags so //
T02D2531:361b-32: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas kha'i zur du mche ba'i rnam par sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D2531:361b-33: de bzhin du phyag rgya bcings nas sngags brjod par bya ste /
T02D2531:361b-37: siddha nu she sh'a na b'a sa ni pre ta
T02D2531:361b-38: mu khi tsanda ka r'a li ru dhi ra pri
T02D2531:361b-39: ye sa ma y'a ra kshi ta yo g'a pa
T02D2531:361b-40: ki ri r'a be pi tri ba na ma dhye
T02D2531:361b-41: bhum dza ha baksha ha ri ghra ha sa ha
T02D2531:361b-42: ga na d'u te dh'u m'am ga ri suddha k'a
T02D2531:361b-43: ra li tishtha sv'i ku ru h'um grihna sarba dusht'a
T02D2531:361b-44: na na baksha baksha h'um phem hom hem phat sv'a
T02D2531:361b-45: h'a / zhes pa ni ka ram ka'i gtor ma'i sngags so //
T02D2531:362a-1: ba'i sangs rgyas lha rnams dang //
T02D2531:362a-2: gang yang de sras tshangs la sogs //
T02D2531:362a-4: cho ga'i bya rnams bzod par mdzod //
T02D2531:362a-5: ces pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'dis bzod par gsol bar bya'o //
T02D2531:362a-7: zhes pa'i sngags 'dis dkyil 'khor bdag nyid la bsdus nas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02D2531:362a-8: de nas lag pa bkrus nas dri dang so rtsi
T02D2531:362a-9: dang mchod yon la sogs pa phul nas sbyin bdag
T02D2531:362a-10: gis mandala byas nas mar me phul la /
T02D2531:362a-12: sarba pa nam pu na r'a ga ma n'a ya tsa h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D2531:362a-13: 'dis gshegs su gsol lo zhes pa ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga'o /
T02D2531:362a-15: // / de nas gang gi tshe sbyin sreg gi me
T02D2531:362a-16: nye bar zhi bar gyur nas rgya cher bsdus nas
T02D2531:362a-17: chu rab tu dbab pa las gsungs pa'i cho gas
T02D2531:362a-18: de bzhin du thal ba rnams chu bo la gshegs
T02D2531:362a-20: 'di ni bdag gi rgyud rnams kun las nges brtags nas /
T02D2531:362a-21: shin tu legs par rnam par dag par nye bar bsdus /
T02D2531:362a-22: sngon med sgra yis shin tu legs par ma gyur kyang //
T02D2531:362a-23: de lta na yang blo ldan mkhas rnams bzod par gsol //
T02D2531:362a-24: chu skyes mtsho nang snyan pa'i gdangs chags pa'i //
T02D2531:362a-25: dpal ldan rigs kyis byin pa'i sbyar ba'i gzhung //
T02D2531:362a-26: sbyin bdag rnams kyi yid ni 'phrog byed pa //
T02D2531:362a-27: slob dpon kun gyi rgyan gyi mchog gyur pa //
T02D2531:362a-28: cho ga'i rnam pa spros pa las //
T02D2531:362a-29: bdag gis dge ba gang bsags 'dis //
T02D2531:362a-30: 'jig rten rdo rje sems gyur nas //
T02D2531:362a-31: bcing bral rang bzhin mchog gyur cig / ces pa
T02D2531:362a-32: ni pandi ta chen po ni sam ga a'a ts'arya
T02D2531:362a-33: dpal ldan rigs kyis byin pas mdzad pa bya ba
T02D2531:362a-34: bsdus pa'i panytsi k'a las rab tu byed pa brgyad
T02D2531:362a-36: / bla ma pandi ta chen po k'irta tsandra'i zhal
T02D2531:362a-37: snga nas zhus shing gzhung sum gnyis bal po'i mthil
T02D2531:362a-38: du bsgyur zhing / sum cha gcig dus 'khor ba
T02D2531:362a-39: chen po shes rab seng ges bskul zhing sbyin bdag
T02D2531:362a-41: sh'akya'i dge slong yar lungs pa grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis yos lo nga bo'i zla ba'i /
T02D2531:362a-42: dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes brgyad la gzhu'i kun dga'
T02D2531:362a-43: ra ba'i gtsug lag khang chen por yongs su rdzogs
